MESSAGE.Translation: As far as love's concerned, we're about the same though.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、鈴ほどは疎くない気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I doubt I'm as clueless as she is.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I doubt I'm as clueless as she is.

MESSAGE.JP: だから言ってやる。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「苦しいものだよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's painful, I'm sure of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's painful, I'm sure of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恋患い…言葉の通りさ、ほんとの病気みたいに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Lovesickness... It literally is like a sickness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Lovesickness... It literally is like a sickness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…難しいものだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Really... So complicated...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Really... So complicated...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は…
MESSAGE.EN: Will there...
MESSAGE.Translation: Will there...

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かに恋する日がくるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: come a day when she falls in love with someone too?
MESSAGE.Translation: come a day when she falls in love with someone too?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にはうまく想像できない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't imagine it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't imagine it.

MESSAGE.JP: いつまでも、恭介の後にひっついて…
MESSAGE.EN: She'll always stick closely behind Kyousuke's back...
MESSAGE.Translation: She'll always stick closely behind Kyousuke's back...

MESSAGE.JP: それで、表情ひとつ変えずに楽しんでいる気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Never changing her expression, always enjoying everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Never changing her expression, always enjoying everything.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえずさ、そっちの方向で頑張ってみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For now, let's put some effort in that direction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For now, let's put some effort in that direction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんのことだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん、彼のことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm referring to him, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm referring to him, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白い灰になりかけてる相川くんを指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed to Aikawa-kun who had turned into white ash.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed to Aikawa-kun who had turned into white ash.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep... you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep... you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その、悪かったな…すべてあたしの仕業だったと謝ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Um... I'm sorry... It's all my fault, so I'm here to apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Um... I'm sorry... It's all my fault, so I'm here to apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それと、これを手に入れてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And I also obtained this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And I also obtained this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴらっと紙切れを差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out a scrap of paper to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out a scrap of paper to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 相川くんがようやく反応を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: He finally showed a reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He finally showed a reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「これって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Is that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Is that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ささ子の携帯のメアドだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sasako's cell-phone email.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sasako's cell-phone email.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その、悪かったな…いろいろ込みであたしの仕業だったと謝ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's um... I'm sorry, it was all my fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's um... I'm sorry, it was all my fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それと、これを手に入れてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And I also got this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And I also got this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴらっと紙切れを差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out a scrap of paper to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out a scrap of paper to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 相川くんがようやく反応を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: He finally showed a reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He finally showed a reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「これって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Is that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Is that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ささみの携帯のメアドだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sasami's cell-phone email.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sasami's cell-phone email.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「どうやって…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝How did you get it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝How did you get it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まあ、謝ってだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, I apologized to her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, I apologized to her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえのことを教えた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And told her about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And told her about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや、好きとかそういうことは言っていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I didn't say that that you liked her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I didn't say that that you liked her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「友達になりたい、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I told her you wanted to become friends with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I told her you wanted to become friends with her.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝And...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝And...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そこまで言うのなら、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝'If you insist that much,' she said...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝'If you insist that much,' she said...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が思うに…
MESSAGE.EN: I think...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think...

MESSAGE.JP: 相当、ねばったんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin must've been really pestering her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin must've been really pestering her.

MESSAGE.JP: 我慢強く…。
MESSAGE.EN: Keeping her patience...
MESSAGE.Translation: Keeping her patience...

MESSAGE.JP: あの笹瀬川さんが、そう簡単に鈴にメールアドレスを教えるとは思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't believe that Sasasegawa-san would give Rin her email address so easily.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't believe that Sasasegawa-san would give Rin her email address so easily.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ただし、一日、一通だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝However, no more than one email a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝However, no more than one email a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それ以上はもっと仲がよくなってからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝More than that will be allowed only after you become better friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝More than that will be allowed only after you become better friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それと、メールを打つ時以外はあいつのことをなるべく考えるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And, try not to think of her all the time when not emailing her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And, try not to think of her all the time when not emailing her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「勉強もちゃんとしろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You've got to study properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You've got to study properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Got it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Got it?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「ああ、わかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Yeah, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Yeah, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その紙切れを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: He took the scrap of paper from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He took the scrap of paper from her.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりして、その背を見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: We watched him as he left.
MESSAGE.Translation: We watched him as he left.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これで、解決したんだろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Did that solve everything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Did that solve everything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、それは彼次第だろうけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, now it's up to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, now it's up to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、鈴にできることはしてあげられたんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you did everything you could.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you did everything you could.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いろいろあったけど、これでよかったと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A lot happened, but I think it worked out for the best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A lot happened, but I think it worked out for the best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Did it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Did it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ならよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一時間目が終わり、休み時間に。
MESSAGE.EN: The first class had ended, it was break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The first class had ended, it was break time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室の片隅を見ると、鈴がなにやらロッカーの前でしゃがみこんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked in the corner of the classroom and found Rin crouching in front of the lockers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked in the corner of the classroom and found Rin crouching in front of the lockers.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにやってるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…困った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It's a problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It's a problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「うにゃ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Unyaa～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Unyaa～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ロッカーのバケツに猫が入り込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a cat in a bucket in the locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a cat in a bucket in the locker.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いつのまにか入り込んでいたみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He seems to have gotten in here somehow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He seems to have gotten in here somehow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、外に連れ出さないとまずいよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... We've got to get him out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... We've got to get him out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつは一番凶暴なやつなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is one of the wilder ones...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is one of the wilder ones...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「普段は愚連隊を引き連れ裏山を根城にしている…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's the boss of the group that uses the hill behind the school as base...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's the boss of the group that uses the hill behind the school as base...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「協定は結んでいるものの、あたしには決して懐かない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We've reached a peace agreement, but we're not on close terms yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We've reached a peace agreement, but we're not on close terms yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「猫社会も大変なんだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cat society sure is tough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cat society sure is tough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そういうわけで、迂闊に手を出したらとんでもない騒ぎになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's why, if we're not careful there's no telling what kind of racket he'll start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's why, if we're not careful there's no telling what kind of racket he'll start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …確かに、暴れ出して騒ぎになったら、いつも猫と一緒の鈴がやり玉に上げられるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If he causes a commotion, Rin, known to always be with the cats, would be held responsible.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If he causes a commotion, Rin, known to always be with the cats, would be held responsible.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふたりとも、なにしてるのー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝What are you two up to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝What are you two up to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、小毬さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわー、ねこさんだ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa, a kitty～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa, a kitty～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「にゃ～にゃ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Nyaa～ Nyaa～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Nyaa～ Nyaa～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら猫に手を差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She called to the cat, reaching out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called to the cat, reaching out.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「うしゃーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Ushaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Ushaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぷす。
MESSAGE.EN: *Chup*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Chup*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ぷす？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...*Chup*?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...*Chup*?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんの手に猫の爪が刺さっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat had sunk its nails into Komari-san's outstretched hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat had sunk its nails into Komari-san's outstretched hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ…だ、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa... Are, are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa... Are, are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうしていいかわからないのか、鈴がおたおたし始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was shocked speechless and didn't know what to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was shocked speechless and didn't know what to do.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほんとに凶暴なんだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He really is ferocious...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He really is ferocious...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm, I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm, I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、ううん、だいじょうぶ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝N, no, I'm fine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝N, no, I'm fine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ、と刺された手を握る。
MESSAGE.EN: She squeezed her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She squeezed her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: …だらだらだら…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...*Drip*drip*drip*...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...*Drip*drip*drip*...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ひゃあああぁぁーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hyaaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hyaaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 血が噴出してきていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: Blood started gushing out!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Blood started gushing out!?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うわああぁぁーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Woaaah!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Woaaah!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いやまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、鈴が持っていたばんそうこうを、小毬さんの手の傷に貼り付ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin took out an adhesive bandage and applied it to Komari-san's wound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin took out an adhesive bandage and applied it to Komari-san's wound.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ありがとうりんちゃん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Thank you, Rin-chan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Thank you, Rin-chan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 罪悪感が勝っているのか、鈴はしゅんとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Assaulted by the sense of guilt, she was standing there in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Assaulted by the sense of guilt, she was standing there in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃん、気にしないでー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, don't mind it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, don't mind it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「勝手に手出したの、私だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I held out my hand all on my own...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I held out my hand all on my own...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺこりと頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、それでおっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's okay now～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's okay now～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、どうしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what do we do now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what do we do now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕が視線を猫のほうに向けると、ふんと顔を逸らした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As I shot a glance in the cat's direction, he turned away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As I shot a glance in the cat's direction, he turned away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…無愛想だなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...How unfriendly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...How unfriendly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こうなったら…上手く猫が騒がないように、ムリヤリ静かに連れ出すしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Now that it's come to this... We can only catch him and get him out of here without making too much noise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Now that it's come to this... We can only catch him and get him out of here without making too much noise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また難しいこと言うねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Easier said than done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Easier said than done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はそういうと、バケツの猫を捕まえにかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: As with that, she went to get the cat in the bucket.
MESSAGE.Translation: As with that, she went to get the cat in the bucket.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「ふぎゃぁーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Fugyaa～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Fugyaa～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「い、いたたっ…こらっ、めーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ow, owow... Hey, bad!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ow, owow... Hey, bad!❞

MESSAGE.JP: がたんがたんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Gan*gan*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gan*gan*.

MESSAGE.JP: ロッカーとバケツが派手な音を立て、クラスのみんなの視線がこっちに向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone's attention focused on us as the locker and the bucket made loud noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone's attention focused on us as the locker and the bucket made loud noise.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しまった…理樹、ごまかせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh no... Riki, make up an excuse!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh no... Riki, make up an excuse!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごまかすって、どうやって…。
MESSAGE.EN: How am I supposed to fool them...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How am I supposed to fool them...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、バケツの数が足りないみたいだね。あとで美化委員に言ってもらってこようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, looks like we're missing some buckets. I'll have to ask the beautification committee to give us more of them later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, looks like we're missing some buckets. I'll have to ask the beautification committee to give us more of them later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ちゃんと整理はしておかないとダメだね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, we need to sort it out properly～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, we need to sort it out properly～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんも意図を汲んでくれたのか、乗ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Did she catch onto my plan? Either way she played smoothly along.
MESSAGE.Translation: Did she catch onto my plan? Either way she played smoothly along.

MESSAGE.JP: 周囲も『なんだ、ロッカーの整理か』とそれぞれ各自のやっていたことに戻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone went ❛Huh? They're just sorting out cleaning equipment?❜ and went back to what they were doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone went ❛Huh? They're just sorting out cleaning equipment?❜ and went back to what they were doing.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ナイスだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nice one, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nice one, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「例のやつが出た!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That thing came out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That thing came out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　れいのやつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? That thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? That thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「例のやつというと、ごき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He means a roach.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He means a roach.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわああーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: がたっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Gata*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gata*!!

MESSAGE.JP: がたたっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Gatata*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gatata*!!

MESSAGE.JP: ばたーんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Batam*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Batam*!!

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが逃げようとして、盛大に周囲の机に突っ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san turned to run away, crashing into some desks in the process.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san turned to run away, crashing into some desks in the process.

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「なんだなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「か、神北さん…大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Ka, Kamikita-san... Are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Ka, Kamikita-san... Are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえーん、いたい～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueeen, it hurts～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueeen, it hurts～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でもだいじょうぶ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I'm okay～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I'm okay～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …周囲も『なんだいつものことか』とそれぞれ各自のやっていたことに戻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Everyone went ❛Huh? Just the usual❜ and lost all interest.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Everyone went ❛Huh? Just the usual❜ and lost all interest.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、ちょっとこれはまずかったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, that wasn't a great idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, that wasn't a great idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だが、ナイスだこまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But still, nice one, Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But still, nice one, Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うん、結果おーらいだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ye, yeah, it turned out all right～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ye, yeah, it turned out all right～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただいまっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm home!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm home!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中に入り、ドアを閉める。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked in and closed the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked in and closed the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり自宅って落ち着くよね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It really is best to relax at home!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It really is best to relax at home!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …出る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I got out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I got out.

MESSAGE.JP: 意味不明だった。
MESSAGE.EN: What the heck was that?
MESSAGE.Translation: What the heck was that?

MESSAGE.JP: 周囲は『なんだ、そこが直枝の家か』とそれぞれ各自のやっていたことに戻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone went ❛Huh? So is that where Naoe lives?❜ and went back to what they were doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone went ❛Huh? So is that where Naoe lives?❜ and went back to what they were doing.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ナイスだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nice one, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nice one, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんか今度は僕を哀れむような視線が増えたんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It feels like a lot of people were looking at me with pity...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It feels like a lot of people were looking at me with pity...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず、これはダメだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But this is not working...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But this is not working...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「強引にやるのは無理そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's impossible to get him out by force.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's impossible to get him out by force.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よっぽどここが気に入ったのか、なんなのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why exactly does he like that place so much?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why exactly does he like that place so much?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…困った、どうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It's a problem, what can we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It's a problem, what can we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「猫じゃらしで気を引くのはどうですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝How about using bristlegrass to lure him out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝How about using bristlegrass to lure him out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつはそういうのに全然反応しない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He doesn't react to it at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He doesn't react to it at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？　じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm? Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm? Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、そうだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが自分の席に戻り、鞄の中から何かを持ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a trip to her seat and brought something back with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a trip to her seat and brought something back with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「きっちんみとん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oven mittens～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oven mittens～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「これなら痛くないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It won't hurt with these～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It won't hurt with these～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お菓子作りにでも使う予定だったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably had them for making sweets.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably had them for making sweets.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはキッチンミトンを両手にはめて、猫を抱きかかえた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hands into the mittens and snatched up the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hands into the mittens and snatched up the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「がじがじ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Screech screech!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Screech screech!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、だいじょうぶー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, it's okay～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, it's okay～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫はミトンを噛むのに夢中なせいか、おとなしく小毬さんに捕まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat gnawed on the oven mitts like crazy, but Komari-san held it calmly and it couldn't make any noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat gnawed on the oven mitts like crazy, but Komari-san held it calmly and it couldn't make any noise.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それじゃー中庭に戻してくるねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, I'm going to go take it to the courtyard～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, I'm going to go take it to the courtyard～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いい、あたしが行く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's okay, I'll do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's okay, I'll do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「へいきへいきー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm fine, I'm fine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm fine, I'm fine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 止める間もなく教室を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She left the classroom before Rin could stop her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She left the classroom before Rin could stop her.

MESSAGE.JP: ワンテンポ置いて。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a short silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a short silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「にゃぎゃぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Nigyaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Nigyaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ひゃあああぁぁーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hyaaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hyaaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …廊下から騒がしい声が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then noise broke out in the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then noise broke out in the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが抱えていた猫が暴れ出したみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like Komari-san had lost her hold on the raging cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like Komari-san had lost her hold on the raging cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、やっぱり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I knew it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I knew it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だから言ったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's why I told her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's why I told her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはドジって言うか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san really is a klutz...
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san really is a klutz...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無意識に自爆しに行ってるよなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She subconsciously headed straight for self-destruction...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She subconsciously headed straight for self-destruction...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ほんとに、難儀な性格だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Such a troublesome personality...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Such a troublesome personality...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃんは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃんは何であんなことをしてくれるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why does she do things like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why does she do things like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしに任せておけばいい。あたしのほうが猫の扱いも上手い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She could've just left it to me. I can handle cats better anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She could've just left it to me. I can handle cats better anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん、友達の手伝いとか大好きだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She loves to help out her friends, doesn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She loves to help out her friends, doesn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は友達だからさ、困ってたらほっとけないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're her friend, so she can't leave you alone when you're in trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're her friend, so she can't leave you alone when you're in trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それが小毬さんのいいところでもあり、最大の欠点でもある気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It's her strong suit, but it's also her weakness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's her strong suit, but it's also her weakness.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴だってそういうとき、あると思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you are the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you are the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ともだち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...A friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...A friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴は照れくさそうにしながら、その言葉を呟いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She murmured bashfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She murmured bashfully.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴんとこないのか、鈴はただじっと小毬さんの消えた出口を見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: At the word, her eyes instinctually wandered to the door Komari-san had disappeared through.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the word, her eyes instinctually wandered to the door Komari-san had disappeared through.

MESSAGE.JP: 次の時間は数学。
MESSAGE.EN: The next class will be math.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next class will be math.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…相変らずいないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's not here, as always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's not here, as always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんの席のほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced at Kurugaya-san's seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced at Kurugaya-san's seat.

MESSAGE.JP: …見事にもぬけの殻だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was obviously empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was obviously empty.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「次は小テストらしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Looks like we'll have a pop quiz.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Looks like we'll have a pop quiz.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…最近、調子悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Not feeling well lately?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Not feeling well lately?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ここのところ、授業中におまえの姿を見かけないことが多い気がするぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It seems like you've been been missing a lot of classes recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It seems like you've been been missing a lot of classes recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …突然寝てしまうという、僕の持病のことは、学校側も知っているはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had a chronic condition where I could suddenly fall asleep and the teachers were aware of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had a chronic condition where I could suddenly fall asleep and the teachers were aware of it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（元からそこまで気にすることもなかったってことかなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Or maybe they didn't mind too much in the first place...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Or maybe they didn't mind too much in the first place...)

MESSAGE.JP: とはいえ、持病だからっていう言い訳ができても、実際はサボりと変わらないわけで。
MESSAGE.EN: But nevertheless, even if it could be used as an excuse, it didn't change the fact that I'd been skipping lately.
MESSAGE.Translation: But nevertheless, even if it could be used as an excuse, it didn't change the fact that I'd been skipping lately.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱりそれは、なんだか後ろめたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt guilty about it after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt guilty about it after all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ていうか、来ヶ谷さんもこういう時くらいは出席しないとまずいんじゃないかなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Or actually, if Kurugaya-san isn't at least attending class at times like this, won't she be in trouble...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Or actually, if Kurugaya-san isn't at least attending class at times like this, won't she be in trouble...?)

MESSAGE.JP: …ちょっと心配になった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was a little worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was a little worried.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、ふと考え直す。
MESSAGE.EN: I considered it further.
MESSAGE.Translation: I considered it further.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり呼びに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go and find her, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go and find her, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、どうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Mm, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Mm, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん呼びに行ってくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going to go get Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to go get Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…また、おまえもずいぶんなお節介焼きだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What, again? You're really being quite meddlesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What, again? You're really being quite meddlesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ急ぐんだな。おまえまで遅れたら笑い話にもならないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hurry up then. It won't even be funny if you end up late for class too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hurry up then. It won't even be funny if you end up late for class too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …それもそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That was the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That was the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに今回はお茶会とか、悠長なことも言ってられないだろうし。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't leisurely hang around for a tea party or anything like that, this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't leisurely hang around for a tea party or anything like that, this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭の片隅に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed for the corner of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed for the corner of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いない。
MESSAGE.EN: She's not here.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's not here.

MESSAGE.JP: …自販機のほうかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is she over by the vending machine?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is she over by the vending machine?

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「おや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Oh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Oh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろから声が。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice came from behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice came from behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り向くと、校舎の窓から来ヶ谷さんが顔を出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to find her head poking out the school window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to find her head poking out the school window.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは窓をひょい、と飛び越え、僕の隣に着地する。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaped through it and landed beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaped through it and landed beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうした少年。今日はキミからサボりに来たのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong, young man, are you skipping lessons on your own this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong, young man, are you skipping lessons on your own this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、違うけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱんぱん、と手を払い、椅子を引っ張り出して座り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped her hands, seating herself in a nearby chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped her hands, seating herself in a nearby chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「じゃあなんだ？　また勉強でも教わりに来たのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then what? Do you want me to tutor you again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then what? Do you want me to tutor you again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次、小テストだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems we have a small test.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems we have a small test.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はぁ、そうなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, is that so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, is that so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「出ないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you coming?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you coming?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「定期考査以外は出なくていい事になってるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's okay if I only show up during mid-terms and finals.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's okay if I only show up during mid-terms and finals.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そういうわけだ。まあ、こういう日まで引き止めたりはせんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's why I'm here. Well, I won't ask you to stay since you've got a test to take.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's why I'm here. Well, I won't ask you to stay since you've got a test to take.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「頑張って解いてくることだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I wish you the best of luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I wish you the best of luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…なんだ、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What is it, young man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What is it, young man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱ授業は出ようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should get to class, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should get to class, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「数学以外は出てるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I attend all my classes except for math.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I attend all my classes except for math.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、数学も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, math too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, math too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いやだめんどくさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, it's such a hassle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, it's such a hassle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなわがまま言わないでさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't be so selfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't be so selfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そんなわがままを通すために、定期考査でいい点数を取ってるんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm always getting good grades during finals and mid-terms so that I can keep being selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm always getting good grades during finals and mid-terms so that I can keep being selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…それに、私が出席すると都合の悪い人間もいることだしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Besides, there's one person who wouldn't be too happy to see me there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Besides, there's one person who wouldn't be too happy to see me there.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let me see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let me see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「実際にやってみれば早いか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It might be quicker if you see for yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It might be quicker if you see for yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういうと立ち上がり、歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She got to her feet and began walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got to her feet and began walking.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうした、遅れるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? We'll be late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? We'll be late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんかよくわかんないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't really get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't really get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「心配ない。これから判る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Worry not. You'll understand soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Worry not. You'll understand soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、出る気にはなってくれたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: At least it seems that she intends to attend class.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least it seems that she intends to attend class.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「しかし理樹君もお節介焼きだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But, you're quite the busybody, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But, you're quite the busybody, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そういうところ、私は好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I like this side of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I like this side of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …思わず言葉に詰まってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was at a loss as to how to react.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was at a loss as to how to react.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは笑いながら先を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She continued walking as she laughed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She continued walking as she laughed.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に戻ると同時に、チャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell rang just as we got to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell rang just as we got to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは自分の席に座ると、窓の外のほうをじっと見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat in her seat and fixed her gaze out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat in her seat and fixed her gaze out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 程なくして、数学担当の先生が無言で教室に入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The math teacher came in shortly after.
MESSAGE.Translation: The math teacher came in shortly after.

MESSAGE.JP: …一瞬、足が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And froze in his tracks.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And froze in his tracks.

MESSAGE.JP: 先生が見ていたのは、たぶん来ヶ谷さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one he was looking at was probably Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one he was looking at was probably Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間になる。
MESSAGE.EN: Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: 授業中、最後まで小テストのプリントが配られることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: During class he never even brought up the test.
MESSAGE.Translation: During class he never even brought up the test.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やったぜぇ…このままいきゃあ小テストなしだぜ…うっかり忘れてやがる…やほぅ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Awesome... At this rate there won't be any test... He totally forgot about it... Yahoo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Awesome... At this rate there won't be any test... He totally forgot about it... Yahoo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまり騒ぐと、思い出されるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't keep it down, he'll remember...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't keep it down, he'll remember...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかし、なんだか妙だと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: But that really was strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that really was strange.

MESSAGE.JP: 数学担当の教師は、いつも威張り散らしていて生徒からの評判はえらく悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: The math teacher was always very conceited and had a poor reputation among the students.
MESSAGE.Translation: The math teacher was always very conceited and had a poor reputation among the students.

MESSAGE.JP: それがなんだか、今日は腫れ物に触るような態度で授業をしていたわけで。
MESSAGE.EN: But today he seemed to be acting very cautiously and minding his attitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: But today he seemed to be acting very cautiously and minding his attitude.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…来ヶ谷さんだよなぁ、原因は…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Kurugaya-san must be the reason...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Kurugaya-san must be the reason...)

MESSAGE.JP: どうも、あの先生から恐れられているみたいだ、来ヶ谷さんは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like the teacher's afraid of her...
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like the teacher's afraid of her...

MESSAGE.JP: 後で前のクラスで来ヶ谷さんと一緒だった、謙吾に話を聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked Kengo, who'd been in the same class with her the previous year, about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked Kengo, who'd been in the same class with her the previous year, about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あんまり誉められたものじゃないが、それでもあの女はいつも成績上位だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's not something I should praise, but her grades are always at the top.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's not something I should praise, but her grades are always at the top.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それに、全国模試で一桁の順位をとったこともあるらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And I hear she even made it into the top ten in the national mock exams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And I hear she even made it into the top ten in the national mock exams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そこまでだったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Was she really that smart?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Was she really that smart?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「出なくても問題ないと証明されている以上、教師側にしても強いことは言えないのだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's proof that she's fine even without attending classes, so teachers can't really say anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's proof that she's fine even without attending classes, so teachers can't really say anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Besides...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Besides...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…その態度に腹を立てた数学の教師が、一度来ヶ谷に逆にやり込められたことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...This math teacher, who didn't like her attitude, opposed her once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...This math teacher, who didn't like her attitude, opposed her once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「突然呼びつけて、試験を来ヶ谷に出したらしい。それも大学生でもわからないような高等数学の問題のな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He called her out suddenly and made her take an exam. And it had problems that would even be difficult for university students to solve.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He called her out suddenly and made her take an exam. And it had problems that would even be difficult for university students to solve.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「この辺は聞いた話だからよくわからないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's just something I heard about, so I don't know the details...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's just something I heard about, so I don't know the details...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あの人、それで満点でも取っちゃったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And she still passed with flying colors?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And she still passed with flying colors?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そういうことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、次元が違うなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's like we're in different dimensions...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's like we're in different dimensions...

MESSAGE.JP: それに、普段普通に話してると、そういう感じも全然しないし…。
MESSAGE.EN: And when we talk casually she doesn't give such a feeling at all...
MESSAGE.Translation: And when we talk casually she doesn't give such a feeling at all...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は正直、その話で胸がすっとしたがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And to be honest I was glad when I heard this story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And to be honest I was glad when I heard this story.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「悪い噂だらけだぞ、あの数学教師…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There are only bad rumors about this math teacher...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There are only bad rumors about this math teacher...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかそういう話はよく聞くけどねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, so I've heard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, so I've heard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、どっちが正しいのかわかんなくなる話だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't sure what was right and what was wrong anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't sure what was right and what was wrong anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんのことだから、きっとなんか問題ないような、うまいやり方をしてるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's Kurugaya-san we're talking about, I'm sure she knows how to handle the situation without a problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's Kurugaya-san we're talking about, I'm sure she knows how to handle the situation without a problem.

MESSAGE.JP: …そう考えると…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...When I thought about it like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...When I thought about it like this...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さんは自由人、って言うか、なんていうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How should I put it, Kurugaya-san sure relishes her freedom...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How should I put it, Kurugaya-san sure relishes her freedom...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 浮世離れした人だよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's like she's detached from the world...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's like she's detached from the world...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…来ヶ谷か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Kurugaya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Kurugaya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いっつも数学出てなくて平気なのかなーって思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was thinking about how she never attends math, but she's still fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was thinking about how she never attends math, but she's still fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あんまり誉められたものじゃないが、それでもあの女はいつも成績上位だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's not something I should praise, but her grades are always at the top.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's not something I should praise, but her grades are always at the top.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それに、全国模試で一桁の順位をとったこともあるらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And I hear she even made it into the top ten in the national mock exams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And I hear she even made it into the top ten in the national mock exams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そこまでだったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is she really that smart?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is she really that smart?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「出なくても問題ないと証明されている以上、教師側にしても強いことは言えないんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's proof that she's fine even without attending classes, so teachers can't really say anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's proof that she's fine even without attending classes, so teachers can't really say anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 他の授業はちゃんと出てるのに、数学だけいつもいないんだよなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: She does attend other classes, but never math...
MESSAGE.Translation: She does attend other classes, but never math...

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、天才ってのはきっと、僕たち一般人には計り知れない何かがあるんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, she's a genius, so that must be something common people like me cannot grasp...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, she's a genius, so that must be something common people like me cannot grasp...

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、そんな実力があって、なんでこんな普通の学校に来たんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And why is she in a normal school such as this in the first place, if she's so smart?
MESSAGE.Translation: And why is she in a normal school such as this in the first place, if she's so smart?

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now that I think of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now that I think of it...

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ、僕には『行く』という選択が出来なかったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, the option to ❛go there❜ didn't appear before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, the option to ❛go there❜ didn't appear before me.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんとなく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: もし僕がそっちを選んでいたら、その先には悲しいことが待っていたような…そんな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a feeling that... If I'd gone there, there'd be something sad waiting for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a feeling that... If I'd gone there, there'd be something sad waiting for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: 提出物を持って、職員室へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was heading to the faculty office to turn in the handouts.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was heading to the faculty office to turn in the handouts.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、どうも職員室って言うのは好きじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wasn't very fond of that place.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wasn't very fond of that place.

MESSAGE.JP: 変に緊張するというか、居心地が悪いというか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I would always feel strangely nervous and uncomfortable...
MESSAGE.Translation: I would always feel strangely nervous and uncomfortable...

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、職員室が居心地いいってのも変な話になるんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it'd be weird if anyone felt comfortable there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it'd be weird if anyone felt comfortable there.

MESSAGE.JP: 担任教師に提出物のプリントを手渡すと、廊下に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned in the handouts and came out into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned in the handouts and came out into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、どうしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now, what should I do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now, what should I do...

MESSAGE.JP: 時間もあることだし、朱鷺戸さんを探してみようか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got time, so maybe I'll look for Tokido-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got time, so maybe I'll look for Tokido-san...

MESSAGE.JP: クラスにいないのは間違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: She's definitely not in her class.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's definitely not in her class.

MESSAGE.JP: どこかで僕のことを監視してたり…とか？
MESSAGE.EN: Could she be watching me from somewhere?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could she be watching me from somewhere?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「朱鷺戸さーん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 叫んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I yelled.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yelled.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「朱鷺戸さーん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 所構わず、呼んで回る。
MESSAGE.EN: I yelled for her, not caring where I was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yelled for her, not caring where I was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「朱鷺戸さーん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 現れてくれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't showing up...
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't showing up...

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、授業が始まってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, class is starting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, class is starting.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女も今頃は自分の席に戻ってるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She's probably going back to her own seat now.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's probably going back to her own seat now.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、馬鹿らしい時間を過ごしてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I wasted my time like an idiot...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I wasted my time like an idiot...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず教室に戻ることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to go back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to go back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、ふと目に入る、見知った後ろ姿。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And I suddenly noticed someone I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And I suddenly noticed someone I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: ここには真人がいない…
MESSAGE.EN: Masato isn't here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato isn't here...

MESSAGE.JP: だったら遊べないじゃないか！
MESSAGE.EN: So I can't play!
MESSAGE.Translation: So I can't play!

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に戻ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …そこで、見知った姿を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And there I met someone I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And there I met someone I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはなにやら職員室の入り口にある、熱帯魚の水槽を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like she was looking at the tropical fish in the fish tank near the entrance to the faculty office.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like she was looking at the tropical fish in the fish tank near the entrance to the faculty office.

MESSAGE.JP: …何してるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What's she doing?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What's she doing?

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく観察してみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to observe her for a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to observe her for a bit.

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Boo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Boo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ゆらゆらと動く魚のひれをぼーと眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was watching the lazily swimming fish as though in a trance.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was watching the lazily swimming fish as though in a trance.

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Boo～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Boo～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆらゆら。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wobble*wobble*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wobble*wobble*.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭が揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was slowly swaying her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was slowly swaying her head.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆらゆら…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wobble wobble*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wobble wobble*.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、シンクロしてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like she's synchronizing her movements...
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like she's synchronizing her movements...

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に、小毬さんが水槽のガラスを指先でちょん、とつついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly she jabbed her finger at the fish tank.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly she jabbed her finger at the fish tank.

MESSAGE.JP: 魚が驚いたようにぴゅっ、と身を翻して水草の裏へ隠れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The fish were startled and darted about the fish tank, hiding themselves at the back of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fish were startled and darted about the fish tank, hiding themselves at the back of it.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …その動きにびっくりしたのか、小毬さんもびく、と頭を揺らした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was startled by the sudden movement and shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was startled by the sudden movement and shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、再びぼーと眺め始める。
MESSAGE.EN: And she resumed gazing at the fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she resumed gazing at the fish.

MESSAGE.JP: いや何してんだか全然わかんないんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no clue what she's doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no clue what she's doing...

MESSAGE.JP: 本人に訊いてみることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should ask.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should ask.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…小毬さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え？　あっ、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh? Ah, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh? Ah, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「こんにちは～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hi there～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hi there～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…何してるのさ、水槽眺めて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... So, what are you up to? You were looking at the fish tank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... So, what are you up to? You were looking at the fish tank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？　水槽を眺めてたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm? I was looking into the fish tank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm? I was looking into the fish tank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、その理由を訊いてるんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, actually I was asking for the reason she was doing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, actually I was asking for the reason she was doing that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何か面白いのでもいたっけ、この水槽」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was there something interesting in there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was there something interesting in there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おさかなさんがいますよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There are fishies～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There are fishies～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、そりゃあ水槽があれば大抵魚がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, when there's a fish tank, one would normally expect to find fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, when there's a fish tank, one would normally expect to find fish.

MESSAGE.JP: 中を見てみても、別段珍しい魚はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a peek and discovered that there weren't really any rare species to be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a peek and discovered that there weren't really any rare species to be found.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…楽しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is it fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is it fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、楽しいよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it is～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it is～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't get her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't get her.

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Boo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Boo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼーと眺めてるのが小毬さんにとっては楽しいことらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It would seem that lazily watching the fish was something fun for Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would seem that lazily watching the fish was something fun for Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: なんというか、ツッコミどころ満載の行動。
MESSAGE.EN: How should I put it, there was just too much to comment on.
MESSAGE.Translation: How should I put it, there was just too much to comment on.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「魚とか好きなんだね、小毬さんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you like fish, Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you like fish, Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん？　お魚だけじゃなくて、ちっちゃい生き物とか、みんな好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm? Not only fish, I like all small animals.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm? Not only fish, I like all small animals.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、でもおっきい生き物も好きだなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, but I like big animals too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, but I like big animals too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからないところで考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She began pondering about something, but I had no idea what.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began pondering about something, but I had no idea what.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も水槽の中を眺めてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked into the fish tank too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked into the fish tank too.

MESSAGE.JP: エンゼルフィッシュのうつろな目が僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: The lifeless eyes of an angel fish stared back at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The lifeless eyes of an angel fish stared back at me.

MESSAGE.JP: これは楽しいことなのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Could this actually be fun?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could this actually be fun?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへ、お魚さんってかわいいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, the fishies are cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, the fishies are cute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんかこの魚やたらうつろな目をしてるんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This fish has really mindless, lifeless eyes, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This fish has really mindless, lifeless eyes, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そのうつろな目がいいんだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I like those lifeless eyes～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I like those lifeless eyes～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、とってもちゃーみんぐでかわいいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, they're very charming and cute～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, they're very charming and cute～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そこに魅力があるのか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, what exactly could be fascinating about them...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, what exactly could be fascinating about them...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえずもうすぐチャイム鳴るし、教室行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Class starts soon, let's head back to the classroom for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Class starts soon, let's head back to the classroom for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、もうそんな時間なんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, it's that late already...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, it's that late already...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時間を忘れてゆらゆらしていたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like she'd lost track of time while idling lazily here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like she'd lost track of time while idling lazily here.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんちって魚とか飼ってたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san, do you have any fish at home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san, do you have any fish at home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下を歩きながらそんなことを訊いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her as we walked side by side down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her as we walked side by side down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、縁日で金魚すくいやって、持って帰った金魚さんを飼ってたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, I have a goldfish I scooped up at the festival.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, I have a goldfish I scooped up at the festival.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「最初は金魚鉢で飼ってたんだけどね、なんかどんどんおっきくなっちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I put it in the goldfish bowl at first, but then it got bigger and bigger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I put it in the goldfish bowl at first, but then it got bigger and bigger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しょうがないからこんなおっきい水槽買ってきたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It left me no choice but to buy a really big fish tank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It left me no choice but to buy a really big fish tank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 両手を広げてスケールを示す。
MESSAGE.EN: She stretched her arms wide to indicate the scale.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stretched her arms wide to indicate the scale.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えさとかいっぱいあげてたから、きっとすごい成長よかったんだね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was feeding it a lot, that's probably why it got so big～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was feeding it a lot, that's probably why it got so big～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ、それじゃその金魚とかって、まだ実家のほうで飼ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee, so that goldfish or whatever is still there back at home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee, so that goldfish or whatever is still there back at home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔をうつむかせて考え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her eyes and was lost in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her eyes and was lost in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ…いたっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh... Was it still there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh... Was it still there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…いないね、今は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...It's not there, anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...It's not there, anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おかしいなぁ…絶対飼ってたはずなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's weird... I'm sure I kept it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's weird... I'm sure I kept it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「いつのまにかどっか行っちゃったのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Did it wander off somewhere at some point...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Did it wander off somewhere at some point...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、金魚が水槽ごとどっかに行ったりしないよね、普通」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, normally a goldfish wouldn't suddenly disappear into thin air along with the entire fish tank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, normally a goldfish wouldn't suddenly disappear into thin air along with the entire fish tank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そうだよねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気付いたように顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her head popped up as if she'd come to a sudden realization.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her head popped up as if she'd come to a sudden realization.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うああああっ、先生にプリント出すの忘れてたぁあああっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uoooh, I forgot to turn in the handouts!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uoooh, I forgot to turn in the handouts!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「水槽眺めてる場合じゃなかったんだぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It was no time to be staring into the fish tank!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It was no time to be staring into the fish tank!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉と同時にチャイム。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words were punctuated by the sound of the school bell ringing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words were punctuated by the sound of the school bell ringing.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うあーん、ダッシュで行ってくる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uaan, I'll dash there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uaan, I'll dash there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、うん…頑張って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, okay... Good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, okay... Good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「がんばる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll do my best～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll do my best～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小走りで元来た道を戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: And she began running back the way we had come.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she began running back the way we had come.

MESSAGE.JP: …ホントにそそっかしい人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She really is careless.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She really is careless.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みになる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふぅ…もう今日からはメンバー集めしなくていいんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew... We don't have to look for members anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew... We don't have to look for members anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「学食いっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝To the cafeteria?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝To the cafeteria?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、真人。僕違うところで食べるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'll be eating somewhere else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'll be eating somewhere else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごく寂しそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked terribly lonely...
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked terribly lonely...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おーけー、こんなことでオレは動揺しないぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, I won't get upset over it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, I won't get upset over it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どんまい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 独り言をぶつぶつ呟きながら、教室から出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: He murmured to himself as he left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He murmured to himself as he left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は購買でパンをいくつか買うと、渡り廊下から外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I bought some bread from the school shop and went out to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bought some bread from the school shop and went out to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中、見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way I spotted a familiar face.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way I spotted a familiar face.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が声を掛ける間もなく、葉留佳さんは鼻歌交じりに学食の方へ歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could call out to her, she'd already left in the direction of the cafeteria, humming a melody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could call out to her, she'd already left in the direction of the cafeteria, humming a melody.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も中庭に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed over to the courtyard too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed over to the courtyard too.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにはいつも通り、西園さんの姿が。
MESSAGE.EN: And there was Nishizono-san, like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there was Nishizono-san, like always.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日もおにぎり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Onigiri again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Onigiri again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No, you're wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No, you're wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、どう見てもおにぎりだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, but that looks very much like onigiri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, but that looks very much like onigiri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 炊いた白飯を三角に握って中に好みの具を入れてのりで巻いた食べ物、日本が生んだ和のファストフードが僕の目の前にある。
MESSAGE.EN: What I saw was a triangle shaped rice ball wrapped in nori, a type of fast food born in Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I saw was a triangle shaped rice ball wrapped in nori, a type of fast food born in Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり、おにぎりじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's definitely onigiri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's definitely onigiri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「違います。おむすび、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're wrong. It's omusubi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're wrong. It's omusubi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't they the same thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't they the same thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「全然、違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They're completely different.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They're completely different.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なにか、こだわりがあるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She seems very particular about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seems very particular about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は違う本を読んでるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Reading a different book today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Reading a different book today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いつも同じ本ばかり読んでいる訳ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Nobody said that I have to read the same book everyday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Nobody said that I have to read the same book everyday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの本はお守りみたいなものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That book is like a good-luck charm to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That book is like a good-luck charm to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「持っているだけで安心できるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I find having it with me reassuring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I find having it with me reassuring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それにあの本は今日、返していただいたものですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Besides, I only had that book returned to me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Besides, I only had that book returned to me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朝の時点では、西園さんはあの本を持っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't have the book this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't have the book this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そうか。それで今日は別の本を持ってきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. So that's why you brought a different one today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. So that's why you brought a different one today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、しばらく西園さんは本に目を落としていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying that, her glance dropped back to the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying that, her glance dropped back to the book.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はもらったおにぎり、じゃなくておむすびを少し千切って鳩にやっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took an onigiri, I mean omusubi, and tore it into small pieces to feed the pigeons.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took an onigiri, I mean omusubi, and tore it into small pieces to feed the pigeons.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ。この海苔、猫にあげてもいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah. Do you think I could give some of this nori to the cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah. Do you think I could give some of this nori to the cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も西園さんからもらった袋には海苔がたくさん入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a lot of nori in the bag she again gave to me today.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a lot of nori in the bag she again gave to me today.

MESSAGE.JP: 正直もさもさしていて、海苔だけで大量には食べられない。
MESSAGE.EN: To be honest, I wouldn't be able to eat all of this nori.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be honest, I wouldn't be able to eat all of this nori.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「猫、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。鈴に懐いている猫たちがいるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Rin takes care of a bunch of cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Rin takes care of a bunch of cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あいつらにもやろうと思うんだけど、かまわないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was thinking of giving them some nori, is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was thinking of giving them some nori, is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…一度直枝さんに差し上げた物ですから、どのように使われようとも直枝さんの自由です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's something I gave to you, how you use it is entirely up to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's something I gave to you, how you use it is entirely up to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「たとえ、直枝さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝For example, if you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝For example, if you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「おはぐろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Paint your teeth black.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Paint your teeth black.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 海苔を前歯に一枚つけていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put a sheet of nori on her front teeth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put a sheet of nori on her front teeth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Or.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Or.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「カラス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A crow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A crow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 海苔をくちばし状にして口に着けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She folded the nori into the shape of a beak and placed it over her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She folded the nori into the shape of a beak and placed it over her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「というように、寒いギャグに使ったとしても、わたしは一向に、構いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So even if you use it for poor attempts at humor, I won't mind in the slightest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So even if you use it for poor attempts at humor, I won't mind in the slightest.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ここは対抗した方がいいんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Am I supposed to respond to that?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Am I supposed to respond to that?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「熱血眉毛」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maniac's eyebrows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maniac's eyebrows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 眉に海苔を当ててみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put nori on my eyebrows.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put nori on my eyebrows.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…食べ物を粗末にしてはいけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You shouldn't play with your food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You shouldn't play with your food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それって、僕が悪いのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Am I in the wrong here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I in the wrong here?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「冗談はさておきまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All joking aside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All joking aside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「猫にあげれば、きっと喜ぶと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you give it to the cats, I'm sure they'll be delighted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you give it to the cats, I'm sure they'll be delighted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…棗さんと猫たちにもよろしくお伝え下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Give my best regards to Natsume-san and the cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Give my best regards to Natsume-san and the cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食べ終わって、手持ちぶさたになる。
MESSAGE.EN: After I'd finished eating, I was getting bored.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I'd finished eating, I was getting bored.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな僕をしり目に、西園さんは本を広げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had cast a number of sidelong glances at Nishizono-san's open book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had cast a number of sidelong glances at Nishizono-san's open book.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は何を読んでるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what are you reading today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what are you reading today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教えてくれないかも、そんな不安に反して、西園さんはすぐに表紙をこちらに向けてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was afraid she wasn't going to tell me, but she immediately showed me the cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was afraid she wasn't going to tell me, but she immediately showed me the cover.

MESSAGE.JP: 『殺人』という文字が目に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: It said ❛Homicide.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It said ❛Homicide.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「推理小説？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A detective novel?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A detective novel?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと意外だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was a little surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was a little surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: もっと如何にも難しそうな本を読んでいると思ったんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I had thought she was reading a more serious book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had thought she was reading a more serious book.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「面白い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it interesting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it interesting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なかなか人が死なないので。ちょっと退屈です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No one has died yet. It's a bit boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No one has died yet. It's a bit boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういうタイミングに限って、他の生徒が通りかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: With impeccable timing, a student just happened to be passing by.
MESSAGE.Translation: With impeccable timing, a student just happened to be passing by.

MESSAGE.JP: 驚いた顔をして、足早に過ぎていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He picked up his pace and hurried away, looking shocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: He picked up his pace and hurried away, looking shocked.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「探偵役が冴えない中年というのも、マイナスですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The detective is an unexperienced middle-aged man, that's a detriment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The detective is an unexperienced middle-aged man, that's a detriment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気にする風もなく話を続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a hint of concern she continued her analysis.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a hint of concern she continued her analysis.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ミステリに必要なのは、美しい謎と魅惑的な登場人物です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A beautiful mystery and fascinating characters are the crux of a mystery novel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A beautiful mystery and fascinating characters are the crux of a mystery novel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「異形の館に集う、怪しげな人々。年老いた当主に、若い後妻。彼女を疎ましく思う子供たち。黒服に身を包む初老の執事。心を閉ざしたメイド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@$S024❝Suspicious people gather in an eerie mansion. An elderly head of the family, his young second wife. His kids who resent her. A middle-aged butler draped in black. A maid who's closed off her heart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@$S024❝Suspicious people gather in an eerie mansion. An elderly head of the family, his young second wife. His kids who resent her. A middle-aged butler draped in black. A maid who's closed off her heart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…幽閉された美しいシャム双子の少女。財産を巡る骨肉の争い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Beautiful twin girls who were confined to the mansion. A struggle for the inheritance amongst the family members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Beautiful twin girls who were confined to the mansion. A struggle for the inheritance amongst the family members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そして起こる第一の惨劇。血に彩られた現場は完全な密室。でも、全員には鉄壁のアリバイがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And then, the first tragedy. A hidden room stained red with blood. An ironclad alibi for everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And then, the first tragedy. A hidden room stained red with blood. An ironclad alibi for everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ひとり、またひとりと殺されていく。逃げ出そうにも、館は嵐に閉ざされてしまう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One by one they're murdered. There's no way to escape, as the mansion is isolated by a storm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One by one they're murdered. There's no way to escape, as the mansion is isolated by a storm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「互いが疑心暗鬼に陥る中、不可能犯罪は続いていく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They begin to suspect one another and everything becomes suspicious to them, as the impossible murders continue...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They begin to suspect one another and everything becomes suspicious to them, as the impossible murders continue...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの流暢な語り口に、僕は聞き惚れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm captivated by her engaging storytelling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm captivated by her engaging storytelling.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなに饒舌に話をする西園さんを初めて見た。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the first time I've ever seen her speak with such enthusiasm.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the first time I've ever seen her speak with such enthusiasm.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もつれた麻を断ちきるべく、個性的な名探偵と彼に従う気弱なワトソン役が現れます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In order to solve the mystery, a private detective and his timid Watson-type assistant appear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In order to solve the mystery, a private detective and his timid Watson-type assistant appear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それ以上の惨劇を食い止めるため、奮迅の活躍を見せる名探偵」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To stop this tragedy from continuing, the detective gets to work right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To stop this tragedy from continuing, the detective gets to work right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「クライマックスは天才的な頭脳と、悪魔的な頭脳の対決シーンで幕を開けます。語られるは意外な真相。驚天動地のトリック」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The story reaches its climax with the decisive confrontation of the ingenious detective and an evil genius. The shocking truth. An unforeseen twist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The story reaches its climax with the decisive confrontation of the ingenious detective and an evil genius. The shocking truth. An unforeseen twist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そして、明らかになる犯人の悲劇的な過去」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And, the tragic past of the perpetrator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And, the tragic past of the perpetrator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「舞台はほろ苦さを残して幕を閉じるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A conclusion that leaves a bitter aftertaste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A conclusion that leaves a bitter aftertaste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これぞ、ミステリの醍醐味です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That is the epitome of mystery novels.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That is the epitome of mystery novels.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その語りはもはや熱弁と呼べる域に達している。
MESSAGE.EN: What a passionate and eloquent monologue.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a passionate and eloquent monologue.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は黙ったまま、話を聞いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I listened to her in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I listened to her in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「特に大切なのはその探偵とワトソンの絡みです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What's especially important is the relationship between the detective and his ❛Watson.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What's especially important is the relationship between the detective and his ❛Watson.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そのワトソン役が作家だと、なお良いですね。彼は名探偵の活躍を筆にしたため、世に送り出しているのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If the one playing the role of the Watson character is a writer, it's even better. He's following the detective everywhere to immortalize his deeds in words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If the one playing the role of the Watson character is a writer, it's even better. He's following the detective everywhere to immortalize his deeds in words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その気弱なワトソンを普段はからかい、時にはバカにしながらも、いざという時には颯爽と駆けつける名探偵」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The detective often teases him and sometimes makes a fool out of him, but in time of need he'd always be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The detective often teases him and sometimes makes a fool out of him, but in time of need he'd always be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「涙で潤むワトソンの目を見て、探偵は言うのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And when he looks into the watery eyes of his ❛Watson,❜ he'll say the following:❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And when he looks into the watery eyes of his ❛Watson,❜ he'll say the following:❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『君はボクがいないと、ほんとにダメだなあ』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛You really are no good without me.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛You really are no good without me.❜❞
