MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんには分かりますか？　この言葉の裏に隠された探偵の深い愛情が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you understand it, Naoe-san? His deep affection concealed behind the words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you understand it, Naoe-san? His deep affection concealed behind the words...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: はたと口をつぐむと、西園さんが僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly became silent and looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly became silent and looked at me.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…というのは、冗談ですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...And, that was a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...And, that was a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じょ、冗談だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, a joke, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, a joke, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの弁の振るい方は、本気みたいだったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: From the way she'd been talking, it seemed like she was dead serious.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the way she'd been talking, it seemed like she was dead serious.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…申し訳ありません。勝手にしゃべり過ぎました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry. I talked too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry. I talked too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことないよ。…西園さんは、本当に本が好きなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not at all... Nishizono-san, you really love books, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not at all... Nishizono-san, you really love books, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あの歌集を読んでいる時の西園さんの姿は『本が好き』というのとは、ちょっと違うように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But when she was reading that poetry collection of hers, it was something more than just a love for books.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when she was reading that poetry collection of hers, it was something more than just a love for books.

MESSAGE.JP: 本ではなく、歌を、言葉を、そしてその先にある何かを、或いは誰かを観ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Not simply the book itself, it was as if she was looking at something, or perhaps, at someone beyond the poem, beyond the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not simply the book itself, it was as if she was looking at something, or perhaps, at someone beyond the poem, beyond the words.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな印象さえ受けた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how it seemed to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how it seemed to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ、僕にも本を貸してくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, could you lend me a book?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, could you lend me a book?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの楽しさを、共有することができたら――。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to share in her joy of reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to share in her joy of reading.

MESSAGE.JP: その気持ちが、形となって僕の口からこぼれ出る。
MESSAGE.EN: So I asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お薦めのミステリーがあれば、教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If there's some mystery novel you can recommend, let me know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If there's some mystery novel you can recommend, let me know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 微笑みを浮かべて、西園さんが頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「先ほどは、ああ言いましたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even though I said it like this a while ago...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even though I said it like this a while ago...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ミステリというジャンルに限っても、その面白さは様々です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There are many interesting variants even within the mystery novel genre.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There are many interesting variants even within the mystery novel genre.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「トリックを重視するばかりがミステリではありません。いわゆる事件がまったく起きなくても、『ミステリ』と呼ばれる作品もあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There aren't just mystery novels that put emphasis on the twist. There are even books considered ❛mystery❜ even though no kind of incidents happen in them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There aren't just mystery novels that put emphasis on the twist. There are even books considered ❛mystery❜ even though no kind of incidents happen in them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「古今東西、千差万別の魅力があります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Each of them has their own charm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Each of them has their own charm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんのお気に召す本があれば良いのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I hope you can find a book you'll enjoy as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I hope you can find a book you'll enjoy as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。本は西園さんに任せるから。なにかお願いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'll leave it to you, so please choose something for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'll leave it to you, so please choose something for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、これをもらったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, look what I've got.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, look what I've got.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「レノンたちにあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Give it to Lennon and the other cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Give it to Lennon and the other cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 海苔の袋を鈴に見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed the bag of nori to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed the bag of nori to Rin.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I can't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I can't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「確かにレノンは海苔が好きだが、塩分が多い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Lennon loves nori, but it's got too much salt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Lennon loves nori, but it's got too much salt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「体によくないから、ダメだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's bad for him, so no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's bad for him, so no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだったんだ。それは残念」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Really? That's too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Really? That's too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「せっかく、西園さんにもらったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And Nishizono-san went out of her way to give it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Nishizono-san went out of her way to give it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮に帰ったら、夜食にするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take it back to the dorm and have it for dinner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take it back to the dorm and have it for dinner.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「少しだったら、いいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A little won't hurt, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A little won't hurt, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きっとレノンも喜ぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm sure Lennon will be happy too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sure Lennon will be happy too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って、右手を差し出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and held out her right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and held out her right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ビニール袋を渡すと、鈴は大切に受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the plastic bag over to Rin, who accepted it as though receiving something valuable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the plastic bag over to Rin, who accepted it as though receiving something valuable.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、真人。僕違うところで食べるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'll be eating somewhere else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'll be eating somewhere else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごく寂しそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked terribly lonely...
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked terribly lonely...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おーけー、こんなことでオレは動揺しないぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, I won't get upset about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, I won't get upset about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どんまい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 独り言をぶつぶつ呟きながら、教室から出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: He murmured to himself as he left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He murmured to himself as he left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は購買でパンをいくつか買うと、昇降口から外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I bought some bread from the school shop and went out of the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bought some bread from the school shop and went out of the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中、見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way I spotted a familiar face.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way I spotted a familiar face.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が声を掛ける間もなく、葉留佳さんは鼻歌交じりに学食の方へ歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could call out to her, she'd already left in the direction of the cafeteria, humming a melody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could call out to her, she'd already left in the direction of the cafeteria, humming a melody.

MESSAGE.JP: 表側に面した明るい中庭と違って、こっちは樹も多く、幾分か薄暗い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was different here from the courtyard that faced the front side, the many trees dimmed the light with their branches, giving a dusky atmosphere.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was different here from the courtyard that faced the front side, the many trees dimmed the light with their branches, giving a dusky atmosphere.

MESSAGE.JP: …正確にはここも中庭なんだろうけど、この学校では裏庭と呼んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Technically, this place was a part of the courtyard, but it was called the backyard in this school.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Technically, this place was a part of the courtyard, but it was called the backyard in this school.

MESSAGE.JP: 道沿いにはいくつかのベンチが設置されていて、ここでお昼を食べる人も見かける。
MESSAGE.EN: There were many benches along the pathway, so there were people eating lunch here as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were many benches along the pathway, so there were people eating lunch here as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（そういえば…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Now that I think of it...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Now that I think of it...)

MESSAGE.JP: 教室で来ヶ谷さんを見かけなかったけど、またあの曰く『ちょっとしたテラス』でお昼でも食べてるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't see Kurugaya-san in the class today, was she eating at what she called ❛a small terrace❜ again?
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't see Kurugaya-san in the class today, was she eating at what she called ❛a small terrace❜ again?

MESSAGE.JP: …ちょっと行ってみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I decided to go take a look there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I decided to go take a look there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ、いない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, not here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, not here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …別のところにいるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess she's somewhere else.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess she's somewhere else.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがいないなら、ここにいてもしょうがないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: If she's not here, there's no reason to stay...
MESSAGE.Translation: If she's not here, there's no reason to stay...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、体育館側の自販機でカップのジュースを買って、教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the vending machine behind the school gym to get some juice, and decided to return to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the vending machine behind the school gym to get some juice, and decided to return to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中の廊下。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way back, in the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way back, in the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あれ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Huh...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Huh...)

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、耳にピアノの旋律が。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly heard the sound of a piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly heard the sound of a piano.

MESSAGE.JP: 音楽室は北校舎の方だし、ここまで音は届かないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The music room was in the northern building, so the sound wouldn't reach all the way here.
MESSAGE.Translation: The music room was in the northern building, so the sound wouldn't reach all the way here.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、どうでもいいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, who cares...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, who cares...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと立ち止まって、その音を辿ってみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped and tried to figure where the sound was coming from.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped and tried to figure where the sound was coming from.

MESSAGE.JP: …ああ、放送のスピーカーからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Oh, it's broadcasting from the speakers.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Oh, it's broadcasting from the speakers.

MESSAGE.JP: 気にも留めなかったけど、お昼の放送で掛かっているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I never paid attention to it, but maybe they actually had broadcasts during lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: I never paid attention to it, but maybe they actually had broadcasts during lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: …ていうか、そんなものがやってるとしたら、今初めて聞いたような気もした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or actually, if they really did, it's the first I've ever heard it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or actually, if they really did, it's the first I've ever heard it.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Fuh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Fuh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いきなり首筋に息を吹きかけられた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I suddenly felt someone's breath on the nape of my neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I suddenly felt someone's breath on the nape of my neck.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、びっくりした…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, you startled me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, you startled me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「やあ少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Howdy, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Howdy, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「突然なんなのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you doing so suddenly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you doing so suddenly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ挨拶代わりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I did that as a greeting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I did that as a greeting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもながら、この人は、登場のたびに何かしないと気が済まないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like she always has to do something every time she appears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like she always has to do something every time she appears.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君はこれからお昼か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you going to have lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you going to have lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「わざわざ中庭のテラスまで足を運ぶくらいだから、私とご一緒したいといったところか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Considering that you went all the way out to the terrace in the courtyard... could it be that you wanted to join me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Considering that you went all the way out to the terrace in the courtyard... could it be that you wanted to join me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何で知ってんだ、そんなこと…。
MESSAGE.EN: How did she know that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How did she know that...?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは。まあ、こっちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. Well, follow me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. Well, follow me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ちょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, wai...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, wai...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはさっさと歩き出してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She began to walk right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began to walk right away.

MESSAGE.JP: …ちょっとこぼれたカップのジュースをハンカチで拭いて、僕もその後を追うことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wiped the juice I'd spilled with a handkerchief and followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wiped the juice I'd spilled with a handkerchief and followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下をずんずんと進んでいく来ヶ谷さんの後ろを歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I was walking behind Kurugaya-san down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was walking behind Kurugaya-san down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、いつもの中庭じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, why aren't you in the courtyard like usual?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, why aren't you in the courtyard like usual?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「中庭は昼休みには行かないな。人も多い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I won't go to the courtyard for lunch. Too many people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I won't go to the courtyard for lunch. Too many people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、どこにいくの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, where are we going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, where are we going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ついてくれば判る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You'll see when we get there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You'll see when we get there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 職員室を通り過ぎ、さらに奥へ。
MESSAGE.EN: We passed by the faculty office and kept on walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: We passed by the faculty office and kept on walking.

MESSAGE.JP: …何があるんだっけ、こっちの方は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Was there even anything all the way down here?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Was there even anything all the way down here?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ここだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We're here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We're here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 重そうな鉄のドアを開け、来ヶ谷さんは中に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened the heavy-looking steel door and stepped inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened the heavy-looking steel door and stepped inside.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアの傍らには『放送室』と書かれたプレートがある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a plate that read ❛Broadcast Room❜ on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a plate that read ❛Broadcast Room❜ on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いいのかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is this okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is this okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いいも何も私が放送委員長だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝How could it be otherwise when I'm the chairman of the broadcasting committee?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝How could it be otherwise when I'm the chairman of the broadcasting committee?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大体昼の放送はほとんど私がやっているものだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, I'm about the only person who does afternoon broadcasts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, I'm about the only person who does afternoon broadcasts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなの？　ごめん、ぜんぜん知らなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is, is that so? Sorry, I didn't know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is, is that so? Sorry, I didn't know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というか、その存在すら知らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or rather I hadn't even known they existed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or rather I hadn't even known they existed.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、まともに聞いているものなど多分いない。その程度の仕事だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I don't think anyone really pays attention to it. It's just something to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I don't think anyone really pays attention to it. It's just something to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そんなことはどうでもいいな。さっさと入るがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝None of this is important. Come on in already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝None of this is important. Come on in already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 放送室の中は薄暗く、なにやら機材のようなものがごちゃごちゃと置いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dim inside, with equipment scattered around.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dim inside, with equipment scattered around.

MESSAGE.JP: ガラス戸の棚の中には、ビデオテープやカセット、僕には良くわからない大きいディスクのようなものもある。
MESSAGE.EN: On a shelf with glass doors there were video tapes, cassettes, and a big disc shaped thing, of which I wasn't sure what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: On a shelf with glass doors there were video tapes, cassettes, and a big disc shaped thing, of which I wasn't sure what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「その辺のは８ミリだな。昔は使われていたらしいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's an 8mm. There was a time when they used it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's an 8mm. There was a time when they used it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちなみにえっちなビデオは持ってこないとない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, there aren't any porn videos.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, there aren't any porn videos.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや初めから期待してないから、そんなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I wasn't really expecting there to be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I wasn't really expecting there to be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…キミの思考は全く読み難い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...It sure is difficult to figure out what's on your mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...It sure is difficult to figure out what's on your mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 窓を開けながら言う。カーテンが開かれると、室内もそれなりに明るくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: She said this while opening the window. As she parted the curtains, it became a bit brighter in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said this while opening the window. As she parted the curtains, it became a bit brighter in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなに複雑な思考してるつもりはないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm trying to think of anything complicated here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm trying to think of anything complicated here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今の状況もわかっているか？　密室に可愛らしい女生徒とふたりっきりだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you understand the situation? You are now alone with a cute girl in a secret room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you understand the situation? You are now alone with a cute girl in a secret room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…言われてみればそうだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... yeah, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... yeah, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どきどきするだろう？　むしろどきどきしているはずだ。ヒャッホウどっきどきで胸キュンだぜと言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't your heart racing? It must be. Say ❛Ya-hoo, my heart is racing and I've got this feeling.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't your heart racing? It must be. Say ❛Ya-hoo, my heart is racing and I've got this feeling.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、言わないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さんはどうなのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What about you, Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What about you, Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さぁ。理樹君がどうもしていないなら、多分私もどうもしていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, if you're not feeling anything, I guess I'm not either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, if you're not feeling anything, I guess I'm not either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…なんかよくわかんないんだけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... I don't really understand you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... I don't really understand you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「世の中には回答の無い謎掛けの方が多いものさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There are many mysteries in this world that have no answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There are many mysteries in this world that have no answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで死ぬわけじゃないし、別に気にしないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well it won't kill me not to know, beyond that I'm not so concerned...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well it won't kill me not to know, beyond that I'm not so concerned...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、キミは死なないよ。心配は要らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, you won't die. Don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, you won't die. Don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、来ヶ谷さんは放送用の機材の前に座ると、手際よくスイッチをいじり始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat in front of the broadcast equipment as she replied, and began operating it with obvious skill.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat in front of the broadcast equipment as she replied, and began operating it with obvious skill.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「掛けておいた曲、とっくに終わってるな…まあいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The songs I was playing ended long ago... Well, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The songs I was playing ended long ago... Well, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなんでいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, is that really okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, is that really okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミのせいで遅れたんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I was late thanks to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I was late thanks to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、罰として曲紹介をしろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, as punishment you'll be announcing the next song.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, as punishment you'll be announcing the next song.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは立ち上がると、マイクを僕に突きつける。
MESSAGE.EN: She got up and pointed the mic at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got up and pointed the mic at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなこと言われても、僕こんなのやったことないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you say that, I've never done that before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you say that, I've never done that before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「簡単だ。このボタンでマイクが繋がる。言い終わったらもう一回押せばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's easy. This button connects the mic. When you've finished talking just press it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's easy. This button connects the mic. When you've finished talking just press it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそういうことじゃなくてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ええいうるさい黙れこのファッキン小僧」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh shut up already, fucking brat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh shut up already, fucking brat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …怖い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She's scary.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She's scary.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これが放送のテンプレートだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This is the broadcast template.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This is the broadcast template.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、今日の一曲目の曲紹介だけだから、そう難しいものでもあるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you'll just have to announce the first song, it's not that difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you'll just have to announce the first song, it's not that difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがデッキにＣＤをセットすると、なにやらクラシックの音楽が流れ出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the CD in the deck, and something that sounded like classic music began to play.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the CD in the deck, and something that sounded like classic music began to play.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうした、早く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? Hurry up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? Hurry up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだテンプレートに目も通していない。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't so much as glanced at the template.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't so much as glanced at the template.

MESSAGE.JP: …『ただいまお送りしている曲は（作曲者）作曲、（曲名）です。』のカッコの部分を埋めて言えばいいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...❛The song currently playing is a (author's name) composition, (song name).❜ Looks like I just fill in the blanks.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛The song currently playing is a (author's name) composition, (song name).❜ Looks like I just fill in the blanks.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに簡単だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks simple enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks simple enough.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほら、これの３曲目」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Look, the third track here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Look, the third track here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ＣＤのケースを渡される。モーツァルトの曲集らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She passed the CD case to me. It looked like a Mozart collection.
MESSAGE.Translation: She passed the CD case to me. It looked like a Mozart collection.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へー、割とまともな曲かけるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, you're playing some pretty serious stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, you're playing some pretty serious stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、じゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed the button.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed the button.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただいまお送りしている曲は、モーツァルト作曲…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The song currently playing is from a Mozart collection...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The song currently playing is from a Mozart collection...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …思わず吹き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I blurted out involuntarily.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I blurted out involuntarily.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お…『俺の尻を舐めろ』です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Leh... ❛Lick Me in the Ass❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Leh... ❛Lick Me in the Ass❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんて曲書いてんだモーツァルト…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just what kind of songs was Mozart writing...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what kind of songs was Mozart writing...?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、いや実にいいアナウンスだった。おねーさん大満足だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, that was a great announcement. Onee-san is fully satisfied.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, that was a great announcement. Onee-san is fully satisfied.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …この人もむちゃくちゃ晴れやかな笑顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was laughing cheerfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was laughing cheerfully.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕に言わせたかっただけでしょ、この曲選んだの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You picked this song on purpose just to make me say that, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You picked this song on purpose just to make me say that, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何を言う。一ヶ月前にすでに決めてあったのだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What are you saying? It was already decided last month.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What are you saying? It was already decided last month.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほら、と予定表を見せられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She showed me the schedule.
MESSAGE.Translation: She showed me the schedule.

MESSAGE.JP: この人の場合、ここまで予測して立ててんじゃないか、という気すらしてくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: In her case, even planning it that far ahead wasn't out of the question...
MESSAGE.Translation: In her case, even planning it that far ahead wasn't out of the question...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今日は一曲削らないとダメだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We'll have to broadcast one song less today, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We'll have to broadcast one song less today, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ベートーベンの『無くした小銭に対する怒り』を止めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh well, no Beethoven's ❛Rage over a Lost Penny❜ today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh well, no Beethoven's ❛Rage over a Lost Penny❜ today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しょぼいなベートーベン…。
MESSAGE.EN: What a cheapskate, that Beethoven...
MESSAGE.Translation: What a cheapskate, that Beethoven...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、選曲は来ヶ谷さんの自由だけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you're free to choose whatever songs you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you're free to choose whatever songs you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、そんな変な曲ばっかり掛けてるってことか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or actually, does this mean she's always only broadcasting strange songs like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or actually, does this mean she's always only broadcasting strange songs like this?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「気にするな。どうせ誰も聞いちゃいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't worry. Nobody listens to it anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't worry. Nobody listens to it anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「別に音量最大にして、全校生徒どころか近隣の方々にまで強制的に聴かせることも出来るがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Unless I turned up the volume, in which case not only students but even people in the neighborhood would be forced to listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Unless I turned up the volume, in which case not only students but even people in the neighborhood would be forced to listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…自己満足を他人に押し付けても愉快ではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...But forcing others to do something for my own satisfaction wouldn't make me happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...But forcing others to do something for my own satisfaction wouldn't make me happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、よく押し付けられてる気がするんですけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, I'm pretty sure I'm being forced right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, I'm pretty sure I'm being forced right now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自己満足って言っても、これ委員会の仕事でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your own satisfaction aside, isn't this a duty of yours as a school committee member?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your own satisfaction aside, isn't this a duty of yours as a school committee member?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、昼の放送など仕事にはない。完全に趣味だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, the afternoon broadcast isn't my duty. It's only a hobby.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, the afternoon broadcast isn't my duty. It's only a hobby.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「趣味といえば…ここにはこんなものもある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Speaking of hobbies... I have this thing here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Speaking of hobbies... I have this thing here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは立ち上がると、何かに掛けてあった布を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She got to her feet and removed a cloth that was covering something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got to her feet and removed a cloth that was covering something.

MESSAGE.JP: …白と黒の鍵盤。ピアノみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a white and black keyboard. Similar to a piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a white and black keyboard. Similar to a piano.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「電子ピアノだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Electric piano.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Electric piano.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「存在自体が謎過ぎて、怪談の種にもなっていたりする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's not on the level of mere mystery, it's already transformed into something of a ghost story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's not on the level of mere mystery, it's already transformed into something of a ghost story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「コンセントが外れていても、夜な夜なひとりでに曲を弾き出すらしいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Rumor has it that even unplugged it still plays songs on its own during the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Rumor has it that even unplugged it still plays songs on its own during the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、ベタだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... That's pretty corny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... That's pretty corny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君はピアノを弾けたりしないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Can you play piano, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Can you play piano, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、全然。楽器は何も出来ないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, not a bit. I can't play any instruments.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, not a bit. I can't play any instruments.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか、残念だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …心底残念そうにする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seemed thoroughly disappointed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seemed thoroughly disappointed.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、音でも聞いてみるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, will you listen to me play?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, will you listen to me play?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 電源を入れると、その前に腰を落ち着ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned it on and sat before it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned it on and sat before it.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、静かに音を奏で始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: And began playing softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: And began playing softly.

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず聞き惚れてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was instinctively captivated by the sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was instinctively captivated by the sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 聞きながら、どこかで聴いたことがあるような、初めて聴くような奇妙な感覚を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I got the strangest feeling from it, like I couldn't tell whether I was listening to it for the first time or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got the strangest feeling from it, like I couldn't tell whether I was listening to it for the first time or not.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、無意識のうちに、手元のマイクのボタンを押してしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I unconsciously pressed the button on the mic.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I unconsciously pressed the button on the mic.

MESSAGE.JP: …意図があったわけじゃなかったけど、なんだか…この学校のみんなに聴かせてもいいような、むしろ聴いて欲しいような。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't have any particular reason, but... I must've felt that it wouldn't be so bad for the entire school to hear it... or rather, I wanted them to.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't have any particular reason, but... I must've felt that it wouldn't be so bad for the entire school to hear it... or rather, I wanted them to.

MESSAGE.JP: 演奏が終わる。
MESSAGE.EN: The song came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The song came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…こんなところだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...That's about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...That's about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ところで理樹君、スイッチを切ってもらえるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, Riki-kun, why don't you turn off the switch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, Riki-kun, why don't you turn off the switch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは僕のほうに歩み寄ると、手元のマイクのボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked over to me and pressed the button on the mic I was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked over to me and pressed the button on the mic I was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ピアノの演奏を流すなら、アンプにつないであるからそっちのラインを開けばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you wanted to broadcast that piano song, you would've only had to plug its cord into the PA system.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you wanted to broadcast that piano song, you would've only had to plug its cord into the PA system.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「全く、ろくでもないことを思い付くなキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Honestly, what silly ideas you come up with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Honestly, what silly ideas you come up with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑いながら言われる。
MESSAGE.EN: She said while laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said while laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…いい曲だったからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... It was a good song.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... It was a good song.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか、いい曲か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Really? It was good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Really? It was good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはマイクのスイッチを入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She switched on the mic.
MESSAGE.Translation: She switched on the mic.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ただいまお送りした曲は作曲者不明、直枝理樹に捧げる綺想曲です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The song's author is unknown, the composition is dedicated to Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The song's author is unknown, the composition is dedicated to Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと人名出さないでよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He, hey, don't mention my name!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He, hey, don't mention my name!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私が作った曲だからな。今タイトルをつけた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's a song I composed. And I just gave it a title.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's a song I composed. And I just gave it a title.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっちこそホントにろくでもないことするじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that's what I'd call a silly idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that's what I'd call a silly idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、気にするな。どうせ誰も聞いてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, don't worry. Nobody was listening anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, don't worry. Nobody was listening anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …聞いてないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Did nobody really listen?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Did nobody really listen?

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、来ヶ谷さんが放送なんてやってたことすら、僕は知らなかったし。
MESSAGE.EN: It's true that I had no idea that she was doing these broadcasts in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's true that I had no idea that she was doing these broadcasts in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: いやでも、それは…。
MESSAGE.EN: But that's...
MESSAGE.Translation: But that's...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん、放送のときだけ普通にしゃべるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, do you only talk in a normal fashion like this during the broadcasts?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, do you only talk in a normal fashion like this during the broadcasts?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや？　常体からして至極普通だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, I'm talking the way I always do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, I'm talking the way I always do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: この口調じゃないから、という問題もあると思う。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason I questioned her was because it was rare to hear her speaking like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason I questioned her was because it was rare to hear her speaking like this.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな感じで雑談をしつつ、時間は過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We passed the time by chatting in this manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: We passed the time by chatting in this manner.

MESSAGE.JP: ５時間目開始の５分前、チャイムが鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then the bell signaling there was five minutes until fifth period rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then the bell signaling there was five minutes until fifth period rang.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、今日はここまでだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's all for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's all for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはマイクのスイッチを入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned on the mic.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned on the mic.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「本日のお昼の放送を終了します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Today's afternoon broadcast is over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Today's afternoon broadcast is over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …割とそっけない終わり方。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That was a rather abrupt way to end it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That was a rather abrupt way to end it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「思うんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know what I think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know what I think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、地でそのまま放送やったほうが面白いんじゃないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, wouldn't it be more fun if you acted more like your usual self during the broadcasts?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, wouldn't it be more fun if you acted more like your usual self during the broadcasts?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「面白い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、普通のラジオみたいに軽いトークとかも混ぜてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you could lighten things up a bit like they do on normal radio shows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you could lighten things up a bit like they do on normal radio shows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まあ、確かにそのほうが聴く人間は増えるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, that could certainly increase the number of listeners.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, that could certainly increase the number of listeners.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だがこれは、ある種聴かせるための放送ではないのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But the reason for the broadcast isn't to get people to listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But the reason for the broadcast isn't to get people to listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …聴かせる以外に放送をする意味ってあるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is there any other meaning in a broadcast other than for people to listen to it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is there any other meaning in a broadcast other than for people to listen to it?

MESSAGE.JP: そう言う来ヶ谷さんは表情も変わらず、機材のスイッチをひとつ落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san's expression didn't change as she hit one of the switches.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san's expression didn't change as she hit one of the switches.

MESSAGE.JP: 電源の落とされた機材から、ひゅん、という音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The device let out a sound when she unplugged its power supply.
MESSAGE.Translation: The device let out a sound when she unplugged its power supply.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あまり自分語りをするのは得意じゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And I'm not good at talking on my own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And I'm not good at talking on my own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうわけだ。終了の作業があるから理樹君は先に戻るがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, there you have it. There's a few things I need to do after the broadcast, so you go on ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, there you have it. There's a few things I need to do after the broadcast, so you go on ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、待ってるよ。すぐ終わるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'll wait. You'll be done pretty quickly, won't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'll wait. You'll be done pretty quickly, won't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まあ、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に戻る廊下の途中。
MESSAGE.EN: As we were returning to the classroom via the corridor...
MESSAGE.Translation: As we were returning to the classroom via the corridor...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あぁ、すまんやっぱり先にいってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Aah sorry, you should go on ahead after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Aah sorry, you should go on ahead after all.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちょいとお花を摘みにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I need to pick some flowers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I need to pick some flowers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …トイレか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Toilet, huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Toilet, huh?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、じゃあ教室でね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I'll see you in class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I'll see you in class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: Ｔ字路で別れると同時に、五時間目開始のチャイムが鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: We separated at a ❛T❜-shaped intersection and at the same time the bell rang for fifth period.
MESSAGE.Translation: We separated at a ❛T❜-shaped intersection and at the same time the bell rang for fifth period.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は早足で教室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurried back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurried back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室にはもう自分と来ヶ谷さん以外の人が揃っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like other than me and Kurugaya-san, everybody else was already back in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like other than me and Kurugaya-san, everybody else was already back in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか変な視線を感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel the strange stares directed at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel the strange stares directed at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう理樹、どこ行ってたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, where'd you go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, where'd you go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ちょっと放送をね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I was helping a bit with the broadcast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I was helping a bit with the broadcast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「放送？　放送ってなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Broadcast? What broadcast?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Broadcast? What broadcast?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、お昼に流れてるでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, the one they do during the lunch break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, the one they do during the lunch break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はぁ？　そんなもんやってたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Was there such a thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Was there such a thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…やってるらしいんだけどね、ずっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Seems there was. All this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Seems there was. All this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …本当に誰も聴いていないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It could be that nobody had been listening to it after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It could be that nobody had been listening to it after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 行くには行きたいのだけど…
MESSAGE.EN: I really wanted to go...
MESSAGE.Translation: I really wanted to go...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそこで彼女が待ってくれているかもしれないと…期待している。
MESSAGE.EN: I was hoping that maybe... she would be there waiting for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was hoping that maybe... she would be there waiting for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が真人と連れだって行ったら、彼女はそれに気づいた時点で、いなくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: If I took Masato with me, she might disappear when she noticed.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I took Masato with me, she might disappear when she noticed.

MESSAGE.JP: これはもう、間違いない。彼女の立場なら。
MESSAGE.EN: Knowing her, she definitely would.
MESSAGE.Translation: Knowing her, she definitely would.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、真人っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え、おい、理樹！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, hey, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, hey, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はダッシュで逃げるのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I dashed away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dashed away.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ、おまえ走ってきて。新商品でもあったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you running? Is there a new item on sale?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you running? Is there a new item on sale?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が入り口で待ちかまえていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was lying in wait at the entrance!
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was lying in wait at the entrance!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、久々にカツサンド食べたいかなって…競争率高いから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I've got the urge to eat a cutlet sandwich... and the competition is fierce.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I've got the urge to eat a cutlet sandwich... and the competition is fierce.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、そう焦るな。今日はいいものがある。みんなが来るまで待ってやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Relax. I've got something good today. Just wait till everyone's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Relax. I've got something good today. Just wait till everyone's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の姿を探す。見つかるわけない。恭介なんかと居たら、決定的だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked for her, but there was no way I'd find her. It was obvious since Kyousuke was there...
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked for her, but there was no way I'd find her. It was obvious since Kyousuke was there...

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの面子がテーブルに揃う。
MESSAGE.EN: The usual members were at the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: The usual members were at the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうした、おまえ、ショックなことでもあったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? What are you so shocked about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? What are you so shocked about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さっき、逃げやがったんだぜ。友情様を侮辱しやがって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He ran away earlier. He's trampling on our friendship.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He ran away earlier. He's trampling on our friendship.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあまあ、こいつで機嫌を直せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well now, let's put him back in a good mood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well now, let's put him back in a good mood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、学食にいこう、真人！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go, Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go, Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おっ、ノリノリだな、理樹っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, aren't you lively, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, aren't you lively, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ファイトー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fight-oh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fight-oh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ひゃっぱーーーつ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A hundred times!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A hundred times!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「百発もファイトしたら、疲れて死んじゃうよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you fight a hundred times you'll die of exhaustion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you fight a hundred times you'll die of exhaustion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おおっ、ツッコミも冴え渡ってるな、すごいぜ、理樹さんよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ooh, you even had a calm comeback ready, you're awesome, Riki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ooh, you even had a calm comeback ready, you're awesome, Riki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 騒ぎながら、学食へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: We went to the cafeteria making lots of noise along the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went to the cafeteria making lots of noise along the way.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、聞け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, listen up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, listen up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはなぜか何もない、テーブルの席についている。
MESSAGE.EN: We sat down around the table, which was empty for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: We sat down around the table, which was empty for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日は、このようなものがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Today we've got this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Today we've got this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が差し出すは、何かの券だった。
MESSAGE.EN: What he held out looked like a ticket.
MESSAGE.Translation: What he held out looked like a ticket.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確認するために、それを手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took it from him to see what it was about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it from him to see what it was about.

MESSAGE.JP: 『パン購入五百円分』と書かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Coupon for 500 yen Bread,❜ it read.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Coupon for 500 yen Bread,❜ it read.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「購買部のパン購入の券をもらったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I got this coupon from the store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I got this coupon from the store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo answered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「購買部が発行してるクーポンか。…もらった、って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The store's coupon, huh... How'd you get it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The store's coupon, huh... How'd you get it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「購買ワゴンを通りかかったら三年が二年を押しのけていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝When I was passing by the store cart, there were third years pushing away second years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝When I was passing by the store cart, there were third years pushing away second years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かにそういう三年生は時々いる。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, there sometimes are third years like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, there sometimes are third years like that.

MESSAGE.JP: ワゴンも基本的には争奪戦なのだが上級生が混じって居ると気後れする生徒も多い。
MESSAGE.EN: Getting to the store cart always involves some competition, so when there are upperclassmen mixed in as well, some students feel intimidated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Getting to the store cart always involves some competition, so when there are upperclassmen mixed in as well, some students feel intimidated.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そいつらをひっぺがしてたりしてたことが数回あったんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It wasn't just one time that I had to drive them away though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It wasn't just one time that I had to drive them away though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん三年生を排除したあと、謙吾は何も言わず立ち去ったりしているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, after dealing with the third years he would probably just leave without saying anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, after dealing with the third years he would probably just leave without saying anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が部活の後輩以外にも慕われているのは、こういった行動のせいなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: That might've been one reason why Kengo wasn't only respected by his club's underclassmen, but the other students as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: That might've been one reason why Kengo wasn't only respected by his club's underclassmen, but the other students as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「購買部のおばさんにもらった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So I got it from the old lady tending the store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So I got it from the old lady tending the store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど…委員会とかで使われる、とは聞いたけど見るのは初めてだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... I heard that members of the student council were using these, but this is the first time I've seen one with my own eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... I heard that members of the student council were using these, but this is the first time I've seen one with my own eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「で、まあ、ひとりでパンを食うのもなんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So, eating bread by myself didn't sound very exciting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So, eating bread by myself didn't sound very exciting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ひとり一個選べば、大体５００円ぐらいだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If one picks them for everyone, they just cost 500 yen each, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If one picks them for everyone, they just cost 500 yen each, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日の昼飯のお供に一品お好きなのをどうぞ、という謙吾っちの粋なはからいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, Kengo-chi is kindly allowing us to choose our favorite one for lunch today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, Kengo-chi is kindly allowing us to choose our favorite one for lunch today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だが、すでにその購買ワゴンは、人だかりで割ってはいる余地なしなんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But the bread cart is already crowded, you can't even get near it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But the bread cart is already crowded, you can't even get near it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たち、野郎じゃな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Not guys like us, at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Not guys like us, at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が恭介の思惑に気づき、身構える。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin realized what Kyousuke was planning and struck a defensive stance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin realized what Kyousuke was planning and struck a defensive stance.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしは弟だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm your brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm your brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どこがだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What part of you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What part of you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほら、これ装着して潜入開始だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Here, put this on and begin your infiltration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Here, put this on and begin your infiltration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの無線機を手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed her the usual hands-free set.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed her the usual hands-free set.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちの指示通りに取ってくればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You just need to pick one whenever we tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You just need to pick one whenever we tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どんなパンになってもしらないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I won't know what bread I'm going to get.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I won't know what bread I'm going to get.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ…ミッションスタート!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So... Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So... Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『潜入成功』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Infiltration success.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Infiltration success.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『そのあたりっぽい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm about in position.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm about in position.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰からいく…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who'll start...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who'll start...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレからいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll be first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll be first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …タイミングを見計らう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was waiting for the right moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was waiting for the right moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鈴、今だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin, now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin, now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: She thrust out her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thrust out her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マジかよ、いやっほーーーぅ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously? Yahooooo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously? Yahooooo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いきなり大当たりだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You suddenly hit it big.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You suddenly hit it big.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちょっと待てぇ！　加工前じゃねぇかっ…そんなもの売ってるのかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hold on! Doesn't this say ❛unbaked❜...? Are they really selling this stuff?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hold on! Doesn't this say ❛unbaked❜...? Are they really selling this stuff?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「食えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Eat it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Eat it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「食うけどさ…一斤ってむしろメインじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I will, but... wouldn't a whole loaf be a main dish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I will, but... wouldn't a whole loaf be a main dish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who's next?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who's next?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、俺がいこうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, that'll be me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, that'll be me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふ…狙い通りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ha... just what I was aiming for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ha... just what I was aiming for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「偶然だろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a coincidence...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a coincidence...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあな。でも、いやっほーーーぅ！だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Perhaps. But, yahoooooo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Perhaps. But, yahoooooo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「んなもの売ってたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What the heck, do they really sell this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What the heck, do they really sell this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「飲めよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Drink it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Drink it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、望むところだ。乳酸菌だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sure, I couldn't ask for better. It's lactic acid bacteria, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sure, I couldn't ask for better. It's lactic acid bacteria, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「う…そこを強調されると、ちょっと悔しいぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ugh... When you stress that out, it's kinda annoying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ugh... When you stress that out, it's kinda annoying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どーでもいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Who cares.
MESSAGE.Translation: Who cares.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「次は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Next?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Next?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と謙吾は目を合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: We exchanged glances with Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: We exchanged glances with Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、僕が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …機を計る（ってなにを…）。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was waiting for the right moment (wait, what the heck am I doing...).
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was waiting for the right moment (wait, what the heck am I doing...).

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、今だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まじかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Seriously...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Seriously...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すごい精度じゃねぇか、鈴の奴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That Rin's got some incredible accuracy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That Rin's got some incredible accuracy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これで、俺までカツサンドだった日にはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Now what will happen if I get a cutlet sandwich too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Now what will happen if I get a cutlet sandwich too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日をカツサンドの日と制定し、カツサンドダンスを踊ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's establish today as cutlet sandwich day and do the cutlet sandwich dance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's establish today as cutlet sandwich day and do the cutlet sandwich dance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、そりゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、万分の一の確率もあるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, there's not even a one in a million chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, there's not even a one in a million chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「では参ろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well then, here I go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well then, here I go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すげぇっ、大当たりじゃねぇか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Awesome, isn't that a jackpot!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Awesome, isn't that a jackpot!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんでそんなものが売ってるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh, were they selling something like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh, were they selling something like this...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…昼から肉なんていいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Isn't it great getting to eat meat for lunch...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Isn't it great getting to eat meat for lunch...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁぁぁ、わけがわからない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaah, what the heck!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaah, what the heck!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいじゃねぇか、これからは実りに恵まれて、食いっぱぐれなしだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't it okay? Just wait until the crop ripens, and you won't be missing out on lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't it okay? Just wait until the crop ripens, and you won't be missing out on lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「実る前に、何も育ててないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm going to be growing anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm going to be growing anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ、最後は俺か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So, I'm the only one left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So, I'm the only one left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「見えた！　今だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can see it! Now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can see it! Now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `三人@「きたああぁぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `All Three@❝Yes!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `All Three@❝Yes!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「待て待て、逆に恐いぜ…この後、オレたちに不幸が訪れるんじゃないだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait, wait, shouldn't we be scared...? This is probably going to bring us a lot of bad luck...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait, wait, shouldn't we be scared...? This is probably going to bring us a lot of bad luck...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふっ、そんなことはないさ。素直にこの奇跡を喜ぼう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Heh, that's not true. We should rejoice in this miracle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Heh, that's not true. We should rejoice in this miracle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そして、カツサンドダンスだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And do the cutlet sandwich dance!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And do the cutlet sandwich dance!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だから、なんなんだよ、それ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously, what are you talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously, what are you talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえら、いいな、頭に載せたカツサンドを決して落とすな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, guys? Be careful so that the cutlet sandwiches don't fall from your heads.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, guys? Be careful so that the cutlet sandwiches don't fall from your heads.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえ、あほだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは、カツサンドを頭に載せ、食堂の中を踊りながら練り歩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: We put cutlet sandwiches on our heads and paraded around the cafeteria dancing.
MESSAGE.Translation: We put cutlet sandwiches on our heads and paraded around the cafeteria dancing.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな中、僕は思うのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: While we were dancing, it struck me.
MESSAGE.Translation: While we were dancing, it struck me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴ひとりにこんなことができるわけない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way Rin could do something like this alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way Rin could do something like this alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かが、鈴にカツサンドを意図的に掴ませたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone intentionally made Rin grab only cutlet sandwiches.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone intentionally made Rin grab only cutlet sandwiches.

MESSAGE.JP: そうなれば、仕掛け人はひとりしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: It could only have been her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It could only have been her.

MESSAGE.JP: でも不思議に思う。
MESSAGE.EN: But something's not quite right about this.
MESSAGE.Translation: But something's not quite right about this.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ彼女がそんなことをしたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why would she do something like that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would she do something like that?

MESSAGE.JP: 訓練のひとつと言われれば、そう納得もできるが…。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppose it could have just been some kind of training...
MESSAGE.Translation: I suppose it could have just been some kind of training...

MESSAGE.JP: 面識のない僕の幼なじみに、こんな不自然な『プレゼント』をするなんて。
MESSAGE.EN: But she was giving these ❛presents❜ to a childhood friend of mine in such an unnatural way even though they don't even know each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she was giving these ❛presents❜ to a childhood friend of mine in such an unnatural way even though they don't even know each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 暇つぶしみたいなものだったのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is this her way of killing time...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is this her way of killing time...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあぁぁ、戻して、戻して！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaaah, put it back, put it back!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaaah, put it back, put it back!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、何が見えたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What exactly have you seen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What exactly have you seen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『これがあったら、もっと買えそうだぞ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Can't we buy even more with this?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Can't we buy even more with this?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「犯罪だから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a crime!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a crime!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ、先にいかせてもらおう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, let me go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, let me go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「見えた！　今だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can see it! Now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can see it! Now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「きた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She got it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She got it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まじかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Seriously...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Seriously...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すごい精度じゃねぇか、鈴の奴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That Rin's got some incredible accuracy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That Rin's got some incredible accuracy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これで、理樹までカツサンドだった日にはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Now what will happen if Riki gets a cutlet sandwich too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Now what will happen if Riki gets a cutlet sandwich too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日をカツサンドの日と制定し、カツサンドダンスを踊ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's establish today as cutlet sandwich day and do the cutlet sandwich dance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's establish today as cutlet sandwich day and do the cutlet sandwich dance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、そりゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、万分の一の確率もあるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, there's not even a one in a million chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, there's not even a one in a million chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹…いけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki... go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki... go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、花畑でも見えたのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did you see a flower garden or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did you see a flower garden or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「可哀想だから逃がしてあげてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for it? Let it go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for it? Let it go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『わかった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got it.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、最後は僕だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'm the only one left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'm the only one left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …機を計る（ってなにを…）。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was waiting for the right moment (wait, what the heck am I doing...).
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was waiting for the right moment (wait, what the heck am I doing...).

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、今だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『何か手に入れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I got something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I got something.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すげぇっ、大当たりじゃねぇか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Awesome, isn't that a jackpot!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Awesome, isn't that a jackpot!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もうどんな形で鈴が今それを持ってるのかも想像つかないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't imagine how she's going to bring it here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't imagine how she's going to bring it here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…昼から$K36伊勢エビ$K0なんていいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Isn't it great, getting to eat $K36Ise shrimp$K0 for lunch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Isn't it great, getting to eat $K36Ise shrimp$K0 for lunch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁぁぁ、わけがわからない！　飲み物繋がりだったらなんでもありなのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wooaah, what the heck is that!? Just because it's liquid doesn't make it drinkable!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wooaah, what the heck is that!? Just because it's liquid doesn't make it drinkable!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「飲んだらいいじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why don't you just drink it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why don't you just drink it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「検査するでもなし嫌だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to, we're not conducting an experiment here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to, we're not conducting an experiment here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹だけ鈴のポテンシャルを引き出せたようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki is the only one who could bring forth Rin's true potential.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki is the only one who could bring forth Rin's true potential.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ロクな成果が上がらなかったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There weren't any fruitful results...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There weren't any fruitful results...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いまいち鈴のポテンシャルを引き出せなかったようだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Seems like this time we couldn't bring forth Rin's potential...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Seems like this time we couldn't bring forth Rin's potential...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鈴、おまえ、今、なに隠したっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin, what did you hide just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin, what did you hide just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が目ざとく何かを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato noticed something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato noticed something.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつ、なんかひとりだけいいもの取ってきやがったんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That Rin, she got something good only for herself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That Rin, she got something good only for herself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、僕のも相当いいものだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, mine isn't bad either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, mine isn't bad either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらのはそれだっ、これはあたしのだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You have yours, this is mine!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You have yours, this is mine!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鈴が背中に隠したもの（ここからは丸見えだ）を、覗き見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a glance at what Rin was hiding behind her back (from this angle, I had a clear view of it).
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a glance at what Rin was hiding behind her back (from this angle, I had a clear view of it).

MESSAGE.JP: カップゼリーの袋詰めだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a bag of cup jelly...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a bag of cup jelly...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、手伝ってくれよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, help me out here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, help me out here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が食パンを押し付けてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato presented me his loaf of bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato presented me his loaf of bread.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何もつけないで？　きついなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't have anything to put on it? That's a bit hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't have anything to put on it? That's a bit hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながらも、あまりに辛そうだったので手伝ってあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I said this, he looked so pained that I decided to give him a hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I said this, he looked so pained that I decided to give him a hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ヘイ、ガイズ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んぐっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nguh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nguh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どん、と背中を叩かれて僕はむせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I choked when something suddenly hit me on the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I choked when something suddenly hit me on the back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「けほ、けほっ…は、葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cough, cough... Ha, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cough, cough... Ha, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おー、今日はパンですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, it's bread today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, it's bread today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん、まぁね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah, kinda.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah, kinda.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が少し顔をしかめている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo knitted his brows slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo knitted his brows slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんのことは『騒々しい女』とか言ってるし、あまり関わりたくないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: He was always calling Haruka-san ❛the noisy girl,❜ and didn't seem to want anything to do with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was always calling Haruka-san ❛the noisy girl,❜ and didn't seem to want anything to do with her.

MESSAGE.JP: が、何も言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, he didn't say a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, he didn't say a word.

MESSAGE.JP: 余程のことがない限りは、謙吾は僕の交友関係に口は挟まない。
MESSAGE.EN: So long as they didn't do something too outrageous, he was quite tolerant of my friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: So long as they didn't do something too outrageous, he was quite tolerant of my friends.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけで、おはようサンフランシスコ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So with that, good morning San Francisco!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So with that, good morning San Francisco!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もう昼だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's afternoon already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's afternoon already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ、こにちはー、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, good afternoon, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, good afternoon, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「真人くん、謙吾くん、棗兄妹も、こにちはー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Masato-kun, Kengo-kun, Natsume siblings, good afternoon to you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Masato-kun, Kengo-kun, Natsume siblings, good afternoon to you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはいつものように陽気に挨拶をした。
MESSAGE.EN: She greeted everyone as cheerfully as ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: She greeted everyone as cheerfully as ever.

MESSAGE.JP: ひらひら、と左手を振りながら言うのでやたら軽薄そうに聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: The way she was waving her left hand while speaking made her greeting seem completely superficial.
MESSAGE.Translation: The way she was waving her left hand while speaking made her greeting seem completely superficial.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありゃ、真人くん面白いもの食べてるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh, you seem to be eating something interesting, Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh, you seem to be eating something interesting, Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえも手伝うか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about helping me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about helping me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいけど、食べていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sure, but is it okay if I eat it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sure, but is it okay if I eat it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まぁ、手伝ってあげてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it'll just help him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it'll just help him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もさっきから少しずつ食べているのだけれどちっとも減らない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was eating the bread as well since a while ago, but it didn't seem to have shrunk at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was eating the bread as well since a while ago, but it didn't seem to have shrunk at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、椅子借りますねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, I'm gonna borrow this chair～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, I'm gonna borrow this chair～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは近くの席の女子に声を掛けて椅子を引っ張ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She told a girl sitting nearby, and pulled the chair next to her over to our table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told a girl sitting nearby, and pulled the chair next to her over to our table.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「真人くん、ダメだよ、パンの耳を食べるコツはねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Masato-kun, this is no good, the way you eat bread crust is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Masato-kun, this is no good, the way you eat bread crust is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こうあえて耳の部分からぱくっ、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You put it together like this, and then ❛Bang!❜ you get to the crust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You put it together like this, and then ❛Bang!❜ you get to the crust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それから牛乳を飲むとプリンみたいに感じられるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you drink milk right after, it'll feel as if you're eating pudding～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you drink milk right after, it'll feel as if you're eating pudding～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マジかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マジマジ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Seriously, seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Seriously, seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んぐんぐ……ごくごく……んぐんぐっ……ごくごくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝*Munch*munch*... *gulp*gulp*... *munch*munch... *gulp*gulp*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝*Munch*munch*... *gulp*gulp*... *munch*munch... *gulp*gulp*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うんうん。プリンプリン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, yep. It's pudding, pudding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, yep. It's pudding, pudding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あれ、ほんとだ…こいつは…プリンだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, that's true... It's... pudding...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, that's true... It's... pudding...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うそつけ。アホだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You liar, that's stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You liar, that's stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「騙されてるぞ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You've been had.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You've been had.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりがツッコミをいれた。
MESSAGE.EN: They butted in.
MESSAGE.Translation: They butted in.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、オレの純粋さに付け込みやがってぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You little... Are you taking advantage of my innocence...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You little... Are you taking advantage of my innocence...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えへ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えへ、じゃねぇよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't ❛ehe❜ me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't ❛ehe❜ me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「認識が大事大事。いーですか、これはパンの耳ではないと思い込むのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Awareness is important, important. Listen well, imagine that it's not bread crust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Awareness is important, important. Listen well, imagine that it's not bread crust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうするとほら、ちょっと違ってきますヨー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And when you do so, see, it starts feeling slightly different.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And when you do so, see, it starts feeling slightly different.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どう違ってくるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How exactly different?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How exactly different?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「思い込む対象によるかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Depending on what you imagine it to be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Depending on what you imagine it to be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、カツサンド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, a cutlet sandwich.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, a cutlet sandwich.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「カツサンドになれーなれーなれー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Become a cutlet sandwich, become a cutlet sandwich～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Become a cutlet sandwich, become a cutlet sandwich～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはどこからかハンカチを取り出すと、ひらひらと真人の目の前で振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a handkerchief from somewhere and was waving it before Masato's eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a handkerchief from somewhere and was waving it before Masato's eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒白縞々のハンカチだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a black-and-white striped handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a black-and-white striped handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…はい、なりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Here, it's done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Here, it's done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マジか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マジマジ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Seriously, seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Seriously, seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あれ、ほんとだ…こいつは…カツの味だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, it's true... It... tastes like cutlet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, it's true... It... tastes like cutlet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うそつけ。アホだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You liar, that's stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You liar, that's stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえ立て続けに騙されてるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're being fooled over and over again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're being fooled over and over again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、またオレをコケにしやがって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why you... are you trying to make a fool out of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why you... are you trying to make a fool out of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞
