MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはそうと、何の用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Putting that aside, did you come here for a reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Putting that aside, did you come here for a reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もふもふ、とパンの耳を口にしている葉留佳さんに僕は尋ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked Haruka-san as she was munching on some bread crust.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked Haruka-san as she was munching on some bread crust.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んぐ、あー、そうだったそうだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ngu, aah, that's right, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ngu, aah, that's right, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「忘れるところだった。真人くん、からかうのが面白かったから、つい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I almost forgot. It was too much fun teasing Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I almost forgot. It was too much fun teasing Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ男だったら、爆死してるところだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you were a guy, you could die in a bomb explosion for that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you were a guy, you could die in a bomb explosion for that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は人を爆発させられるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Would he really kill someone with a bomb...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would he really kill someone with a bomb...?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ベルマーク、貰おうかなーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was thinking of taking bell marks from you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was thinking of taking bell marks from you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそう目的を話した。
MESSAGE.EN: She told us her purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told us her purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ベルマーク？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bell marks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bell marks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、購買部の紙パック牛乳とか、パンのシールについてるじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Like, they're stuck to milk and bread packages, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Like, they're stuck to milk and bread packages, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ベルマーク。ちょっと集めてるから貰おうかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bell marks. I'm collecting them at the moment, so I thought of taking them from you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bell marks. I'm collecting them at the moment, so I thought of taking them from you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいけど、なんでまた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, but why are you doing that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, but why are you doing that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いきなりブームが訪れたのだ！　…のかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's become a huge hit all of a sudden! ...Maybe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's become a huge hit all of a sudden! ...Maybe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで疑問形？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you asking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you asking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほらほら、ベル袋」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Look, a bell bag.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Look, a bell bag.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「微妙に懐かしい響きだねそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 巾着袋みたいなそれのヒモを指にひっかけぐるぐると葉留佳さんは回している。
MESSAGE.EN: She was twirling a small purse around on a string.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was twirling a small purse around on a string.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小学校のころ、集めさせられたことがあったよね、ベルマーク」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When I was in elementary school I had to collect them too, bell marks that is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When I was in elementary school I had to collect them too, bell marks that is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけで貰うね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, I'll take them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, I'll take them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の牛乳に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out her hand toward my milk carton.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out her hand toward my milk carton.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちょっと待ったぁーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Not so fast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Not so fast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこへ割って入るは真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato suddenly interrupted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato suddenly interrupted.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「踏みにじられたうぶな幼なじみの心と、こいつの私利私欲、どっちを取る!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Your innocent childhood friend whose heart was bruised, and this egoist, who will you choose?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Your innocent childhood friend whose heart was bruised, and this egoist, who will you choose?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これぐらいあげようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mind offering this much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mind offering this much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うああぁぁぁぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uaaaagh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uaaaagh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな、どうせ捨てるだけのものだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'd throw it away either way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'd throw it away either way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わー、ありがとー、理樹くん。やっぱりやさしーねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Waah, thank you, Riki-kun. I always knew you were nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Waah, thank you, Riki-kun. I always knew you were nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこからかハサミを取り出して、紙パック牛乳の端っこを切り取っている葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced scissors from somewhere and cut out the side of the package with the mark.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced scissors from somewhere and cut out the side of the package with the mark.

MESSAGE.JP: そのハサミは古ぼけて錆びていた。切れ味はあんまり良くなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The scissors looked very old and rusty. They didn't look too sharp.
MESSAGE.Translation: The scissors looked very old and rusty. They didn't look too sharp.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも左手で器用に切っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless she operated them skillfully using her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless she operated them skillfully using her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小さい頃どうしてベルマークが一輪車とかになるのかわかんなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When I was little I had no idea why you got a unicycle by collecting bell marks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When I was little I had no idea why you got a unicycle by collecting bell marks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんの指の動きから視線を戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: I took my eyes off her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took my eyes off her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「財団経由でＰＴＡにお金が振り込まれるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The funding is provided by the PTA.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The funding is provided by the PTA.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ＰＴＡなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝PTA?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝PTA?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「一点一円でね。学校が希望するものが必ず届くわけではないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝One point is worth one yen. Of course, the things you can get with the points is limited by what sponsors offer the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝One point is worth one yen. Of course, the things you can get with the points is limited by what sponsors offer the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのあたりは色々あるらしいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But it seems there's still many things you can get.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But it seems there's still many things you can get.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「整備委員会豆知識でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's common knowledge for a maintenance committee member.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's common knowledge for a maintenance committee member.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…整備委員会だって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Maintenance committee?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Maintenance committee?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が珍しく会話に口を挟んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo uncharacteristically intervened in the discussion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo uncharacteristically intervened in the discussion.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、そうだよ、整備委員会。活動の一環にもなってるのデス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, that's right, maintenance committee. It's part of my club activities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, that's right, maintenance committee. It's part of my club activities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「整備委員会がどうかした？　謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about the maintenance committee? Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about the maintenance committee? Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は小さく首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: He shook his head slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He shook his head slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いや。…なんでもない。三枝がそういうことをしているのは、意外だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No, never mind... It's just surprising that Saigusa would be doing something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No, never mind... It's just surprising that Saigusa would be doing something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうかな？　楽しいよ。ベルマーク集め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? It's fun. Collecting bell marks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? It's fun. Collecting bell marks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「小毬ちゃんや姉御も面白がって集めるの手伝ってくれるみたいだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Komari-chan and Anego were happy to give me a hand too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Komari-chan and Anego were happy to give me a hand too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はますます意外そうな顔つきを深めている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo's face registered even more surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo's face registered even more surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちなみに希望するなら一輪車がいいかなーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝By the way, I was thinking of asking for a unicycle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝By the way, I was thinking of asking for a unicycle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして一輪車？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why a unicycle?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why a unicycle?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まさか乗りたいからじゃないよね、と思いつつ訊ねてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered about her motives, as I couldn't believe she'd actually want to ride one.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered about her motives, as I couldn't believe she'd actually want to ride one.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、寮から自転車通学ってダメでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Look, you're not allowed to ride a bicycle to school from the dorms, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Look, you're not allowed to ride a bicycle to school from the dorms, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まぁ、徒歩が原則だよね…ってまさか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yeah... You have to go by foot... Wait, don't tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yeah... You have to go by foot... Wait, don't tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。一輪車で通学っていうのはどうかなーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Exactly. I was wondering if it'd be okay to go to school by unicycle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Exactly. I was wondering if it'd be okay to go to school by unicycle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なかなか快適そうだよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wouldn't that be quite comfortable～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wouldn't that be quite comfortable～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あれ、どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Huh, what's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Huh, what's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はがっくりと額に手をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had slapped my forehead in exasperation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had slapped my forehead in exasperation.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はまたさっきみたいな無表情に戻っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo returned to his usual emotionless expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo returned to his usual emotionless expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、全部貰っていくよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, I'll take them all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, I'll take them all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうぞどうぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Go ahead...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Go ahead...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脱力する動機だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I folded out of sheer exhaustion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I folded out of sheer exhaustion.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「であであ。パン美味しかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then. That was good bread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then. That was good bread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まだ残ってるね。ちょっと貰っていい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's still some left. Can I take a little?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's still some left. Can I take a little?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうするの？　パンの耳なんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you going to do with it? It's bread crust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you going to do with it? It's bread crust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんか真人くんの目が虚ろでカワイソウだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I kinda feel sorry for Masato-kun, looking at his lifeless eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I kinda feel sorry for Masato-kun, looking at his lifeless eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「少し考えがあるからサ。また後で来るよ。頑張って、真人くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've got a plan. I'll be back later. Good luck, Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've got a plan. I'll be back later. Good luck, Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは片手にベル袋（？）、もう片方にはパンの耳が入った袋を提げて去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She left holding her bell bag(?) in one hand and a bag of bread in the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: She left holding her bell bag(?) in one hand and a bag of bread in the other.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「相変わらずよくわからない女だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She's hard as ever to figure out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She's hard as ever to figure out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脈絡の無さは来ヶ谷さんや鈴に負けず劣らずだ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しかし、整備委員か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But, maintenance committee, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But, maintenance committee, huh...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…おかしな話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...That's just strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...That's just strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは本当に謎なことばっかりしてるからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかしどうして僕の周りの女の子はそんなのばっかりなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wonder, why am I alone surrounded by that sort of girls?
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wonder, why am I alone surrounded by that sort of girls?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はやっぱり考え込まざるを得ないのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but wonder about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but wonder about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「超欲しいんだよっ！　頼むからくれよっ！　ちょっと蹴らせてやるからさ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I totally want it! Please give it to me! I'll let you kick me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I totally want it! Please give it to me! I'll let you kick me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …必死に言われたので、葉留佳さんにあげるとは言えなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was so desperate that I couldn't give it to Haruka-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was so desperate that I couldn't give it to Haruka-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It can't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん葉留佳さん、真人がちょっとかわいそうになったからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Haruka-san, but Masato is looking so pitiful, that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Haruka-san, but Masato is looking so pitiful, that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやー、ベルマークにここまで執着見せられるとは思いませんでしたからネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I never thought someone would be so attached to bell marks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I never thought someone would be so attached to bell marks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレは今猛烈に感動しているぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm deeply touched...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm deeply touched...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「一生大事にする!!　このベルマーク!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm gonna treasure it for the rest of my life! This bell mark!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm gonna treasure it for the rest of my life! This bell mark!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそこまで大事にされても引くんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It would be creepy if you treasured it that much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It would be creepy if you treasured it that much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃー、しょうがないかぁー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, there's no helping it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, there's no helping it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、うん…今度集めとくからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'll be collecting them from now on, so okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'll be collecting them from now on, so okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、別に大丈夫だよ。みんな集めてくれてるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mm, you don't have to. Everyone's collecting them for me anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mm, you don't have to. Everyone's collecting them for me anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しょうがねえな…この理樹との友情の鐘は譲ることは出来ねえが、なんか他ので集めといてやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right... I can't hand over this bell of Riki and my friendship, but I'll collect others for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right... I can't hand over this bell of Riki and my friendship, but I'll collect others for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ラジャ、よろしくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Roger, I'm counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Roger, I'm counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「であであ失礼～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then, if you'll excuse me～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then, if you'll excuse me～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: And she left.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she left.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「相変わらずよくわからない女だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She doesn't make any sense as usual...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She doesn't make any sense as usual...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Indeed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Indeed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脈絡の無さは来ヶ谷さんや鈴に負けず劣らずだ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは本当に謎なことばっかりしてるからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかしどうして僕の周りの女の子はそんなのばっかりなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wonder, why am I alone surrounded by that sort of girls?
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wonder, why am I alone surrounded by that sort of girls?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はやっぱり考え込まざるを得ないのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but wonder about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but wonder about it.

MESSAGE.JP: と、ふと厨房のほうを見ると、見慣れたおさげが揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I casually glanced toward the kitchen and saw familiar pigtails swaying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I casually glanced toward the kitchen and saw familiar pigtails swaying.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、何してるんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, what is she up to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, what is she up to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうした、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが厨房にいるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is in the kitchen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is in the kitchen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「またなんかよからぬ事でも企んでるんじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She's probably plotting some prank again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She's probably plotting some prank again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、悪戯好きの葉留佳さんのことだから、そうも思えるけど。
MESSAGE.EN: She certainly did enjoy playing pranks, so it was conceivable.
MESSAGE.Translation: She certainly did enjoy playing pranks, so it was conceivable.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、お手伝いに入ってるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seemed to be helping out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seemed to be helping out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっちに気づいたのか、ひらひらと手を振ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd noticed me and was waving.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd noticed me and was waving.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「真面目に手伝いをしてるようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Looks like she's actually helping out for real.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Looks like she's actually helping out for real.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マジか…じゃあちょっと差し入れでもしてくるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Really...? I'm gonna go give her a snack then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Really...? I'm gonna go give her a snack then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや…食パンを半斤あげて喜ぶ女の子もそうはいないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no... there aren't many girls who would feel happy about getting half a loaf of bread...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no... there aren't many girls who would feel happy about getting half a loaf of bread...❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、なんで突然厨房の手伝いなんかしてるんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: But why is she helping out in the kitchen all of the sudden?
MESSAGE.Translation: But why is she helping out in the kitchen all of the sudden?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「相変わらずよくわからない女だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝As usual, she doesn't make any sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝As usual, she doesn't make any sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Indeed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Indeed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脈絡の無さは来ヶ谷さんや鈴に負けず劣らずだ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: When it came to lack of common sense, she was standing on equal footing with Kurugaya-san and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは本当に謎なことばっかりしてるからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's always doing the oddest things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly remembered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly remembered.

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、前にここでシフォンケーキを焼いてたことがあったっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Wasn't she making a chiffon cake here before?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wasn't she making a chiffon cake here before?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「結構律儀な人なんだな、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san's a pretty honest person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san's a pretty honest person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹っちよぉ、それは置いといてこのパンを何とかしようぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rikicchi, that aside, what are we supposed to do with this bread...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rikicchi, that aside, what are we supposed to do with this bread...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、もうおなかいっぱいなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm already full...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm already full...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もさもさとひたすら食パンを食べることになった…。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to eat the bread slowly but steadily...
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to eat the bread slowly but steadily...

MESSAGE.JP: ジジ…と校内放送の電源が入る音がした。続けて…
MESSAGE.EN: The speaker turned on making a hissing noise, and...
MESSAGE.Translation: The speaker turned on making a hissing noise, and...

MESSAGE.JP: 『全校生徒は、速やかに教室に戻り待機してください』
MESSAGE.EN: [All students must return to their classrooms at once and wait there.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [All students must return to their classrooms at once and wait there.]

MESSAGE.JP: そう教師の声が告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: A teacher's voice informed.
MESSAGE.Translation: A teacher's voice informed.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ？　何かあったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Did something happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Did something happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室がざわつく。
MESSAGE.EN: It became noisy in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: It became noisy in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの女生徒が慌てて教室に飛び込んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: Two female students hurriedly rushed back into the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two female students hurriedly rushed back into the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「古式さんが、屋上にっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Koshiki-san, on the roof!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Koshiki-san, on the roof!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう訴えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She exclaimed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She exclaimed.

MESSAGE.JP: その名前を聞いて、僕らが一斉に見るのは、もちろん…謙吾だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon hearing this name, the one all of us turned to was obviously... Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon hearing this name, the one all of us turned to was obviously... Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、おまえと関係あんのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Do you have something to do with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Do you have something to do with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「屋上にいて、校内放送なんて、おおごとだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's on the rooftop, and there was that broadcast, it must be something serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's on the rooftop, and there was that broadcast, it must be something serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、話してよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, tell us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, tell us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「言わずとも察しはつくだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can figure it out without me saying anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can figure it out without me saying anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そりゃ、まあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, more or less.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, more or less.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が僕らの後ろに立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was standing behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was standing behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「彼女は弓の道、一筋で生きてきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She was walking the path of the bow. It was her whole life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She was walking the path of the bow. It was her whole life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「視力を失うことにより、その未来は唐突に閉ざされてしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝After she lost her sight, that future of hers was suddenly taken away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝After she lost her sight, that future of hers was suddenly taken away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今までなげうってきたものすべてが無駄になり、そして、これから先、するべきことも見失った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All she has sacrificed became in vain, and she lost her goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All she has sacrificed became in vain, and she lost her goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ようは、生き甲斐を失ったってことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝To put it simply, she lost her reason to live.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝To put it simply, she lost her reason to live.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは刹那的なものだろうが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It might be something momentary, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It might be something momentary, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「けど、今の彼女は周りが想像するよりも、よっぽど深い絶望の中にいるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, she's in a much deeper despair than people around her realize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, she's in a much deeper despair than people around her realize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「生きることすら、放棄してしまいたくなるほどのな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So deep that she abandoned her desire to live.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So deep that she abandoned her desire to live.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…それって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Does that mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Does that mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「死のうとしてるってこと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's trying to kill herself...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's trying to kill herself...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そいつ馬鹿じゃねぇのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ain't she stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ain't she stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「自ら命を捨てるなんて、ぜってぇありえねぇぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Throwing away your own life is unthinkable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Throwing away your own life is unthinkable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは同感だが、彼女の人生のほんの一部しか知らないおまえのその言葉は届かないだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I agree with that, but your words won't reach her, as you hardly know what she had to go through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I agree with that, but your words won't reach her, as you hardly know what she had to go through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とにかく探そうよ、助けてあげなくちゃっ、そうでしょ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's search for her, we have to help her, don't we!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's search for her, we have to help her, don't we!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は椅子に座ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't leave his seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't leave his seat.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもと同じ無表情。
MESSAGE.EN: He was looking emotionless like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was looking emotionless like always.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、もしかしたら、今謙吾は後悔してるんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But, perhaps, he was feeling full of regret on the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, perhaps, he was feeling full of regret on the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと、相談に乗っていたのは謙吾だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one she always consulted was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one she always consulted was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、もっと言いようがあったのではないかと。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe there was something more that he could have said to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe there was something more that he could have said to her.

MESSAGE.JP: そう後悔しているのではないか。そんな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt that he was regretting this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt that he was regretting this.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度名を呼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I said his name one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said his name one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、謙吾は動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: But he didn't budge.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he didn't budge.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「先に行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go on ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go on ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう恭介が促す。真っ先に真人が廊下に向けて駆け出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke urged us on. Masato rushed into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke urged us on. Masato rushed into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: その後に恭介も続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke followed after him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke followed after him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾はずっと相談に乗ってきたんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She always consulted you, didn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She always consulted you, didn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここで駆けつけないで、いつ駆けつけるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't come to her now, when will you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't come to her now, when will you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして黙ったままでいるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why aren't you saying anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why aren't you saying anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今の彼女を救えるのは、謙吾しかいないよ、そうでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no one else who can save her as she is now but you, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no one else who can save her as she is now but you, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あああ、もうじれったいな、ほら立って！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aaah, you're annoying, come on, get to your feet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aaah, you're annoying, come on, get to your feet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: すると、ようやく謙吾は反応した。
MESSAGE.EN: And he finally responded.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he finally responded.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺はそんな子供じゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm not that much of a kid!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm not that much of a kid!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 空気が震えるほどの大声だ。教室内が静まり返る。
MESSAGE.EN: The air trembled because of his loud voice. The noise inside the classroom died down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The air trembled because of his loud voice. The noise inside the classroom died down.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が僕の手を払い、天井を指差した。
MESSAGE.EN: He brushed my hand off and pointed at the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: He brushed my hand off and pointed at the ceiling.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「屋上にいってみろ、すでに事なきを得ている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Go to the rooftop and see for yourself, it's already under control.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Go to the rooftop and see for yourself, it's already under control.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾はよくやったはずだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure you did well, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure you did well, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけを伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all I told him.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all I told him.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、謙吾をその場に残し、僕も教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, he remained in the classroom, as I left it.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, he remained in the classroom, as I left it.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒を追い返すためか、屋上に続く階段で教師が待ちかまえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps to drive students away, there was a teacher standing at the foot of the stairway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps to drive students away, there was a teacher standing at the foot of the stairway.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「遠藤か…通してくれそうもないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Endo, huh... It doesn't look like he'll let us pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Endo, huh... It doesn't look like he'll let us pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 剣道部の顧問で、規律を破る者を決して許さない厳格な教師だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was the counselor of the kendo club, and had a harsh personality, never showing any mercy to those who disrupted the order.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was the counselor of the kendo club, and had a harsh personality, never showing any mercy to those who disrupted the order.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「放送を聞いていなかったのか!?　教室に戻りなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Did you not hear the broadcast!? Get back to your classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Did you not hear the broadcast!? Get back to your classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らを見つけると、すぐさまそう追い払いにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as he spotted us, he rushed to drive us away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as he spotted us, he rushed to drive us away.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やるしかないな、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We've got to do it, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We've got to do it, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手をもみながら、教師に近づいていく真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato cracked his fists as he drew closer to the teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato cracked his fists as he drew closer to the teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「こら、止まりなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Hey, hold it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Hey, hold it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体格差がありすぎる。にも関わらず、教師は引くことなく、真人と相対した。
MESSAGE.EN: The difference between their body frames was too much. Regardless, the teacher didn't move an inch facing Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: The difference between their body frames was too much. Regardless, the teacher didn't move an inch facing Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: さすが剣道部の顧問といったところだが、あっけなく真人に持ち上げられると、抵抗もむなしく、階段下に放り投げられた。
MESSAGE.EN: I probably should have said 'that's expected of a kendo club counselor', but Masato sent him flying down the stairway in no time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I probably should have said 'that's expected of a kendo club counselor', but Masato sent him flying down the stairway in no time.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「オーケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「後で絶対怒られるよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He'll so get mad at us later...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He'll so get mad at us later...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、いいじゃねぇか、いくぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, who cares, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, who cares, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先生たちが集っていた。ほとんどの教員がかり出されているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The teachers were gathered up on the roof. Almost every teacher was probably called out there.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teachers were gathered up on the roof. Almost every teacher was probably called out there.

MESSAGE.JP: 全員僕たちに背中を向けている。
MESSAGE.EN: They were standing with their backs to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were standing with their backs to us.

MESSAGE.JP: 異様な光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a bizarre scene.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a bizarre scene.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰ひとり僕らの侵入には気付かない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody took notice of our intrusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody took notice of our intrusion.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼らの視線の先は、一点に絞られている。
MESSAGE.EN: All their gazes were fixed on one point.
MESSAGE.Translation: All their gazes were fixed on one point.

MESSAGE.JP: フェンスの向こうに立つ、ひとりの女生徒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one girl who was standing on the other side of the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one girl who was standing on the other side of the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 眼帯が痛々しい…古式さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: With an eyepatch that made her look so miserable... Koshiki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: With an eyepatch that made her look so miserable... Koshiki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて…どうする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now then... What do we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now then... What do we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず本気で死ぬ気はないようだな…震えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, it doesn't seem that she's serious about committing suicide... She's trembling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, it doesn't seem that she's serious about committing suicide... She's trembling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも簡単に戻ってくる気もないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it didn't seem that she'd go back so simply.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it didn't seem that she'd go back so simply.

MESSAGE.JP: …こんなところで挫けてどうするんだ！
MESSAGE.EN: ...What good will it do if you fall into despair at this point!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What good will it do if you fall into despair at this point!

MESSAGE.JP: …まだまだきみにはできることがたくさんあるだろう！
MESSAGE.EN: ...There's still a lot that you can do!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There's still a lot that you can do!

MESSAGE.JP: 延々と続く教師の説得にもまったく応じない。
MESSAGE.EN: Teachers were lecturing her one after another, but she showed no reaction to their words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Teachers were lecturing her one after another, but she showed no reaction to their words.

MESSAGE.JP: ただひたすら、首を振り続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She was only shaking her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was only shaking her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 違う、違う、と。
MESSAGE.EN: You're wrong, you're wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: You're wrong, you're wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰ひとり、彼女のことをわかっていないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody could understand her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody could understand her.

MESSAGE.JP: 今の彼女の心を動かせるもの、それはなんなんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What is it that could reach her heart now?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it that could reach her heart now?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に…
MESSAGE.EN: Something that Kengo...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something that Kengo...

MESSAGE.JP: あの、僕が知る謙吾にできなかったことが、あんな大人たちにできるはずがないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Something that the Kengo I know couldn't do; there was no way those adults would be able to do anything about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something that the Kengo I know couldn't do; there was no way those adults would be able to do anything about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あれは…うまくいくのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Will this... work out somehow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Will this... work out somehow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女が西風から身を守るようにして、丸くなってフェンスに捕まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She curled up, as if protecting herself from the eastern wind, and clutched the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She curled up, as if protecting herself from the eastern wind, and clutched the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: その死角となる端から、ひとりの教師がフェンスを伝いながら、ゆっくりと迫っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: From that edge that was out of her line of vision, a teacher was slowly drawing closer.
MESSAGE.Translation: From that edge that was out of her line of vision, a teacher was slowly drawing closer.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まずいな…風向きが変わるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is bad... The wind is changing direction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is bad... The wind is changing direction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は空を見上げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke looked up at the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke looked up at the sky.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風に煽られるようにして、古式さんが振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: As if being provoked by the wind, Koshiki-san turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if being provoked by the wind, Koshiki-san turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: その目が見開かれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes opened wide.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes opened wide.

MESSAGE.JP: 口を開いて、何かを叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her mouth and screamed something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her mouth and screamed something.

MESSAGE.JP: それを合図にしたかのように、男子教員が一斉に駆けた。
MESSAGE.EN: As if it were a signal, all the teachers rushed over to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if it were a signal, all the teachers rushed over to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とめろっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stop!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stop!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear Kyousuke's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear Kyousuke's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼らはもう暴徒でしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: They were all too agitated by now.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were all too agitated by now.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が何人かの教師をタックルでなぎ倒していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato tackled a few teachers down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato tackled a few teachers down.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、手遅れだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 古式さんの目には、みんなが襲いかかってくるように見えたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe that to Koshiki-san it must've appeared as if she was being hunted down by everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe that to Koshiki-san it must've appeared as if she was being hunted down by everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ずさった。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a step behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a step behind.

MESSAGE.JP: その背後には、なにもないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though... there was nothing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though... there was nothing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も誰かに押されて、地面に叩きつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was pushed down to the ground by someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was pushed down to the ground by someone.

MESSAGE.JP: 傾く風景の中に見えたのは、フェンスを飛び越える影だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Amidst this scene I saw a shadow leap over the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst this scene I saw a shadow leap over the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: …謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「う…うおおおぉぉぉおぉぉぉぉぉぉーーーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝U... Uooohh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝U... Uooohh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 激しい突風が吹き抜けた後のように、みんなが倒れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As if blown away by a strong gust of wind, everyone fell down on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if blown away by a strong gust of wind, everyone fell down on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介と、真人だけが、フェンスに張りついていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and Masato alone clutched to the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and Masato alone clutched to the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はよろよろと立ち上がり呆然としたまま…
MESSAGE.EN: Bewildered, I unsteadily got to my feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bewildered, I unsteadily got to my feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうなったの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのふたりの背中に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked them, looking at their backs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked them, looking at their backs.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえも来い、と恭介が手招きした。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You come here too,❜ Kyousuke beckoned me with his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You come here too,❜ Kyousuke beckoned me with his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: その下には、絶望的な光景が待っているのではないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Is there a scene of despair waiting for me down there?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is there a scene of despair waiting for me down there?

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬恐怖したが、ふたりの呆れたような表情がそれはないと告げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: This fear assailed me for a moment, but their dumbfounded expressions told me it wasn't so.
MESSAGE.Translation: This fear assailed me for a moment, but their dumbfounded expressions told me it wasn't so.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もフェンスに張りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I leaned against the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I leaned against the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 見下ろすと、真下のグラウンド、そこに跪く男子生徒の背中があった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked below, and there was the back of a male student kneeling down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked below, and there was the back of a male student kneeling down.

MESSAGE.JP: 古式さんを守るように抱きかかえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was embracing Koshiki-san, protecting her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was embracing Koshiki-san, protecting her.

MESSAGE.JP: その体を、地面にそっと下ろすと、右腕をこちらに伸ばし、親指を突き上げてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: He set her body down gently, and held out his right hand to us, giving a thumbs-up.
MESSAGE.Translation: He set her body down gently, and held out his right hand to us, giving a thumbs-up.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「無事だってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They're safe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They're safe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は脱力した。
MESSAGE.EN: All my strength left me at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: All my strength left me at once.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だから、あいつはすげぇんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's why he's amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's why he's amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、その男子生徒…謙吾は、その場にぶっ倒れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then, that male student... Kengo collapsed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then, that male student... Kengo collapsed.

MESSAGE.JP: 病院での検査はあっという間に終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Their checkup at the hospital was over in the blink of an eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their checkup at the hospital was over in the blink of an eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 古式さんは、無傷だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Koshiki-san wasn't harmed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Koshiki-san wasn't harmed.

MESSAGE.JP: 今、その古式さんと、僕、恭介、真人が、謙吾の部屋にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Right now, that Koshiki-san, and also me, Kyousuke and Masato were in Kengo's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right now, that Koshiki-san, and also me, Kyousuke and Masato were in Kengo's room.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はベッドで横になっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was lying on his bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was lying on his bed.

MESSAGE.JP: その左腕にはギブス。
MESSAGE.EN: His left hand was in a plaster cast.
MESSAGE.Translation: His left hand was in a plaster cast.

MESSAGE.JP: 両足が無事だったのは、桁外れの運動能力の賜としか言いようがない。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of his legs were all right, which could only be thanks to his extraordinary athletic ability.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of his legs were all right, which could only be thanks to his extraordinary athletic ability.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、古式さんの体を守った腕だけは無事では済まなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That arm he protected Koshiki-san with was the only thing that received damage.
MESSAGE.Translation: That arm he protected Koshiki-san with was the only thing that received damage.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「私は…あなたの夢まで奪ってしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝I... I even took away your dream from you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝I... I even took away your dream from you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなことはない。ひびが入っただけだ。二ヶ月も経てば治る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's not true. It's just a minor fracture. It'll heal in one or two months.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's not true. It's just a minor fracture. It'll heal in one or two months.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「でも…新人戦に出られなくなった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝But... you won't be able to attend the newcomer competition anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝But... you won't be able to attend the newcomer competition anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それだけじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Isn't that all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Isn't that all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「それだけじゃありませんっ…部活動まで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝It's not... Even your club activities...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝It's not... Even your club activities...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 古式さんを救ったのは、謙吾だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one who saved her was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who saved her was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、剣道部の顧問、遠藤は謙吾を許さなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But the kendo club's advisor didn't forgive him.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the kendo club's advisor didn't forgive him.

MESSAGE.JP: 一学期の部活動全面禁止を言い渡したのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He banned him from participating in club activities for the entire term.
MESSAGE.Translation: He banned him from participating in club activities for the entire term.

MESSAGE.JP: 他の先生たちがフォローしても、聞かなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when other teachers tried to back Kengo up, he didn't budge.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when other teachers tried to back Kengo up, he didn't budge.

MESSAGE.JP: 恐らく屋上に辿りつくまでに、謙吾も、遠藤先生をなぎ倒してきたのだろうし…。
MESSAGE.EN: Most likely, on his way to the rooftop he had had to knock Endo-sensei down too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Most likely, on his way to the rooftop he had had to knock Endo-sensei down too.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じことをした僕らにも弁護の余地はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Having done the very same thing, we couldn't say anything in his defense.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having done the very same thing, we couldn't say anything in his defense.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どちらにしても、この腕じゃ出られまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whatever it is, this arm is useless for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whatever it is, this arm is useless for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「すみません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 重い空気が流れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The atmosphere was heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The atmosphere was heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介も何かフォローしてやればいいのに…。黙ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke should have said something to redeem the situation... But he kept quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke should have said something to redeem the situation... But he kept quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ひとつだけ約束してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Promise me one thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Promise me one thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が話を続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo went on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo went on.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「二度とあんな真似をしないことを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Never again attempt anything of this sort.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Never again attempt anything of this sort.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「…はい。絶対しません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝...I promise. I never will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝...I promise. I never will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「宮沢さんが拾ってくれた命です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝This is the life Miyazawa-san picked up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝This is the life Miyazawa-san picked up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「宮沢さんが捨てるなと言う限り、絶対に捨てません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝Until Miyazawa-san tells me to, I'll never throw it away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝Until Miyazawa-san tells me to, I'll never throw it away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「別に恩を着せてるわけじゃない。古式は古式らしく生きてくれればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm not asking you to return the favor. Just be yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm not asking you to return the favor. Just be yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺も、俺らしく生きる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I will be myself too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I will be myself too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@「…剣道…以外で、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@❝...Besides... Besides kendo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@❝...Besides... Besides kendo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「古式」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Koshiki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Koshiki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もしひとつのことに絶望したとしても、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even if something leaves you in despair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even if something leaves you in despair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「人間、やれることなんて、いくらだってある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There're still many things you can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There're still many things you can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それを覚えておいてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't forget this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't forget this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 五時間目の授業が終わり、僕たちはグラウンドにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: As the 5th period was over, we headed over to the sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the 5th period was over, we headed over to the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、その腕で、どうすんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What're you planning to do, with that arm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What're you planning to do, with that arm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: バッターボックスには、謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was at the batter's box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was at the batter's box.

MESSAGE.JP: 右腕一本でバットを持って立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: In his right hand was a bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: In his right hand was a bat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「鈴、思い切りこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Rin, come at me with all you have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rin, come at me with all you have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: マウンドの鈴を挑発するように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke to Rin, who was standing on the mound, as if provoking her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke to Rin, who was standing on the mound, as if provoking her.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「打てたとしても、その腕じゃ全力で走れないだろが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even if you hit the ball, you can't run at full power with that arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even if you hit the ball, you can't run at full power with that arm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ホームランを打てばいいだけだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then I'll just have to hit a homerun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then I'll just have to hit a homerun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こい、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Come, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Come, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度、睨むようにして言う。
MESSAGE.EN: He repeated, piercing her with his glare.
MESSAGE.Translation: He repeated, piercing her with his glare.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が、ちりんと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 真剣な顔だ。手加減せずに投げるつもりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin had a serious expression. She'd pitch without holding back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin had a serious expression. She'd pitch without holding back.

MESSAGE.JP: 大きく振りかぶって、投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a huge swing, and threw it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a huge swing, and threw it.

MESSAGE.JP: カキィン!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が振り返り、ボールを追う。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around to follow the ball with her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around to follow the ball with her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: それはそのまま緑生い茂る山の中に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: It disappeared into the hill overgrown with greenery.
MESSAGE.Translation: It disappeared into the hill overgrown with greenery.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「打ちやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He hit it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He hit it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人も呆然と立ちつくす。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stood dumbfounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stood dumbfounded.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マジで、片手で打ちやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He seriously hit it with just one hand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He seriously hit it with just one hand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はバットを投げ捨て、ダイヤモンドをゆっくり回り始める。
MESSAGE.EN: He tossed the bat away and started walking along the diamond shaped field slowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tossed the bat away and started walking along the diamond shaped field slowly.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なるほど…ホームランさえ打てば怪我が枷になってアウトになることもないってか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see... As long as he hits a homerun, his injury won't get in the way and he won't be retired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see... As long as he hits a homerun, his injury won't get in the way and he won't be retired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「へぼなのか…あたしはへぼピッチャーなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Am I no good... Am I a useless pitcher?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Am I no good... Am I a useless pitcher?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、ショックなのはわかるけど、相手が悪すぎたっていうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I understand your shock, but your opponent was just too much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I understand your shock, but your opponent was just too much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「手負いの大型ルーキー現る、か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝An injured rookie appears in the majors, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝An injured rookie appears in the majors, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はこうして証明し続けていくんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if by doing this he's trying to prove...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if by doing this he's trying to prove...

MESSAGE.JP: 生き甲斐なんて、いくらでも見つかるってことを。
MESSAGE.EN: Prove that there're many reasons one can find to live.
MESSAGE.Translation: Prove that there're many reasons one can find to live.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「練習じゃ、ぼけー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Back to practice, idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Back to practice, idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の声だけがけたたましく響く。
MESSAGE.EN: Only Rin's voice resounded across the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only Rin's voice resounded across the field.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まだ授業あるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we still have classes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we still have classes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 六時間目の授業は何事もなかったかのように行われた。
MESSAGE.EN: The 6th period went by as if nothing'd happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: The 6th period went by as if nothing'd happened.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、と僕は考える。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't shake off this thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't shake off this thought.

MESSAGE.JP: これも、恭介のシナリオ通りだった？
MESSAGE.EN: Was that all according to Kyousuke's scenario as well?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was that all according to Kyousuke's scenario as well?

MESSAGE.JP: 今朝のセリフを思い出せばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered what he said in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered what he said in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「最後のひとりは時間の問題さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The remaining member is simply a matter of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The remaining member is simply a matter of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕は謙吾を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: And I looked at Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I looked at Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: その時僕はなんて思った？
MESSAGE.EN: At that time, what did I think?
MESSAGE.Translation: At that time, what did I think?

MESSAGE.JP: ――頑ななまでに草野球を拒み続け、剣道一筋で過ごしてきた謙吾が今更心変わりするなどない。
MESSAGE.EN: That Kengo, who devoted himself wholeheartedly to kendo and firmly refused to play baseball so far, would not change his mind now.
MESSAGE.Translation: That Kengo, who devoted himself wholeheartedly to kendo and firmly refused to play baseball so far, would not change his mind now.

MESSAGE.JP: …心変わりしたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But he did, didn't he?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But he did, didn't he?

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対に予測し得ない事件を経て。
MESSAGE.EN: An accident that no one could predict happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: An accident that no one could predict happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 薄ら寒さを覚える。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a slight chill.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a slight chill.

MESSAGE.JP: 一体恭介は、僕たちのことをどこまで掌握してるというんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how far did his grasp on us extend...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how far did his grasp on us extend...

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは…
MESSAGE.EN: Or perhaps...
MESSAGE.Translation: Or perhaps...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が強引に、結果と恭介の言葉とを結びつけて考えているだけなのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just me who connected the outcome to his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just me who connected the outcome to his words.

MESSAGE.JP: もし事件が起きず、謙吾が怪我をせず、心変わりしていなかったら、何事もなく流されていく言葉だったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What if that accident didn't happen, Kengo didn't get hurt, didn't change his mind, and nothing else happened?
MESSAGE.Translation: What if that accident didn't happen, Kengo didn't get hurt, didn't change his mind, and nothing else happened?

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、意味深な言葉を並べ立てているだけで、その中のひとつが偶然、結果と一致したのを僕が発見してしまっただけなのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What if Kyousuke never put too much meaning in his words, and I simply noticed something that he said and that coincidentally turned into reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: What if Kyousuke never put too much meaning in his words, and I simply noticed something that he said and that coincidentally turned into reality.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「まだか、いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Are you done yet? Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Are you done yet? Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぬらりと隣に立つは…謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing by my side was... Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing by my side was... Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、まだかって…え、バット!?　わけがわからない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, am I done yet, you mean... Eh, a bat!? What's up with that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, am I done yet, you mean... Eh, a bat!? What's up with that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手にバットを持っていたので、そのあまりの違和感に僕は一瞬混乱する。
MESSAGE.EN: I was bewildered, him holding a bat in his hand was too bizarre a spectacle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was bewildered, him holding a bat in his hand was too bizarre a spectacle.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…そうか、謙吾はチームに加わったんだ…。そのことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah... That's right, he joined the team... I finally remembered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah... That's right, he joined the team... I finally remembered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら教室にバットぐらいって…持ってこないよね、普通!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't go bringing the bat to the classroom at least... That's not something you would normally do, right!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't go bringing the bat to the classroom at least... That's not something you would normally do, right!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再び混乱する。
MESSAGE.EN: I fell into confusion one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fell into confusion one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: その僕を尻目に真人が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato who was looking back at me got up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato who was looking back at me got up.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マイバットですかい…こりゃあ、頼もしいことで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Your personal bat, huh... This is something to look forward to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Your personal bat, huh... This is something to look forward to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やるからには、本気だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Since I decided to do it, I'll be serious about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Since I decided to do it, I'll be serious about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのバットの先で真人の顎を指す。
MESSAGE.EN: He pointed with his bat at Masato's jaw.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pointed with his bat at Masato's jaw.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、おまえ、教室で野球？　ばかか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's with that, you going to play baseball in the classroom? Are you stupid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's with that, you going to play baseball in the classroom? Are you stupid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その謙吾の横っ面を見て、鈴が漏らす。
MESSAGE.EN: She blurted out, looking at his face from the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: She blurted out, looking at his face from the side.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あーーーはっはっはっはっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Aaahahahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Aaahahahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はなぜか大笑い。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason he burst out laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason he burst out laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ、馬鹿でいいとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fu, I don't mind being stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fu, I don't mind being stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バットを肩に載せると、そのまま教室を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He swung the bat onto his shoulder and left the classroom like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: He swung the bat onto his shoulder and left the classroom like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？　謙吾が馬鹿になったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's that? Kengo became an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's that? Kengo became an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も理解に苦しむ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't comprehend it either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't comprehend it either.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾ってあんな奴だったっけ？
MESSAGE.EN: Was that really Kengo?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was that really Kengo?

MESSAGE.JP: まるで頭のねじが外れてしまったような変貌ぶりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was such a drastic change, as if some screws had come loose in his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was such a drastic change, as if some screws had come loose in his head.

MESSAGE.JP: もともとそういう素質はあったとは思うけど…いきなりトップギア、全開だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I do think that he always had it in him, but... It's like he suddenly switched into top gear and opened up completely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I do think that he always had it in him, but... It's like he suddenly switched into top gear and opened up completely.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「勝負だ、謙吾ーーーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I challenge you, Kengo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I challenge you, Kengo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その後を真人が追いかけていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato went running after him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato went running after him.

MESSAGE.JP: 喧嘩じゃなくて、きっと野球でだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't about fighting probably, but about baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't about fighting probably, but about baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「馬鹿が二体か…困った幼なじみどもだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We have two idiots now... What troublesome childhood friends...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We have two idiots now... What troublesome childhood friends...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その風景は、とても穏やかだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That scene was, somehow, very soothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: That scene was, somehow, very soothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 懐かしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Nostalgic.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nostalgic.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼い日の光景のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just like the old days.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just like the old days.

MESSAGE.JP: 野球って、いいな。
MESSAGE.EN: Baseball is great.
MESSAGE.Translation: Baseball is great.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんも、仲間に混じれたらいいのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: If only Tokido-san was part of the group too...
MESSAGE.Translation: If only Tokido-san was part of the group too...

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の生きる世界は、僕らの日常とは交差することのない線なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The world she lived in and our daily lives were lines that never crossed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world she lived in and our daily lives were lines that never crossed.

MESSAGE.JP: それを悲しく思う。
MESSAGE.EN: The thought made me sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thought made me sad.

MESSAGE.JP: あの日を取り戻せるなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If it has the power to bring those days back.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it has the power to bring those days back.

MESSAGE.JP: ふとそう思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: This is what I suddenly thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is what I suddenly thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 渡り廊下を歩いていると。
MESSAGE.EN: I was walking down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was walking down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: また自然と中庭に目が向く。
MESSAGE.EN: And automatically headed to the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: And automatically headed to the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに彼女の姿を認める。
MESSAGE.EN: To find her there.
MESSAGE.Translation: To find her there.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は見たいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to see her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to see her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らの輪に加わる西園さんの姿を。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to see Nishizono-san joining our circle of friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to see Nishizono-san joining our circle of friends.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、前に誘った時は断られている。
MESSAGE.EN: But when I invited her last time, she turned me down.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when I invited her last time, she turned me down.

MESSAGE.JP: それは運動ができないからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because she couldn't play sports.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because she couldn't play sports.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もしなくても、いいから。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, she wouldn't even have to do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, she wouldn't even have to do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、僕はもう一度声をかけてみようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I intended to try inviting her one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I intended to try inviting her one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、頼みがあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I'd like to ask a favor of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I'd like to ask a favor of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが読んでいた本から顔をあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: She tore her glance off the book she was reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tore her glance off the book she was reading.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「内容を聞いてみないことには、なんとも言えません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Before I hear what it is exactly, I can't answer you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Before I hear what it is exactly, I can't answer you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはこれから言うから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll tell you now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll tell you now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここは当たって砕けろ、の精神だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Here goes nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Here goes nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 砕けた時は砕けた時だ。
MESSAGE.EN: If it doesn't work out, so be it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it doesn't work out, so be it.

MESSAGE.JP: …思考が真人や謙吾に似てきた気がするなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess this is how Masato and Kengo normally think.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess this is how Masato and Kengo normally think.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ、深呼吸。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: それから、一気に言った。
MESSAGE.EN: And said everything at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: And said everything at once.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「マネージャー、やらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you become a manager?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you become a manager?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なにの、でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Manager of what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Manager of what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…アイドルデビューするのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Are you making your debut as an idol band?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Are you making your debut as an idol band?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「棗さん、井ノ原さん、宮沢さんと直枝さんの４人が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Natsume-san, Inohara-san, Miyazawa-san and Naoe-san, four members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Natsume-san, Inohara-san, Miyazawa-san and Naoe-san, four members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なるほど…棗さんは女生徒の人気が高いと聞きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I see... I've heard that Natsume-san is popular with the girls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I see... I've heard that Natsume-san is popular with the girls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「宮沢さんも、なかなか渋い外見をしています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Miyazawa-san has a fairly manly appearance as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Miyazawa-san has a fairly manly appearance as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ですが、残る二人はどうでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But what about the remaining two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But what about the remaining two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちょっと難しい気もしますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think it might be a little difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think it might be a little difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そこもマネージャーの腕の見せ所かも知れませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That might be where I get to show my skills as a manager.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That might be where I get to show my skills as a manager.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「分かりました、お引き受けしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I understand, I'll gladly accept your offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I understand, I'll gladly accept your offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口を挟む間もなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't leave any room for me to interrupt.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't leave any room for me to interrupt.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと待って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a sec.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a sec.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…その残る二人って僕と真人なんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...The remaining two members are me and Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...The remaining two members are me and Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああ、申し訳ありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Oh, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Oh, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんはベビーフェイスですから、特定の趣味の方には人気が出るかも知れませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you have a baby face, so you might become popular among those with particular tastes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you have a baby face, so you might become popular among those with particular tastes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「硬派なイメージの棗さんと、組み合わせて売り出しましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Let's group you together with Natsume-san who gives a valiant impression, and make it a selling point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let's group you together with Natsume-san who gives a valiant impression, and make it a selling point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「棗×直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Natsume x Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Natsume x Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…これはいけます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...This just might work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...This just might work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なにやら頷く西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 満足げだ。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, she looked satisfied.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, she looked satisfied.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…良からぬ想像をされている気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I feel like you're doing something bad to me in your imagination.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I feel like you're doing something bad to me in your imagination.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そうじゃなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その、僕らの野球のマネージャーになって欲しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's, um... I want you to become the manager of our baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's, um... I want you to become the manager of our baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「野球の、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。選手じゃなくて、マネージャー。でも、やることはほとんどないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, not as a player, but as a manager. You won't have to do very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, not as a player, but as a manager. You won't have to do very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「メンバーがメンバーだからね、誰か危ないことをし始めないか、見守ってくれてるだけでも助かるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'd be a member too, but you'll only have to watch over us to make sure no one does anything dangerous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'd be a member too, but you'll only have to watch over us to make sure no one does anything dangerous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「分かりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしも女です。二言はありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm a girl too. I won't go back on my word.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm a girl too. I won't go back on my word.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「勘違いとは言え、一度は『はい』と言ったのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even if it was a misunderstanding, I still already said ❛Yes.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even if it was a misunderstanding, I still already said ❛Yes.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お引き受けします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll accept your offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll accept your offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…本当にいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 引き受けてもらって何だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, at least she did accept the offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, at least she did accept the offer.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな騙したみたいな（というか誤解のまま）では、何か心地悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: But I felt a little guilty because it seemed as if I had tricked her (even though it was all her misunderstanding).
MESSAGE.Translation: But I felt a little guilty because it seemed as if I had tricked her (even though it was all her misunderstanding).

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、本当に嫌ならばお断りしています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, if I really didn't want to, I'd refuse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, if I really didn't want to, I'd refuse.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やるもやらないも同じならば、やってみても良いかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But if it's all the same whether I do it or not, anyway, I don't mind giving it a try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But if it's all the same whether I do it or not, anyway, I don't mind giving it a try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう思っただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's how I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's how I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう、付け加えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She added.
MESSAGE.Translation: She added.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、いいんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, you're really okay with it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, you're really okay with it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「しつこいですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're persistent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're persistent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「分かった。それじゃあ、お願いするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got it. Then, I'll be counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got it. Then, I'll be counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…任されましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「こちらこそ、よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And likewise, I hope things go well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And likewise, I hope things go well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「というわけでマネージャーの美魚君だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, this is Mio-kun, our manager.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, this is Mio-kun, our manager.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please take good care of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please take good care of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意味がよくわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't get it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「マネージャーって、なんでまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Manager, what's with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Manager, what's with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ…女子マネージャーが欲しかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep... I wanted a girl as a manager.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep... I wanted a girl as a manager.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …欲望のままに行動したようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems that she just acted on impulse.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems that she just acted on impulse.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、マネージャーやってくれるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san will become our manager?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san will become our manager?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうわけさ。昨日の件もあったしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's how it is. And there's also what happened yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's how it is. And there's also what happened yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしとしても、放課後は特に約束はありませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't have any special obligations after school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't have any special obligations after school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それに、棗さん、井ノ原さん、宮沢さんと直枝さんの４人がアイドルデビューを目指すそうで、とても興味があります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Besides, I have a great interest in this; Natsume-san, Inohara-san, Miyazawa-san and Naoe-san, working for your debut as an idol band.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Besides, I have a great interest in this; Natsume-san, Inohara-san, Miyazawa-san and Naoe-san, working for your debut as an idol band.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なるほど…棗さんは女生徒の人気が高いと聞きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I see... I heard that Natsume-san's popular with the girls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I see... I heard that Natsume-san's popular with the girls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「宮沢さんも、なかなか渋い外見をしています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Miyazawa-san has a fairly manly appearance as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Miyazawa-san has a fairly manly appearance as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ですが、残る二人はどうでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But, what about the remaining two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But, what about the remaining two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちょっと難しい気もしますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think it might be a little difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think it might be a little difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そこもマネージャーの腕の見せ所かも知れませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That might be where I get to show my skills as a manager.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That might be where I get to show my skills as a manager.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「喜んでお引き受けしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll gladly accept the offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll gladly accept the offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、そういうのはやってないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No, I don't think you've got it right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No, I don't think you've got it right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんはベビーフェイスですから、特定の趣味の方には人気が出るかも知れませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you have a baby face, so you might become popular among those with particular tastes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you have a baby face, so you might become popular among those with particular tastes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「硬派なイメージの棗さんと、組み合わせて売り出しましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Let's group you together with Natsume-san who gives a valiant impression, and make it a selling point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let's group you together with Natsume-san who gives a valiant impression, and make it a selling point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「棗×直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Natsume x Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Natsume x Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…これはいけます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...This just might work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...This just might work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大暴走中だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was letting her imagination run wild.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was letting her imagination run wild.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと、来ヶ谷さん…西園さんに何を吹き込んだのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kurugaya-san... just what did you tell her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kurugaya-san... just what did you tell her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、誘ったところ開口一番そんな話が飛び出したのだが、面白いから放置してみた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, when I invited her, it was the first thing she said; it sounded amusing so I left it at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, when I invited her, it was the first thing she said; it sounded amusing so I left it at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ダメでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you shouldn't have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you shouldn't have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、全員揃ったら紹介するとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, everyone's here, so let's introduce her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, everyone's here, so let's introduce her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その前に誤解といておいてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Before that, let's clear up the misunderstanding...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Before that, let's clear up the misunderstanding...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうした、賑やかだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up, it seems so lively here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up, it seems so lively here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: Ｔシャツに汗の模様を作った暑苦しさ満載の真人が寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, whose t-shirt had a sweat stain from the heat, was making his way over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, whose t-shirt had a sweat stain from the heat, was making his way over.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、今日からは西園さんがマネージャーやってくれるんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san is going to be our manager from today on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san is going to be our manager from today on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「このチームの？　そんなの要んのかよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Team manager? Do we even need one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Team manager? Do we even need one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいじゃないかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が擁護する前に、恭介の一言。面倒がひとつ減った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke answered, before I could say anything in her defense. One problem down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke answered, before I could say anything in her defense. One problem down.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ええー、なんか女ばっかで、バランスおかしくねーか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eeh, isn't the balance off with so many girls?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eeh, isn't the balance off with so many girls?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おかしくねぇよ、合ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's just right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's just right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これが、俺たちのチーム…」
