MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is our team...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is our team...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「リトルバスターズだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介ひとり満足げにメンバーを見渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: He surveyed the team members with a satisfied look.
MESSAGE.Translation: He surveyed the team members with a satisfied look.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子たちは、結構マイペースに私語とかしてる。
MESSAGE.EN: The girls were talking in whispers at their own pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girls were talking in whispers at their own pace.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、今日からは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep, from today on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep, from today on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「時は満ちたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝The time is nigh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝The time is nigh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 説明しようとしたところでそれを遮るように声が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to explain, when someone's exclamation interrupted me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to explain, when someone's exclamation interrupted me.

MESSAGE.JP: 皆がそっちを向く。恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone looked over in that direction. It was Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone looked over in that direction. It was Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「待ちくたびれたぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I was getting tired of waiting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I was getting tired of waiting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これで全員揃ったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now, all the members have gathered...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now, all the members have gathered...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これが、俺たちのチーム…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is our team...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is our team...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「リトルバスターズだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、西園さんはマネージャーだから、まだひとり足りないままだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, Nishizono-san is the manager, so we're still one member short.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, Nishizono-san is the manager, so we're still one member short.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ん？　ちょっと待ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Mm? Hold on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Mm? Hold on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…その子は、打たないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...That girl, can't she bat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...That girl, can't she bat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…守らないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...She can't play defense?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...She can't play defense?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…走らないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...She can't run?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...She can't run?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…なんなら、立ってるだけでもいいぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...What if she'll just stand on the field?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...What if she'll just stand on the field?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「日なたは苦手ですので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm sensitive to sunlight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm sensitive to sunlight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恭介さんよ…満ちた時とやらはどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Kyousuke-san... What was that about ❛the time is nigh❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Kyousuke-san... What was that about ❛the time is nigh❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなもん知るかああぁぁーーーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Like I know that!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Like I know that!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何もせずにただ待ってて、勝手にメンバーが増えるわけないだろっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just waiting and doing nothing, of course the members won't join on their own!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just waiting and doing nothing, of course the members won't join on their own!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおぉっ、まるでこっちに非があるようで思わず謝ってしまいそうな勢いだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa, when you say it like that, it feels like it's my fault and it almost makes me want to apologize...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa, when you say it like that, it feels like it's my fault and it almost makes me want to apologize...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そもそも草野球だ、外野ふたりでいいだろ、８人だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, we're playing sandlot baseball, so if we cover the outfield with two players, eight is just fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, we're playing sandlot baseball, so if we cover the outfield with two players, eight is just fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もうこれ以上いらんっ、この８人とマネージャーでいくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We don't need any more members, these eight players and a manager will do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We don't need any more members, these eight players and a manager will do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これで全員揃ったな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now, all the members have gathered!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now, all the members have gathered!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これが、俺たちのチーム…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's our team...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's our team...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「リトルバスターズだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Little Busters!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やけくそですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're desperate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're desperate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たまにあるんだけど、結構レアだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's like that once in a while, but not very often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's like that once in a while, but not very often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ほぅ、それはそれは。よぅく見ておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hou, that's quite something. I'll observe closely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hou, that's quite something. I'll observe closely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おら、全員に通達するぞ、集まれーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, I'm going to make an announcement, everyone gather round!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, I'm going to make an announcement, everyone gather round!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日からマネージャーとして加わる西園さんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝From today on, Nishizono-san will be our manager.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝From today on, Nishizono-san will be our manager.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一同の前で恭介が西園さんを紹介する。
MESSAGE.EN: He introduced Nishizono-san to everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: He introduced Nishizono-san to everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 面識はあるとは言え、特に接点もなかった西園さんがメンバーに加わることになった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was familiar with everyone for the most part, but she hadn't been around anyone too much before joining the team.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was familiar with everyone for the most part, but she hadn't been around anyone too much before joining the team.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、ここにいる僕らは大抵そんな風に始まっているので、特に異論が上がることもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But, most of us had started in on a similar note, so there weren't any particular objections.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, most of us had started in on a similar note, so there weren't any particular objections.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もう、このメンツでいくからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to be playing with these players.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to be playing with these players.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「マネージャーから何か一言、どうぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A few words from the manager, if you please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A few words from the manager, if you please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「目指せ、全国制覇」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The goal is to conquer the nation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The goal is to conquer the nation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおっ、熱いっすねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oouh, how passionate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oouh, how passionate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よろしくねー。一緒にがんばろ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I hope we'll get along～. Let's give it our best together～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I hope we'll get along～. Let's give it our best together～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よろしくなのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please give me your best regards～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please give me your best regards～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんな、歓迎ムードだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone welcomed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone welcomed her.

MESSAGE.JP: …よかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm glad.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm glad.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こんなぐだぐだでいいのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't she too sluggish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't she too sluggish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人だけはチームの行く末に不安を抱いているようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Only Masato was worried about the future of our team...
MESSAGE.Translation: Only Masato was worried about the future of our team...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...However.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...However.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はた、と西園さんが考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She began to ponder on something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began to ponder on something.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしたちでは、全国制覇は無理なのではないでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm wondering if it's possible for us to conquer the nation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm wondering if it's possible for us to conquer the nation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほぅ、どういう意味だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hoo, what do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hoo, what do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは初めは男性を中心とした野球系アイドルグループだと思っていたのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I thought you had a baseball-themed male idol group at first...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I thought you had a baseball-themed male idol group at first...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まさか女性中心の野球系アイドルユニットだったとは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To think it was a baseball-themed female idol unit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To think it was a baseball-themed female idol unit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「女性が中心ではまず予選出場という第一目標が突破できません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you go with this girl-oriented group, you probably won't even get past the qualifying round.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you go with this girl-oriented group, you probably won't even get past the qualifying round.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「では、男装をして出場すればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then, how about disguising as men.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then, how about disguising as men.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何かに気付いたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She seems to have realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seems to have realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、来ヶ谷さんまったく誤解を解く気ないしっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, Kurugaya-san doesn't seem to be willing to clear up the misunderstanding at all!
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, Kurugaya-san doesn't seem to be willing to clear up the misunderstanding at all!

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「盲点でした。神懸り的なアイディアです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I overlooked this. It's an inspired idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I overlooked this. It's an inspired idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんは、楽しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kurugaya-san was enjoying herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kurugaya-san was enjoying herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、練習を再開するか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, how about we resume the practice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, how about we resume the practice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ポジションとか決めなくていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about deciding on the positions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about deciding on the positions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、言わずとも自ずと決まりつつあるが、言っておくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it'll eventually sort itself out, but I'll say this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it'll eventually sort itself out, but I'll say this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、ピッチャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin's the pitcher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin's the pitcher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、キャッチャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki's the catcher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki's the catcher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「初耳なんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First time I've heard it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First time I've heard it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴がピッチャーなんだぞ？　鈴のフォロー役はおまえしかいないだろうが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin's the pitcher, is she not? The only one who can support her is you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin's the pitcher, is she not? The only one who can support her is you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ピッチャーは恭介でもいいじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Couldn't you be the pitcher as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Couldn't you be the pitcher as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、きっとおまえの想像通り、俺はすごい球を投げるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I'm sure that it'd be just as you imagine, I would deliver an amazing pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I'm sure that it'd be just as you imagine, I would deliver an amazing pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「けど、そんな順当すぎるのは面白くないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that'd be too easy and boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that'd be too easy and boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕と鈴だと面白いの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's me and Rin, it's going to be interesting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's me and Rin, it's going to be interesting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「面白いじゃないか…熱いものがこみ上げてくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It'll be interesting... You'll fill our hearts with excitement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It'll be interesting... You'll fill our hearts with excitement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でもまあ、キャッチャーは受けるだけだから、そこそこに練習しておけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But well, a catcher only needs to catch, so you need to put only so much effort into practicing that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But well, a catcher only needs to catch, so you need to put only so much effort into practicing that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは４番候補だ。バッティングを鍛えろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're a candidate for the fourth position. Practice your batting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're a candidate for the fourth position. Practice your batting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんでこう、鈴と僕だけに比重が偏るかなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: Why do all the important positions seem to be centered around Rin and I?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why do all the important positions seem to be centered around Rin and I?

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり漫画の影響かなあ…。僕らが登場人物に似てたりして。
MESSAGE.EN: It must be the influence of the manga Kyousuke's been reading... Maybe we resemble some characters in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must be the influence of the manga Kyousuke's been reading... Maybe we resemble some characters in it.

MESSAGE.JP: ありそうでやだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sounds plausible...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sounds plausible...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし。後は適当に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right. The rest will be random.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right. The rest will be random.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンドの片隅。
MESSAGE.EN: In the corner of the sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the corner of the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は小毬さんとクドの二人はキャッチボールをしているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like Komari-san and Kud were playing catch today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like Komari-san and Kud were playing catch today.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よおーし、いっくよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, here I come～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, here I come～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ボールを持った手をぶるんぶるんと振るいながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She proclaimed while winding up to throw a ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: She proclaimed while winding up to throw a ball.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝O, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝O, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対してクドの方は相変わらず戸惑い気味だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud sounded puzzled like always as she responded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud sounded puzzled like always as she responded.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「どぉうりゃぁーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Doryaa～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Doryaa～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気合一閃。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out an enthusiastic yell.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out an enthusiastic yell.

MESSAGE.JP: …投球フォームは砲丸投げのそれのような、ど素人丸出しのものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She threw the baseball just like she was throwing a shot put. She was totally an amateur.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She threw the baseball just like she was throwing a shot put. She was totally an amateur.

MESSAGE.JP: なんというか、力の入り方が全身漏れなく無駄だらけというか。
MESSAGE.EN: More accurately, she clearly had no idea how to use her body when throwing a baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: More accurately, she clearly had no idea how to use her body when throwing a baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: てん、てん、ころころ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thump*, *thump*, *roll*roll*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thump*, *thump*, *roll*roll*...

MESSAGE.JP: そんなフォームなので、クドの足元でぴたり、と止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: And like that, it stopped right at Kud's feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: And like that, it stopped right at Kud's feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 気合だけ、見事に空回り。
MESSAGE.EN: Her fighting spirit was splendidly fruitless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her fighting spirit was splendidly fruitless.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは普通にどうしていいかわからない様子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: As usual, Kud looked like she didn't know what she was supposed to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: As usual, Kud looked like she didn't know what she was supposed to do.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれぇ…おかしいなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh... That's weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh... That's weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、こう、びしゅうーっ、ずばぁんっっていくはずなのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm... It was supposed to go like ❛Whoosh❜ and ❛Slam.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm... It was supposed to go like ❛Whoosh❜ and ❛Slam.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「びしゅうーっ、ずばぁんっっですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Whoosh, slam?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Whoosh, slam?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「びしゅうーっ、ずばぁんっっ、ぼぎゃーんっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Whoosh, slam, boom!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Whoosh, slam, boom!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぼぎゃーんっですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Boom, you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Boom, you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ぼぎゃーんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, boom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, boom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私爆発してしまいますかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Am I supposed to explode?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Am I supposed to explode?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でも爆発しないねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But you aren't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But you aren't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「野球って爆発するのですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do you explode when you play baseball...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do you explode when you play baseball...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、しない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, you don't.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, you don't.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝For the time being.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝For the time being.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隣で見ていた恭介がつぶやく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke, who was standing next to me, murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke, who was standing next to me, murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「恐るべき小毬のスペックの低さだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Komari's parameters are terrifyingly low...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Komari's parameters are terrifyingly low...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド以下ってものすごいよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even below Kud's level, that sure is something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even below Kud's level, that sure is something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり他のメンバー探したほうがいいんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should look for other members after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should look for other members after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドもそうだけど、特に小毬さん球技に向いてないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never mind Kud, but Komari-san doesn't show signs of any talent for baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never mind Kud, but Komari-san doesn't show signs of any talent for baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、小毬には無駄な気迫とオーバーフローな根性がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, Komari is really zealous and has quite some spirit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, Komari is really zealous and has quite some spirit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「技術や筋力は後からでも身に付けることが出来るが、それは天性のものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Learning techniques and becoming stronger can be done with time, but that's a part of one's nature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Learning techniques and becoming stronger can be done with time, but that's a part of one's nature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度二人を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took another look at them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took another look at them.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おんどりゃぁーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eat this～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eat this～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: てん、てん、ころころ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thump*, *thump*, *roll*roll*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thump*, *thump*, *roll*roll*...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの…ど、どんまいです。どんとまいんどです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Don, don't mind. Dontou maindo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Don, don't mind. Dontou maindo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うあーんっ、上手くいかない～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaaah, it's not working～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaaah, it's not working～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず空回りしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her efforts were fruitless as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her efforts were fruitless as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、気迫と根性だけでアレがどうにかなったら苦労しないと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you could achieve everything just by sheer determination, life would be too easy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you could achieve everything just by sheer determination, life would be too easy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「往々にして気合と根性は実力を凌駕するもんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sometimes sheer willpower can surpass physical prowess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sometimes sheer willpower can surpass physical prowess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球ってそういうもんらしいからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And baseball seems like the sort of thing where it's possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And baseball seems like the sort of thing where it's possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはある程度実力が拮抗してる時の話だと思うなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that fact only applies when both teams are on equal level...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that fact only applies when both teams are on equal level...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、ぶっちゃけ俺も不安いっぱいになってきた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, truth be told I'm having doubts myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, truth be told I'm having doubts myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちょっとコーチングしてみるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll try coaching them for a while...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll try coaching them for a while...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、頑張ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good luck with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good luck with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 期待はするな、と言い残し恭介は小毬さんとクドの方へ歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Telling me not to hold my breath, he walked away in their direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Telling me not to hold my breath, he walked away in their direction.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よおーし、いっくよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, here I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, here I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再びグラウンドの片隅で、キャッチボール。
MESSAGE.EN: They resumed playing catch in the corner.
MESSAGE.Translation: They resumed playing catch in the corner.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でりゃあぁーーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Deryaaa-aaaa～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Deryaaa-aaaa～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoo-
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoo-

MESSAGE.JP: ぱぁんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: thud*!
MESSAGE.Translation: thud*!

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ひゃあっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hyaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hyaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …胸元のグローブへ一直線、小気味いい音を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The ball hit the glove square with an agreeable sound, after flying in a perfectly straight line.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The ball hit the glove square with an agreeable sound, after flying in a perfectly straight line.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …自分の目を疑う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I couldn't believe my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I couldn't believe my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: それほど速くはないけど、完全にクドの構えた真正面に入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The speed wasn't all that high, but it made its way to Kud perfectly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The speed wasn't all that high, but it made its way to Kud perfectly.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ、ご、ごめんねクーちゃん…怖かった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, I'm sorry, Kuu-chan... Did that scare you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, I'm sorry, Kuu-chan... Did that scare you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、だいじょうぶです。ちゃんとグローブめがけて飛んできましたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, it's okay. It did hit the glove properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, it's okay. It did hit the glove properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっじょぶだと思います。あいしんくぐっじょぶですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think you did a guddo jobu. Ai shink it's a gudojobu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think you did a guddo jobu. Ai shink it's a gudojobu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへ、そうかな～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが返球し、再び小毬さんが投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed the ball back, and Komari-san pitched again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed the ball back, and Komari-san pitched again.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えぇいやぁーーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eiyaa-aaa～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eiyaa-aaa～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: びっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoo-
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoo-

MESSAGE.JP: すぱぁんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: thump*!
MESSAGE.Translation: thump*!

MESSAGE.JP: …いい球だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a good pitch.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a good pitch.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きょ、恭介…どういうマジックでも使ったのさ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyo, Kyousuke... What kind of magic did you use!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyo, Kyousuke... What kind of magic did you use!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「わからん…自分でもビビってるくらいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know... I can't believe it myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know... I can't believe it myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理想の投球フォームを実演して指導してみたら、ものの二、三球でマスターしやがった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I showed her the perfect pitching form and she mastered it in two-three pitches.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I showed her the perfect pitching form and she mastered it in two-three pitches.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あいつ、今まで物を知らなすぎただけで、実はものすごい運動神経の持ち主なんじゃないか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Could it be that she was simply uninformed before while actually possessing some incredible athletic ability...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Could it be that she was simply uninformed before while actually possessing some incredible athletic ability...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう、ありえないんだかありえるんだかさっぱりわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could no longer tell whether that kind of thing were possible or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could no longer tell whether that kind of thing were possible or not.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず、コントロールはめちゃくちゃいいな…中継ぎとして登録しておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Most importantly her control is amazing... Let's make her a relief pitcher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Most importantly her control is amazing... Let's make her a relief pitcher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いいことなのか悪いことなのかもさっぱりわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't decide whether it was a good thing or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't decide whether it was a good thing or not.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北小毬、ファームから一軍に復帰。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, Komari Kamikita got called up from the farm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, Komari Kamikita got called up from the farm.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子がグラウンド隅に集まって雑談をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The girls gathered in the corner of the sports field to chat.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girls gathered in the corner of the sports field to chat.

MESSAGE.JP: 今は興味を抱けない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not interested right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not interested right now...

MESSAGE.JP: 練習に集中しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll focus on practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll focus on practice.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習が終わり、いつものように道具を片づける。
MESSAGE.EN: After practice was over, we cleaned up the equipment as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: After practice was over, we cleaned up the equipment as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、夕飯までまだ時間はあるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now then, there's still time before dinner...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now then, there's still time before dinner...

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll return to my room and rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll return to my room and rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 家路の途中。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way back.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way back.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、リキ。今お帰りですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Riki. Are you going back now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Riki. Are you going back now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮へ続く広場であのケロケロ便の箱を抱えたクドに呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the square leading to the dorms I was called out by Kud, who was holding a froggy mail box.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the square leading to the dorms I was called out by Kud, who was holding a froggy mail box.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、今から帰るとこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「先ほど井ノ原さんに伝言頼んだのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I asked Inohara-san to tell you something earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I asked Inohara-san to tell you something earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　何も聞いてないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? I haven't heard anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? I haven't heard anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか。うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is that so? Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is that so? Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は胸元の携帯を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took my cellphone out of my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took my cellphone out of my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 特にメールも着信履歴も無い。
MESSAGE.EN: I haven't received any messages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I haven't received any messages.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、それで、ですね、伝言というのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, so that's, um... what I asked him to tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, so that's, um... what I asked him to tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お引っ越しを手伝って下さった方にお礼をしているところなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That I was going to show my gratitude to those who helped me with moving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That I was going to show my gratitude to those who helped me with moving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「良かったらリキもお礼受け取ってくださいませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If it's okay with you, will you accept my thanks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If it's okay with you, will you accept my thanks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、別にいいよ、たいしたことしてないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's fine, I didn't do that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's fine, I didn't do that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そんなことないです。とても、助かりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's not true. You really helped me a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's not true. You really helped me a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はぴーはぴーさんきゅー、ふぃーるらいくじょいなすって感じです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hapi, hapi sankyuu, fiiru raiku joinasu, or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hapi, hapi sankyuu, fiiru raiku joinasu, or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 棒読みのいつもの台詞。
MESSAGE.EN: She said in her usual monotone pronunciation.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said in her usual monotone pronunciation.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑しながら――
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled wryly and...
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled wryly and...

MESSAGE.JP: クドに頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ちょっと待っててください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please wait a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please wait a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮の前で、僕たちは立ち止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: We stopped in front of the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stopped in front of the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は両手が塞がっているクドのためにドアを押さえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the door for Kud, as both of her hands were full.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the door for Kud, as both of her hands were full.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「美魚さんがいるかもしれませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because Mio-san might be inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because Mio-san might be inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さんがいるかもしれませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because Saigusa-san might be inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because Saigusa-san might be inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ルームメイトさんがいるかもしれませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because my roommate might be inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because my roommate might be inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あぁ、なるほど。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I see.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I see.

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたら、部屋にはもう気軽に入ることは出来ないというわけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the case, I couldn't go in whenever I felt like it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the case, I couldn't go in whenever I felt like it.

MESSAGE.JP: 今の今までが少しふつうじゃなかった、のだけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: That changed things a little from before.
MESSAGE.Translation: That changed things a little from before.

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん、と玄関のドアが閉まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The door closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door closed.

MESSAGE.JP: 手持ちぶさたになった僕はドアから離れて、辺りの景色を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had nothing to do, so I stepped back from the door a bit and let my eyes wander.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had nothing to do, so I stepped back from the door a bit and let my eyes wander.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お待たせしました。ちょっと荷物整理してるそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry for making you wait. It seems she's getting some of her baggage into order.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry for making you wait. It seems she's getting some of her baggage into order.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「申し訳ないです…あ、そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm terribly sorry... Ah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm terribly sorry... Ah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬俯いたクドは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked down for a moment and then raised her head again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked down for a moment and then raised her head again.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ、お時間ありますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, do you have time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, do you have time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ではちょっとついてきてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then please come with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then please come with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は歩き出したクドの後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: I followed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I followed her.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えーとえーと。電気電気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Um... Lights, lights.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Um... Lights, lights.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱちん、とスイッチが入る。
MESSAGE.EN: She flipped the light switch on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flipped the light switch on.

MESSAGE.JP: 古い木造の部屋だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an old room with all wooden furniture.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an old room with all wooden furniture.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮の旧館と渡り廊下で繋がった平屋建て。
MESSAGE.EN: We were in a one-story building connected to the old girls' dormitory building by a corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were in a one-story building connected to the old girls' dormitory building by a corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、ここは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what is this place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what is this place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ちょっと前は管理人室だったそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was the administrator's office until a while ago, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was the administrator's office until a while ago, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、寮長さんがいってました、とクドが付け加える。
MESSAGE.EN: She added that the dorm head also used it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She added that the dorm head also used it.

MESSAGE.JP: クッションをぱんぱん、と叩いたクドはそれを僕に渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a cushion after hitting it a few times to make it airy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a cushion after hitting it a few times to make it airy.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「座って待っててください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please sit down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please sit down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが奥へ消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She went off somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went off somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はぐるりと首を巡らし部屋を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I craned my head around to scan the room's interior.
MESSAGE.Translation: I craned my head around to scan the room's interior.

MESSAGE.JP: カレンダーかポスターを貼った白い跡が残る壁。
MESSAGE.EN: The walls, on one of which there were traces of some poster or calendar.
MESSAGE.Translation: The walls, on one of which there were traces of some poster or calendar.

MESSAGE.JP: 蛍光灯と白熱電灯が半分ずつ何故かついている天井。
MESSAGE.EN: The ceiling, of which one half for some reason was illuminated by a fluorescent lamp and half by an incandescent lamp.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ceiling, of which one half for some reason was illuminated by a fluorescent lamp and half by an incandescent lamp.

MESSAGE.JP: 使い込まれた$K104畳$K0に$K105ちゃぶ台$K0。
MESSAGE.EN: The $K105tea-table$K0 on the worn-out $K104tatami$K0 mat.
MESSAGE.Translation: The $K105tea-table$K0 on the worn-out $K104tatami$K0 mat.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お待たせしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry for the wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry for the wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが片手に電気ポット、片手にマグカップをふたつ持ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding an electric kettle in one hand and two mugs in the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding an electric kettle in one hand and two mugs in the other.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今お茶淹れますねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll prepare some tea～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll prepare some tea～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はクッションの上に座りながら尋ねる。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a question to her, sitting on the cushion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a question to her, sitting on the cushion.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前は管理人室だっていうけど、今は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it used to be the administrator's office, what is it now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it used to be the administrator's office, what is it now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今は家庭科部の部室です…正確には、その予定、なんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's now the home economics clubroom... or more accurately, it's supposed to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's now the home economics clubroom... or more accurately, it's supposed to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家庭科部？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Home economics?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Home economics?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい。寮長さんに勧誘されたんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. I was invited to join by the dorm head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. I was invited to join by the dorm head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…あのひと、そんな部活してたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee... was she in such a club?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee... was she in such a club?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「寮長のお仕事がお忙しくて部活動はお休み状態だったようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She has been busy with work, so she had to take a break from the club activities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She has been busy with work, so she had to take a break from the club activities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「部員も一人で、廃部寸前だったらしいんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Since she was the sole member, the club was on the verge of disbanding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Since she was the sole member, the club was on the verge of disbanding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 家具部といい家庭科部といい、クドは余程廃部になりそうな部活動に縁があるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Furniture club and home economics club, seems like she has a knack for joining clubs that are on the verge on disbanding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furniture club and home economics club, seems like she has a knack for joining clubs that are on the verge on disbanding.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あとは個人的な理由で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And I had my own reason to join.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And I had my own reason to join.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「個人的な理由？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your own reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your own reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはマグカップにティーパックを入れ、ポットからお湯を注いでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed a tea bag in the mug and poured hot water into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed a tea bag in the mug and poured hot water into it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドからお茶を受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I accepted the mug of tea from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I accepted the mug of tea from her.

MESSAGE.JP: …そういえば、いつの間にか『直枝さん』が『リキ』になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Now that I think of it, when did she start calling me ❛Riki❜ instead of ❛Naoe-san❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Now that I think of it, when did she start calling me ❛Riki❜ instead of ❛Naoe-san❜?

MESSAGE.JP: クドの言うところの、『ふらんくりぃ～に』というやつなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It might have been a part of what she referred to as wanting to be as ❛frank❜ as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might have been a part of what she referred to as wanting to be as ❛frank❜ as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「本当はリーフから淹れたいのですが、まだ品物が揃ってないので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I really wanted to use tea leaves, but we don't have any yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I really wanted to use tea leaves, but we don't have any yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。ありがと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yep. Thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yep. Thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はちゃぶ台の上に小さな瓶があることに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed a small bottle on the tea table.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed a small bottle on the tea table.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、これはなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、それがお礼の品物なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, that's a token of my gratitude.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, that's a token of my gratitude.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは部屋の片隅に置いてある小さなリュックを引き寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: She brought a small rucksack from the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brought a small rucksack from the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: そのリュックから使い捨ての紙皿を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: From there she brought out a disposable paper plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: From there she brought out a disposable paper plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ティーソーサーの代わりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a substitute for tea saucers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a substitute for tea saucers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「棚にもソーサーがあるはずなんですが埃だらけですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There's some on the shelf, but they're covered in dust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's some on the shelf, but they're covered in dust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがマグカップを差し出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed the mug to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed the mug to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は右手でマグカップを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I accepted it with my left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I accepted it with my left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、と紅茶の匂いがした。
MESSAGE.EN: I sensed the light fragrance of black tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sensed the light fragrance of black tea.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキは、コーヒー党だったりしますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, do you prefer coffee?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, do you prefer coffee?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「特に好みはないよ…クドは紅茶が好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't particularly like it... Do you like black tea, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't particularly like it... Do you like black tea, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ミルクティーは好きです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love milk tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love milk tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも今ピッチャが無いのでフレッシュで我慢です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But there isn't a pitcher around, so I have to make do without it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But there isn't a pitcher around, so I have to make do without it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それからクドは、瓶を手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She picked up the bottle.
MESSAGE.Translation: She picked up the bottle.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…えーと、ジャム？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is err... jam?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is err... jam?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、ジャムです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, it's jam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it's jam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは胸ポケットから銀色のスプーンを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a silver spoon from her chest pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a silver spoon from her chest pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はぁ～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、スプーンに息を掛けて、取り出したハンカチできゅきゅと拭いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She breathed on the spoon and wiped it with a handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: She breathed on the spoon and wiped it with a handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よいしょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There we go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There we go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが瓶のふたに手を掛け、そのスプーンでジャムを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She removed the lid from the bottle, and scooped some jam out of it with her spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: She removed the lid from the bottle, and scooped some jam out of it with her spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙皿の上にジャムが乗せられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She put it onto the paper plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put it onto the paper plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お礼といってもお茶を出すぐらいですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I said I wanted to show my thanks, but it's only tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I said I wanted to show my thanks, but it's only tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どっちかというと、紅茶はおまけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And the black tea is more like a bonus dish here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And the black tea is more like a bonus dish here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが視線で示す先――紙皿の上には赤いジャム。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the red jam on the paper dish.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the red jam on the paper dish.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がよく見るジャムとは違って大きめの果肉が見える。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed there was an unusually large berry in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed there was an unusually large berry in it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こけももジャムです。うちから持ってきたものの一つなんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's cowberry jam. It's one of the things I brought from home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's cowberry jam. It's one of the things I brought from home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがジャムを取るのに使ったスプーンを僕に差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She presented me with the spoon she had used to take out the jam.
MESSAGE.Translation: She presented me with the spoon she had used to take out the jam.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はスプーンを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I took it from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it from her.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お口にあえば嬉しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'd be happy if you tried it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'd be happy if you tried it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: パンか何かにジャムを付けるのかと思ったがそういうわけではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought she'd prepare some bread or something similar for the jam, but it didn't appear that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought she'd prepare some bread or something similar for the jam, but it didn't appear that way.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はちょっと戸惑いながらも、小さな銀色のスプーンでジャムを口に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Reluctantly, I put some of the jam into my mouth with the tiny silver spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Reluctantly, I put some of the jam into my mouth with the tiny silver spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…不思議な味がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What a strange flavor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What a strange flavor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食べ慣れた苺ジャムとかそういうのとはまったく別の味。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something entirely different from the strawberry jam which I was accustomed to.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something entirely different from the strawberry jam which I was accustomed to.

MESSAGE.JP: 果肉の食感もあいまってよけいに不思議さが際だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The texture of the berry only made the flavor all the more strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: The texture of the berry only made the flavor all the more strange.

MESSAGE.JP: すぅ、と香りが鼻を抜けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I inhaled its fragrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I inhaled its fragrance.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…美味しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか、よかったぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really, I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really, I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは嬉しそうに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled delightedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled delightedly.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「学校に入る前のお休みに作ったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I made it during the break before entering school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I made it during the break before entering school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ…んむ…クドのお手製ってやつだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... so you made it yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... so you made it yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、そうなります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yep, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yep, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: これはいわゆるロシアンティーというやつだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: So, does that make this a Russian tea, so to speak?
MESSAGE.Translation: So, does that make this a Russian tea, so to speak?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ジャムを紅茶に入れればいいんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you add the jam to the tea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you add the jam to the tea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「特に作法はない…らしいです。ジャムを味わってもらえればあとはご自由に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There's no particular etiquette... I think. After you taste the jam you can do as you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's no particular etiquette... I think. After you taste the jam you can do as you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: マグカップの中の紅茶は香りがきついタイプのものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like a strong kind of tea, judging by the fragrance coming from the mug.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like a strong kind of tea, judging by the fragrance coming from the mug.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょん、と舌で紅茶だけ味わうと、濃い苦みが感じられる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tasted it with just my tongue and it felt very bitter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tasted it with just my tongue and it felt very bitter.

MESSAGE.JP: スプーンでジャムを入れてぐるぐる回す。
MESSAGE.EN: I put some jam into the mug and stirred it with a spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put some jam into the mug and stirred it with a spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん…ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 苦みに備えたのに、すんなりと喉を通っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was prepared for the bitterness, but it went down my throat effortlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was prepared for the bitterness, but it went down my throat effortlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「美味しい…それしか、言ってないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's good... That's all I can say though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's good... That's all I can say though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の語彙の貧弱さが恥ずかしくなるが、それしか言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I became embarrassed due to my inarticulate response, but I really couldn't say anything else other than that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I became embarrassed due to my inarticulate response, but I really couldn't say anything else other than that.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お世話になったひとにはお手製のジャムで、というのはうちのしきたりみたいなものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's become something of a custom for me to treat people who have helped me out with handmade jam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's become something of a custom for me to treat people who have helped me out with handmade jam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはにこりと微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was smiling broadly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was smiling broadly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。いいしきたりだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep. That's a good custom...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep. That's a good custom...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこでふと気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly it struck me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly it struck me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すごく、外国っぽいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's something really foreigner-ish!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's something really foreigner-ish!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が言うと、クドは一瞬きょとんとして。
MESSAGE.EN: She stared back at me with a blank look on her face for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stared back at me with a blank look on her face for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心底嬉しそうに、笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she burst into a smile, looking genuinely happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she burst into a smile, looking genuinely happy.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今日はおつきあいいただきどうもありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thanks for hanging out with me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thanks for hanging out with me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがぺこん、と頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こっちこそ。ごちそうさま…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should be the one saying that. Thanks for the treat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should be the one saying that. Thanks for the treat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 話をしている間に、すっかり暗くなってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had gotten completely dark while we were talking.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had gotten completely dark while we were talking.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮の入り口でクドは見送ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked me to the dorm's exit.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked me to the dorm's exit.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はちょっと寒いね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a bit cold today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a bit cold today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですね、
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So it is,
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So it is,

MESSAGE.JP: くしゅっ」
MESSAGE.EN: achoo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: achoo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、別にいいよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, there's no need to see me out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, there's no need to see me out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そういうわけにもいきません。それに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't leave it like this. Besides...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't leave it like this. Besides...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはマントの裾をぱたぱたと左右に揺らす。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped on the cuff of her mantle.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped on the cuff of her mantle.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これがあるので外へ行っても大丈夫です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's fine to go outside when I'm wearing this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's fine to go outside when I'm wearing this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 縁取りのされた白いマント。
MESSAGE.EN: Her white mantle with a binding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her white mantle with a binding.

MESSAGE.JP: それをすっぽり羽織ったクドは確かに寒そうには見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Being completely covered up in it, she didn't appear to be feeling cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being completely covered up in it, she didn't appear to be feeling cold.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば訊こうとおもってたんだけど、向こうでも着てたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, I was thinking of asking you this before, did you wear that over there too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, I was thinking of asking you this before, did you wear that over there too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい。寒がりなんです、私。生まれた場所のせいでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I did. I'm sensitive to cold. Probably thanks to where I was born...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I did. I'm sensitive to cold. Probably thanks to where I was born...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「エアコンとかダメな体質？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about an air-conditioner? That wouldn't do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about an air-conditioner? That wouldn't do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あはは。そうですね。エアコンは苦手です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahaha. No, it wouldn't. I'm not good with air-conditioners...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahaha. No, it wouldn't. I'm not good with air-conditioners...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「喉、乾いてヒリヒリしますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I get thirsty and my throat hurts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I get thirsty and my throat hurts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話をしながら、寮を出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We left the dorm while talking in this manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: We left the dorm while talking in this manner.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段のところまでクドはついてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She accompanied me until we reached the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: She accompanied me until we reached the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあまた、明日、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「また後ほどです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝See you soon, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝See you soon, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: マントから右手をちょこん、と出してクドは小さくばいばいをする。
MESSAGE.EN: She struck out her left arm from under the mantle and waved goodbye.
MESSAGE.Translation: She struck out her left arm from under the mantle and waved goodbye.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそれに手を振り返して階段を下りたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved back to her in return, and went down the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved back to her in return, and went down the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…後ほど？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...❛Soon❜?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...❛Soon❜?)

MESSAGE.JP: なんかあるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What did she mean by that?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did she mean by that?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、本当にいいからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you really don't have to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you really don't have to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A, are you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A, are you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、たいしたことしてないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was no big deal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was no big deal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「う、うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm, hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm, hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか、わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝All right, I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝All right, I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあまた、明日、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「また後ほどです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝See you soon, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝See you soon, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: マントから右手をちょこん、と出してクドは小さくばいばいをする。
MESSAGE.EN: She struck out her left arm from under the mantle and waved goodbye.
MESSAGE.Translation: She struck out her left arm from under the mantle and waved goodbye.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿を見送った後。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her off and...
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her off and...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…素直にお礼くらい貰って置けばよかったかなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Maybe I should have accepted her thanks...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Maybe I should have accepted her thanks...)

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとそう思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about it a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about it a bit.

MESSAGE.JP: それともうひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Also...
MESSAGE.Translation: Also...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…後ほど？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...❛Soon❜?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...❛Soon❜?)

MESSAGE.JP: なんかあるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What did she mean by that?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did she mean by that?

MESSAGE.JP: 意地悪のつもりで言ったんじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't say it to rebuke me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't say it to rebuke me.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、そうするしかなかったような、そんな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, I felt that that wasn't in her nature.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, I felt that that wasn't in her nature.

MESSAGE.JP: とんとん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Knock*knock*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Knock*knock*.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食前、宿題をしているところへノック。
MESSAGE.EN: We were working on our homework before supper, when somebody knocked on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were working on our homework before supper, when somebody knocked on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はドアを振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around at the sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around at the sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちょっと腕どけてくれよ、見えねぇっすよ、理樹さぁん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Move your arm a bit, I can't see anything, Riki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Move your arm a bit, I can't see anything, Riki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今、ノックの音したよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did somebody knock on the door just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did somebody knock on the door just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どーせ、恭介たちだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Must be Kyousuke and the rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Must be Kyousuke and the rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介たちはノックしないって。お客さんだよ。誰だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke never knocks on the door. It's a guest. Wonder who it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke never knocks on the door. It's a guest. Wonder who it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がり、ドアを開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I got to my feet and opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got to my feet and opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんばんは～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Good evening～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Good evening～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、葉留佳さん、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, Haruka-san, what's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, Haruka-san, what's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕に袋を押しつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san handed me a bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san handed me a bag.

MESSAGE.JP: お下げがふわり、と宙を舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her pigtails danced in the air as she moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her pigtails danced in the air as she moved.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか甘い香り。
MESSAGE.EN: The bag was giving off a sweet fragrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bag was giving off a sweet fragrance.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何、これ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、真人くんも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here, some for Masato-kun too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here, some for Masato-kun too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…何だよオレにもか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Huh, for me too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Huh, for me too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は小さな焦げ茶色の紙袋を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the dark brown paper bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the dark brown paper bag.

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、と砂糖の焦げた匂い。
MESSAGE.EN: I was struck by the smell of burned sugar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was struck by the smell of burned sugar.

MESSAGE.JP: …そうか。この甘い匂いの正体に直ぐ気がつく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I see. I realized what the source of the sweet fragrance was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I see. I realized what the source of the sweet fragrance was.

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前の葉留佳さんは砂糖とバターの匂いを微かにまとっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was enveloped by the faint fragrance of sugar and butter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was enveloped by the faint fragrance of sugar and butter.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙袋から中身をひとつ、摘んで出してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out what was inside the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out what was inside the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひょっとして、昼間のあれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Could this be what you were talking about this afternoon?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Could this be what you were talking about this afternoon?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。パンの耳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right, right. The bread crust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right, right. The bread crust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が、うぇ、と言いながら紙袋を摘んで遠ざける仕草をする。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato went ❛Ueh,❜ and distanced himself from the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato went ❛Ueh,❜ and distanced himself from the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「卵白とミルク砂糖に浸して揚げたやつだから。おやつにでも食べるといいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was soaked in milk, albumen and sugar and then fried. You can eat it as a snack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was soaked in milk, albumen and sugar and then fried. You can eat it as a snack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うまいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is it any good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is it any good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのままパンの耳のみで食べるよりはね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, better than eating bread crust.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, better than eating bread crust.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「プリン、というわけにはいかないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It didn't become a pudding though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It didn't become a pudding though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、軽くウィンクをするともうひとつ紙袋を僕に渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: She winked slightly, and handed me another paper bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She winked slightly, and handed me another paper bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And this is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And this is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「謙吾くんたちの分。謙吾くんたちにも渡してあげてよ。じゃ、用事あるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's for Kengo-kun and everyone else, please give it to them. Well, I have some business to attend to, so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's for Kengo-kun and everyone else, please give it to them. Well, I have some business to attend to, so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんな用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of business?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of business?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは。ちょっと、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha. Just a little something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha. Just a little something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どーせ寮長に呼ばれてるんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I bet you were called by the dorm head again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I bet you were called by the dorm head again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の台詞は図星らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems he was right on the money.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems he was right on the money.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…最近遅刻多かったからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I've been late a lot recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I've been late a lot recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「自業自得だな、三枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You reap what you sow, Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You reap what you sow, Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは…まぁ、そいうわけで。ばいばい、理樹くん、真人くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... Well, that's how it is. Bye-bye, Riki-kun, Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... Well, that's how it is. Bye-bye, Riki-kun, Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。また明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドアを閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…んぐ、ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Ngu, mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Ngu, mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、真人？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「意外とうまいかもしれん…こいつは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a lot better than I expected...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a lot better than I expected...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へー…どれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee... Let me try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee... Let me try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は黄金色に焼き色がついたそれを食べた。
MESSAGE.EN: They were baked to a golden crunch. I tried one.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were baked to a golden crunch. I tried one.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ほんとだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに美味しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was delicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was delicious.

MESSAGE.JP: チープな甘い味。
MESSAGE.EN: It had a somewhat plain taste.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had a somewhat plain taste.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそれが微妙に懐かしい気もした。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was also something slightly nostalgic about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was also something slightly nostalgic about it.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとだけ駄菓子っぽい。
MESSAGE.EN: It reminded me of cheap sweets.
MESSAGE.Translation: It reminded me of cheap sweets.

MESSAGE.JP: 多分、三枝さんの手作りなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably made it herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably made it herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うーむぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを食べながら、宿題を取り組む。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was struggling with his homework as he ate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was struggling with his homework as he ate.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こりゃとまらねえな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is too good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is too good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夕食前なんだから、食べ過ぎないようにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We still haven't had dinner, don't eat too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We still haven't had dinner, don't eat too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いつつ、僕の手も次々進む。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I grabbed one after another myself as I said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I grabbed one after another myself as I said this.

MESSAGE.JP: 懐かしい感じだ。小学生の頃に戻ったような。
MESSAGE.EN: What a nostalgic feeling. As if I was back in elementary school.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a nostalgic feeling. As if I was back in elementary school.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、理樹。にやにやしてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What is it, Riki? You're grinning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What is it, Riki? You're grinning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別になんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ならいいけどな…んぐんぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right then... Ngu, ngu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right then... Ngu, ngu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 奇妙に嬉しく感じる自分を発見していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself feeling strangely happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself feeling strangely happy.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、宿題を終える頃には紙袋はすっかり空になっていたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why the paper bag was empty by the time I finished my homework.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why the paper bag was empty by the time I finished my homework.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食を終えて戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned after the dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned after the dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、今日はどうするかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now then, what shall we do tonight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now then, what shall we do tonight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介と謙吾も一緒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and Kengo came together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and Kengo came together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、鈴は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, where's Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, where's Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あいつなら女子寮に戻ってったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She went back to the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She went back to the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが部屋に集まってるのに、珍しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though everyone else was here, how unusual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though everyone else was here, how unusual.

MESSAGE.JP: と、ドアをノックする音が。
MESSAGE.EN: Then someone knocked on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then someone knocked on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君ーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki～.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんとクドのふたりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Komari-san and Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Komari-san and Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした、そんなに慌てて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's got you so agitated?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's got you so agitated?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あのですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいはい、なになに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「大変なんですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's awful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's awful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、待って、なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, hold on, what's so awful?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, hold on, what's so awful?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「大変だから来てくださいといえと言われたのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's awful, so we were told to bring you over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's awful, so we were told to bring you over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「言われましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We were.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We were.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha, haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha, haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まったく大変そうに見えないふたりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: These two didn't seem too worked up about whatever was supposed to be so awful.
MESSAGE.Translation: These two didn't seem too worked up about whatever was supposed to be so awful.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだ？　ケンカか？　バトルか？　熱い拳と拳のぶつかり合いか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? A fight? A battle? A clash of passionate fists?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? A fight? A battle? A clash of passionate fists?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そういうんじゃないとは思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't think that's it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't think that's it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それなら僕じゃなくて、謙吾や真人に声が掛かるはずだし。
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the case, they'd call for Kengo or Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the case, they'd call for Kengo or Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ筋肉を借りにきたか。えーーと、どうしたもんかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, did you come to borrow muscles? Um... What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, did you come to borrow muscles? Um... What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それも違うと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's it either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's it either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「とにかく来て～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Anyway, come with us～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Anyway, come with us～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　ちょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、よくわからんが行ってこいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm not sure what this is about, but you should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'm not sure what this is about, but you should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー、僕ひとり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, by myself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, by myself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たまにはいいだろ、俺たちと遊ぶより楽しいかもしれないぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that okay every now and then? It might be more fun than hanging with us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that okay every now and then? It might be more fun than hanging with us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大変って、なにが大変なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You say it's awful, but what exactly is going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You say it's awful, but what exactly is going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なにが、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What is going on...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What is going on...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mmmh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mmmh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…あんまり大変じゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...It's not really that awful I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...It's not really that awful I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 正直者だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was honest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was honest.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君忙しいみたいだし、今回はしょうがないねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you seem busy, so it can't be helped this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you seem busy, so it can't be helped this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「残念なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、あんまり大変じゃないから帰るよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, it's not so awful, so we're going back～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, it's not so awful, so we're going back～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おつかれさまなのですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thanks for the hard work～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thanks for the hard work～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは慌しく帰っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: And they left.
MESSAGE.Translation: And they left.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか…理樹は俺たちを選んだか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see... So Riki chose us, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see... So Riki chose us, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なら、あいつらに負けねぇほど今夜は弾けなきゃな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, we'll have some real fun, without losing to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, we'll have some real fun, without losing to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「またそういう対抗意識を…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Again that competitive spirit of yours...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Again that competitive spirit of yours...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日の授業？　はっ、そんなもんはしらねぇな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Tomorrow's classes? Hah, who cares about that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Tomorrow's classes? Hah, who cares about that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰も訊いてないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nobody asked you anything yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nobody asked you anything yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちは今、この瞬間だけをただひたすらに楽しむぜ、みんな準備はいいかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, our only concern is to enjoy this moment to the fullest, is everyone ready!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, our only concern is to enjoy this moment to the fullest, is everyone ready!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なんの準備」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, ready for what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, ready for what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろん、わくわくする心の準備だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, ready to feel some excitement!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, ready to feel some excitement!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「くる…くるぞっ、ものすごいスピードで俺たちのサタデーナイトフィーバーが!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's coming... It's coming at an unbelievable speed, our Saturday Night Fever!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's coming... It's coming at an unbelievable speed, our Saturday Night Fever!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「火曜だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Tuesday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Tuesday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「きたあああぁぁぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's heeeere!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's heeeere!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「４マス進む、と。うわ、また借金だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Move forward by four squares. Whoa, another debt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Move forward by four squares. Whoa, another debt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あ、子供生まれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ah, a child was born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ah, a child was born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前振りの割に内容は地味だった…。
MESSAGE.EN: This wasn't living up to the hype just now...
MESSAGE.Translation: This wasn't living up to the hype just now...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「男だけでまったりと、こういうのもたまにいいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Getting together with guys like this isn't too bad sometimes, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Getting together with guys like this isn't too bad sometimes, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいけどさ…あの前振りなんだったんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It isn't... But why did you make such a big deal out of it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It isn't... But why did you make such a big deal out of it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちなみに朝までだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝By the way, we're keeping this up 'til morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By the way, we're keeping this up 'til morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すでに飽きて、眠いんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm already tired and sleepy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm already tired and sleepy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、あれだ、野球盤に切り替えよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, then let's switch to tabletop baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, then let's switch to tabletop baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもすぐ飽きそうだし、そろそろ寝ようよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll get tired of it right away, let's crash already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll get tired of it right away, let's crash already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうして恭介はやり飽きた遊びも繰り返せるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How can he even play these games everyone's gotten tired of already...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can he even play these games everyone's gotten tired of already...?

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、俺南海な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I choose ❛Southern Sea.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I choose ❛Southern Sea.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にいつまでも子供のような人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: This person really was an eternal child.
MESSAGE.Translation: This person really was an eternal child.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふわぁ…眠い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Fuwa... I wanna sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Fuwa... I wanna sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした、ここでリタイヤか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, already retiring here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, already retiring here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、ボードゲームでもう四時間ぐらいぶっ通しで遊んでるから無理ないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's no wonder since we've been playing board games for four hours straight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's no wonder since we've been playing board games for four hours straight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「色恋沙汰の話でもするか。盛り上がるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's talk about love. Exciting, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's talk about love. Exciting, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まるで修学旅行の夜だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like a night on a field trip...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like a night on a field trip...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹は誰が好きなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do you have someone you like, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do you have someone you like, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで僕から話さないといけないんだよ…恭介は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do I have to start... How about you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do I have to start... How about you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、理樹は誰が好きなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら僕もいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I don't like anyone either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I don't like anyone either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いないはずないだろう、その歳で思春期の真っ直中でよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That can't be true, you're at that age now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That can't be true, you're at that age now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、恭介にも居るはずだよ。恭介から言ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then it can't be true for you either. So you start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then it can't be true for you either. So you start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、理樹は誰が好きなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、謙吾っ、なんとかしてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, Kengo, say something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, Kengo, say something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あいつらにはいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They don't have anyone they like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They don't have anyone they like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、理樹は誰が好きなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, who do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで僕だけっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why just me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why just me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいから吐いちまえよ、楽になるぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, let it off your chest, you'll feel better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, let it off your chest, you'll feel better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっき見てたでしょ？　僕は小毬さんたちと遊ぶのを断って、ここに留まった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you see what I did before? I just refused to go with Komari-san and stayed here instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you see what I did before? I just refused to go with Komari-san and stayed here instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ってことは、なんだ、理樹は女子より恭介が好き、ということか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So wait, does that mean that rather than girls, you like Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So wait, does that mean that rather than girls, you like Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh...❞
