MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「え、まじかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Eh, is that true...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Eh, is that true...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真剣な目で見つめられる…。
MESSAGE.EN: He was staring at me with a serious look in his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was staring at me with a serious look in his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしまじだったら、恭介は…その…どう感じるのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What if I said it's true, Kyousuke... Um... How would you feel...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What if I said it's true, Kyousuke... Um... How would you feel...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そりゃ嬉しいさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'd feel happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I'd feel happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「仲間ん中でも、特におまえのことは可愛く思ってたからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Among my friends, I always thought you were the cute one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Among my friends, I always thought you were the cute one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろんあいつも可愛いさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, she's cute too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, she's cute too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ…恭介からすれば世話のかかる弟、みたいなものなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What's this...? Did he only look at me as a little brother who he had to take care of?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's this...? Did he only look at me as a little brother who he had to take care of?

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとがっかり。
MESSAGE.EN: What a let down.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a let down.

MESSAGE.JP: って、どんな思われ方を想像していたんだ、僕はっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, just how was I thinking he'd see me!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, just how was I thinking he'd see me!?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、顔赤くね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, is your face red?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, is your face red?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや…赤くねぇから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no... It isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no... It isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうして夜も更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...

MESSAGE.JP: まじだけど、ごまかしておかないと、僕らの関係が壊れてしまう気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It was true, but I felt that if I didn't lie to him, our relationship would fall apart.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was true, but I felt that if I didn't lie to him, our relationship would fall apart.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな馬鹿な。何考えてるのかしらないけど、僕も恭介も男なのに、まじもなにもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you stupid? I have no idea what you're talking about, but both Kyousuke and I are guys, so it's out of the question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you stupid? I have no idea what you're talking about, but both Kyousuke and I are guys, so it's out of the question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか…なんかそういうのもアリみたいな空気だったからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see... It somehow seemed like it wasn't impossible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see... It somehow seemed like it wasn't impossible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなわけないでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、恭介の番。恭介の好きな人は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, your turn Kyousuke. Who do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, your turn Kyousuke. Who do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今んとこ、理樹が一番だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, Riki's number one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right now, Riki's number one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相思相愛っ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Mutual love!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Mutual love!?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹…おまえ照れてないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki... Are you blushing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki... Are you blushing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや…絶対そんなことありませんから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no... That's totally impossible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no... That's totally impossible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「顔が真っ赤だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Your face is all red.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Your face is all red.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだろう、風邪でも引いちゃったかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder why, maybe I've caught a cold...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder why, maybe I've caught a cold...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうしよう…恭介も僕のことが好きだったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do...? Kyousuke likes me too...
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do...? Kyousuke likes me too...

MESSAGE.JP: 男同士でも、相手が恭介なら…
MESSAGE.EN: We're both guys, but it's Kyousuke, so...
MESSAGE.Translation: We're both guys, but it's Kyousuke, so...

MESSAGE.JP: って、何考えてるんだ、僕は…!?
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, what the heck am I thinking about...!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, what the heck am I thinking about...!?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつ汗までかいてきてるぞ、大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He started sweating, is he okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He started sweating, is he okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫です…おかまいなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm okay... Don't worry about me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm okay... Don't worry about me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もし理樹も恭介が好きだったら、結ばれちまうもんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If Riki liked Kyousuke too, they'd be a total couple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If Riki liked Kyousuke too, they'd be a total couple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんなことになってたら、理樹とふたりきりで居られる時間がなくなるところだったから、よかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thank goodness, if that happened, I wouldn't be able to be together with Riki any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thank goodness, if that happened, I wouldn't be able to be together with Riki any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三角関係っ!?
MESSAGE.EN: A love triangle!?
MESSAGE.Translation: A love triangle!?

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、もう何を考えてるんだ、本当に…。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, what am I thinking about, seriously...
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, what am I thinking about, seriously...

MESSAGE.JP: みんな友達。友情で繋がっているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We're all friends. We're linked by friendship.
MESSAGE.Translation: We're all friends. We're linked by friendship.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな不埒なことを考えるなんて、友情への冒涜に等しいぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: Having indecent thoughts like this, it's a desecration of our friendship.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having indecent thoughts like this, it's a desecration of our friendship.

MESSAGE.JP: 鎮まれ、僕。
MESSAGE.EN: Calm down, me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Calm down, me.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、俺とやらないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you wanna do it with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you wanna do it with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした、野球盤だぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong? I meant tabletop baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong? I meant tabletop baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわああぁああぁ、なんて思い違いをしてしまったんだあぁあぁぁぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Uooooh, what a misunderstanding I just had!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Uooooh, what a misunderstanding I just had!!

MESSAGE.JP: 友情に対する冒涜だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a desecration of our friendship...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a desecration of our friendship...

MESSAGE.JP: 友情様、ごめんなさい…。
MESSAGE.EN: God of friendship, forgive me...
MESSAGE.Translation: God of friendship, forgive me...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺大洋な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I choose ❛Ocean.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I choose ❛Ocean.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうして夜も更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よおーし、いこー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, let's go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, let's go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「行くのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You leave me no choice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You leave me no choice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …強引に引っ張られていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They dragged me away against my will.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They dragged me away against my will.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…どこまでいくの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Where are we going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Where are we going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、大変だからー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's an awful problem～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's an awful problem～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 答えになってない……。
MESSAGE.EN: That doesn't really answer anything...
MESSAGE.Translation: That doesn't really answer anything...

MESSAGE.JP: さらにそのまま引っ張られていく。
MESSAGE.EN: They were just pulling me along.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were just pulling me along.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうぞ、入ってくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Come on in, please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Come on in, please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背中を押されて、クドの部屋に。
MESSAGE.EN: She pushed my back, forcing me into her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pushed my back, forcing me into her room.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おー、きたきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ooh, he's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ooh, he's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ご苦労さん、ふたりとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well done, you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well done, you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うんー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「任務完了ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Mission accomplished.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Mission accomplished.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んじゃ、うぇるかむとぅークド公んちーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right, welcome to Little Kud's room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right, welcome to Little Kud's room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　え？　なんか全然わかんないんだけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Huh? What's this all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Huh? What's this all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: …勢ぞろいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They're all here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They're all here.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、大変楽しいお泊り会の始まりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, let's begin the awfully fun-filled sleepover party.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, let's begin the awfully fun-filled sleepover party.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「たいへんだー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's awful～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's awful～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「たいへんですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Awful～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Awful～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや、ちょっと待ってよっ!!　お泊り会ってなにっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no, wait up! What's this about a sleepover party!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no, wait up! What's this about a sleepover party!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、ちょっと待たない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, no one will wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, no one will wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…観念した方がいいと思います、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I think you'd better give up, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I think you'd better give up, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや観念とかそういう話じゃなくて、僕がこんなとこにいたらまずいでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, that's not the problem, isn't it dangerous for me to stay here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, that's not the problem, isn't it dangerous for me to stay here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いいじゃないか、面白いから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why not? It'll be fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why not? It'll be fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはははは面白いに決まってますヨっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, of course it will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, of course it will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: このふたりには何を言っても無駄な気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have a feeling it's useless to say anything to those two...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have a feeling it's useless to say anything to those two...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴もなんか言ってよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you say something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you say something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ごめん、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm sorry, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm sorry, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の傍らには、ビニール袋に入ったたくさんの高そうな猫缶が。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a plastic bag full of cat food beside her.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a plastic bag full of cat food beside her.

MESSAGE.JP: 買収されてるし…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's been bribed...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's been bribed...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか、ルームメイトの人はどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, what about your roommate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, what about your roommate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、今日は何かご用事とかで、おうちのほうに戻っていらっしゃいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems that she had some business at home, so she went back there for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems that she had some business at home, so she went back there for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お部屋の掃除だけきちんとしておけば、問題はないみたいですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If we clean up afterward, there won't be a problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If we clean up afterward, there won't be a problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっち方面でも逃げ道はないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: No escape in that direction either...
MESSAGE.Translation: No escape in that direction either...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まあまあ、こっち来て座ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, well, come and sit over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, well, come and sit over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…男らしくないですよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Aren't you acting unmanly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Aren't you acting unmanly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがいる以上、もう逃げられそうにもないしなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Running away would be impossible since Kurugaya-san was here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Running away would be impossible since Kurugaya-san was here...

MESSAGE.JP: ため息をひとつ吐いて、ベッドに腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed and sat down on the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed and sat down on the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、理樹君も覚悟を決めて、むしろハーレム状態じゃんヒャッホウこいつぁうっはうはだぜと気持ちを切り替えたところで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, Riki-kun has finally made up his mind to go ❛yahoo❜ and enjoy this harem situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, Riki-kun has finally made up his mind to go ❛yahoo❜ and enjoy this harem situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそんな切り替え方はしてないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I've made no such decision...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I've made no such decision...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「始めるとしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んじゃあ鈴ちゃん一番風呂ねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, you take a bath first, Rin-chan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, you take a bath first, Rin-chan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、お風呂？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, a bath?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, a bath?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そーだよー、あんだけ汗かいてきたんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right, since we sweated so much earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right, since we sweated so much earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのまま寝るなんて女の子のやることじゃありません。むしろ人として間違ってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Going to sleep like this is something no girl would do. Or rather, no person would do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Going to sleep like this is something no girl would do. Or rather, no person would do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んでほら、パジャマも持参」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And see, we've all brought pajamas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And see, we've all brought pajamas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…あたしはいい。着替えもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm fine. I don't have a change of clothes either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm fine. I don't have a change of clothes either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃん、はるちゃんの言うとおり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, it's just as Haru-chan said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, it's just as Haru-chan said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ちゃんとお風呂で汗を流さないとダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You have to take a bath and wash away the sweat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You have to take a bath and wash away the sweat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつがいるだろっ、そんなんで入れるかーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's here too, I can't take a bath like this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's here too, I can't take a bath like this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぶんぶんと僕を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at me.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、一応そういうとこは気にしてくれてるんだな。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, so she does care after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, so she does care after all.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んじゃこうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mm, let's do this then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mm, let's do this then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …タオルで目隠しをされる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She blindfolded me with a towel.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She blindfolded me with a towel.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ついでに腕も縛っておくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝While you're at it, how about you tie his arms too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝While you're at it, how about you tie his arms too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんで、あとはここで監視してたら気にならないっしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And with that, if I keep an eye on him here, it won't be a problem, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And with that, if I keep an eye on him here, it won't be a problem, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…気になるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It will!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It will!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ私が一緒に入ってあげる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll take a bath together with you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll take a bath together with you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「い、いやだっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I, I don't wanna!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I, I don't wanna!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ならば私の出番か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is it my turn then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is it my turn then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もっといやじゃーっ、ぼけーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's even worse, idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's even worse, idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ならば小毬君と私と理樹君と、誰がいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then, between me, Komari-kun and Riki-kun, who do you choose?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then, between me, Komari-kun and Riki-kun, who do you choose?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何で僕まで混じってるのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why'd you include me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why'd you include me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「一応三択だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You have three options.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You have three options.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まてっ、どれもいやじゃーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No wait, none of you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No wait, none of you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に小毬さんとならいいじゃない、女の子同士だし。他は問題ありそうだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why don't you go with Komari-san? She's a girl too, after all. The other one could be troublesome though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why don't you go with Komari-san? She's a girl too, after all. The other one could be troublesome though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、この私のどこが問題なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What? You're saying that I'd be troublesome?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What? You're saying that I'd be troublesome?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや言動と行動の節々がさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, both what you say and what you do are a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, both what you say and what you do are a little...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は黙り込んでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばふっと音がする。部屋の隅にある、布団の山に隠れてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Judging by the sound she hid herself in the futon in the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Judging by the sound she hid herself in the futon in the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ま、また逃げられてしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She, she ran away from me again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She, she ran away from me again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鈴さんは小毬さんが嫌いなんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, do you dislike Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, do you dislike Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「が、がーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ga, gaan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ga, gaan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そ、そうだったのか～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So that's how it is～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So that's how it is～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「べ、別に嫌いじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It, it's not that I dislike you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It, it's not that I dislike you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん？　んじゃなんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mm? Then what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mm? Then what?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「はずかしい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's embarrassing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's embarrassing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これでは仕方ありませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、一緒に入ったら楽しいのになぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm, and it'd be so much fun to go together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm, and it'd be so much fun to go together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ご、ごめん…こまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm... I'm sorry... Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm... I'm sorry... Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「恥ずかしがり屋さんならしょうがないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It can't be helped that you're shy～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It can't be helped that you're shy～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあクーちゃん、入ろうか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, Kuu-chan, let's go in～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, Kuu-chan, let's go in～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わあっ、ここで脱いじゃダメだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Waah, you can't undress here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Waah, you can't undress here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、いつものくせで…すみませんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu～, it's a habit... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu～, it's a habit... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何、いつも通りで構わん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, I don't mind you acting like you always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, I don't mind you acting like you always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「か、かまうよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I do～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I do～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …タオルの向こうでは色々危うい事態が発生してるようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Apparently, a lot of dangerous things were afoot on the other side of the towel...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Apparently, a lot of dangerous things were afoot on the other side of the towel...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それじゃーいってくるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, let's go～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, let's go～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いってきますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、行ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, let's be off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, let's be off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや姉御はお留守番ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, Anego, you stay here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, Anego, you stay here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「むう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Muu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Muu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そんな会話を聞いていると、急にタオルがほどかれた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As I listened to them, the towel was suddenly removed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As I listened to them, the towel was suddenly removed.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もういいでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's fine now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's fine now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ありがとう西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Th, thank you, Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Th, thank you, Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「くすぐったりした方がいいんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I wonder if I should have tickled you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I wonder if I should have tickled you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…止めてくれるとうれしいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm glad you didn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm glad you didn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あははははは鼻毛鼻毛～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha nose hair, nose hair～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha nose hair, nose hair～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒い糸を鼻に突っ込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She plunged a black thread into my nostril.
MESSAGE.Translation: She plunged a black thread into my nostril.

MESSAGE.JP: …縛られてるので抵抗できない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was tied up and couldn't resist.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was tied up and couldn't resist.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっ、葉留佳さんそれ無しっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha-, cut that out, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha-, cut that out, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「幸せですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you happy?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I, I don't want to!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You, you don't want to go with me...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm disappointed. You'll go with Komari-san, but not with me...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, go with her～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All, all right...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, come to think of it, aren't you going to wear your pajamas?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... I don't really mind being different.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, it's better if you don't.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうことさ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか嫌な予感がする。

MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had a bad premonition.

MESSAGE.EN: The two of them returned from the shower room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of them returned from the shower room.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いいお湯でしたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The water felt good～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The water felt good～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆでだこ状態の鈴が、ふらふらとベッドの方に歩いていき、ばたりと倒れこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Now red from the hot water, Rin staggered toward the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now red from the hot water, Rin staggered toward the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…瀕死だな」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...She's barely alive.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let's bring her a cold towel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よっぽど恥ずかしかったんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: That must've been really embarrassing.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must've been really embarrassing.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ほんとはもっといっぱい入ってたかったのですが、後がつかえてたのでしょうがないですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wanted to spend more time in the bath, but I had to resist because I've got a lot of guests today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wanted to spend more time in the bath, but I had to resist because I've got a lot of guests today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそしたら鈴が本気で倒れるからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you did, Rin would really have collapsed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you did, Rin would really have collapsed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これはおねーさんとは無理か」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I guess going with Onee-san will be impossible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「絶対いやじゃーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Not a chance!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not a chance!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――――!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――――!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped. Anego, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, why not?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What about you, Mio-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What about you, Mio-kun?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I took a bath before coming here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I took a bath before coming here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに西園さんはガードが固い。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected of Nishizono-san, she didn't let her guard down.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected of Nishizono-san, she didn't let her guard down.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well, I'll help myself then.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you coming too, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だからごく自然に誘うのやめてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm telling you, stop inviting me so casually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm telling you, stop inviting me so casually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私は別に構わないんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't really mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't really mind.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeh, but I, I um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeh, but I, I um...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, no need to worry since I'm against the idea as well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, no need to worry since I'm against the idea as well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、いくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はいよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeppers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeppers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりがシャワールームへ。
MESSAGE.EN: They headed to the shower room.
MESSAGE.Translation: They headed to the shower room.

MESSAGE.JP: …出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They returned.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They returned.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か葉留佳さんが複雑な表情を。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had a complicated expression on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had a complicated expression on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうしたのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what's the matter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what's the matter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや、あれですネ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, how should I put it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, how should I put it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おっぱいぼーーんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝BOOBIE――――XXXPLOSION!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝BOOBIE――――XXXPLOSION!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御すげえっスヨ!!　生は迫力が一味違うっスヨ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego is amazing! Seeing them in the flesh makes a real impact!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego is amazing! Seeing them in the flesh makes a real impact!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、よせよ。照れるじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, stop that. You're making me blush.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, stop that. You're making me blush.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやーあれは女として自信なくしてしまいますヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm going to lose my confidence as a woman like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm going to lose my confidence as a woman like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いやまあ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, um...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, um...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんは入らないんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, aren't you going to take a bath too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, aren't you going to take a bath too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…ぼ、僕も？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Me, me too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Me, me too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んなこと言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「着替えもないしなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't have a change of clothes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't have a change of clothes...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Go take a bath, you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Go take a bath, you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ですよ、ゆーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do it, you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do it, you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「と、申しております」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You heard them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You heard them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とか悩んでる間に。
MESSAGE.EN: And while I was pondering.
MESSAGE.Translation: And while I was pondering.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがなにやらデジカメを西園さんに手渡していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw Kurugaya-san pass a digital camera over to Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw Kurugaya-san pass a digital camera over to Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかものすごい身の危険を感じるやり取りが、目の前で展開されてるんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have a very bad feeling about what's happening right here right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have a very bad feeling about what's happening right here right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何を撮るつもりなのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what're you going to be taking pictures of...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what're you going to be taking pictures of...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「な、何を…ですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛Wh, what❜... You ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛Wh, what❜... You ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なにを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛What❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛What❜...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......*Blush*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......*Blush*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なにを想像したか知らないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't have a clue what you're imagining...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't have a clue what you're imagining...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…かしゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Click.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Click.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ファインダーを覗き込み、撮る真似をする。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking through the finder pretending to take a picture.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking through the finder pretending to take a picture.

MESSAGE.JP: なんなんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What exactly was that about...
MESSAGE.Translation: What exactly was that about...

MESSAGE.JP: …結局入ることに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had to take a bath in the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had to take a bath in the end.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかもう、最悪の日だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What a horrible day...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What a horrible day...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最近思うけど、来ヶ谷さんって恭介の数倍タチが悪い気がするなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have a feeling that Kurugaya-san has been N times worse than Kyousuke lately...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have a feeling that Kurugaya-san has been N times worse than Kyousuke lately...

MESSAGE.JP: …でも。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（鈴がこうやって、友達と泊まり会なんて出来るようになったんだから、それはいいことなのかな？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Isn't it great that Rin can even take part in sleepover parties like this with friends, now?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Isn't it great that Rin can even take part in sleepover parties like this with friends, now?)

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、まだ自然にとは行かないみたいだけど、今のバスターズを結成する前から考えたら、すごい進歩だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, it still doesn't come naturally to her, but compared to how she was when the Busters was formed, it's a huge step forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, it still doesn't come naturally to her, but compared to how she was when the Busters was formed, it's a huge step forward.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be...
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ひょっとして、僕がムリヤリ参加させられたのって、鈴のためか？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Mayhap, I was forced to take part in this for Rin's sake?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Mayhap, I was forced to take part in this for Rin's sake?)

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さん、いつもあの態度だから考えは読めないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san's always like this, so it's hard for me to judge her intentions...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san's always like this, so it's hard for me to judge her intentions...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴があの場に居やすいように、わざわざ僕を参加させたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It could be that she made me participate in this so that it would be easier for Rin to stay.
MESSAGE.Translation: It could be that she made me participate in this so that it would be easier for Rin to stay.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、やっぱりよくわかんないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I can't be too sure about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I can't be too sure about that.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、もしそうだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: But if that's really the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if that's really the case.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一日くらい、犠牲になってもいいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can at least sacrifice a day for her sake...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can at least sacrifice a day for her sake...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、そう思うことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to assume this mindset for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to assume this mindset for now.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだかんだで、照れくさいけど、僕だって結構楽しいかもしれないし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Besides, even though I'm embarrassed, I'm actually having fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Besides, even though I'm embarrassed, I'm actually having fun.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…前言撤回」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I take back what I just said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I take back what I just said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …脱衣所に僕の制服はすでになく、代わりに女子の制服が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My uniform was no longer in the dressing room, and in its place was a girl's uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My uniform was no longer in the dressing room, and in its place was a girl's uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: 嫌な予感の正体はこれか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is this the source of the ominous premonition I had earlier...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is this the source of the ominous premonition I had earlier...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なにかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドア越しに会話。
MESSAGE.EN: I started talking through the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started talking through the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕に何をさせたいのさっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What in the world are you trying to make me do!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What in the world are you trying to make me do!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「$K100ふんどし$K0のほうが良かったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Would you like a $K100sumo loincloth$K0 better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Would you like a $K100sumo loincloth$K0 better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっといやだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That'd be even worse!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That'd be even worse!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、まさかぱんつ一丁で女子寮を練り歩くわけにも行くまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, you can't be marching around the girls' dorm in your underwear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, you can't be marching around the girls' dorm in your underwear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、それはそれでステキなことだな。やるなら応援するぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that'd actually be wonderful in itself. If you're going for it, I'll cheer you on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that'd actually be wonderful in itself. If you're going for it, I'll cheer you on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あああーーーもううーーーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aaah, geez!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aaah, geez!❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり厄日だっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: It's an awful day after all!
MESSAGE.Translation: It's an awful day after all!

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君かわいい～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you're cute～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you're cute～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「かわいいです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Cute～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Cute～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら僕の頭にリボンをつけるふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: They complimented me while tying a ribbon in my hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: They complimented me while tying a ribbon in my hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はは…ありがと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha... Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha... Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …もうやけくそ気味だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I just didn't care anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I just didn't care anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…似合ってるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It looks good on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It looks good on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとも嬉しくない感想だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I so didn't feel happy hearing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I so didn't feel happy hearing that.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、私と理樹君の背丈はほとんど一緒なだけあって、ピッタリだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, my height is about same as Riki's, so it's a perfect fit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, my height is about same as Riki's, so it's a perfect fit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あーこれ来ヶ谷さんの制服なんだ…はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, it's Kurugaya-san's uniform... Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, it's Kurugaya-san's uniform... Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 道理で胸が余る…。
MESSAGE.EN: No wonder it felt loose around the chest...
MESSAGE.Translation: No wonder it felt loose around the chest...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然当然でもなんでもないってばっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not natural at all!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not natural at all!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だって見たかったんだ。そして出来れば触りたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But I wanted to see it. If possible, touch it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But I wanted to see it. If possible, touch it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んなわがまま言ってもダメだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't follow up on your every whim!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't follow up on your every whim!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミだって見たいだろう、本当は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You really want to see, too, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You really want to see, too, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んなことないからっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「欲望のままにハァハァ鈴君の寝顔めっさ可愛いー萌えーとか身悶えするといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You can indulge your desires by looking at Rin-kun's sleeping face and go ❛Haha, that's too cute, moe～.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You can indulge your desires by looking at Rin-kun's sleeping face and go ❛Haha, that's too cute, moe～.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だからしないってばっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I told you I won't do that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I told you I won't do that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だって萌え萌えだぞ。これはやばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But it's moe-moe. This is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But it's moe-moe. This is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんなことっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Th, that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Th, that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、そういうわけさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, well with that said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, well with that said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だからどういうわけなのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With what said!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With what said!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…少年、なかなかいい感じのツッコミじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Young man, that was a fairly good comeback.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Young man, that was a fairly good comeback.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまツッコまさせるようなことばっかり言わないでよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Stop saying strange things that are asking for a comeback!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Stop saying strange things that are asking for a comeback!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うっさいわぼけーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, stupid!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, stupid!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が目を覚ました！
MESSAGE.EN: Rin woke up!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin woke up!

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、失礼した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, pardon me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, pardon me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、鈴の布団に潜り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and slipped into Rin's futon.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and slipped into Rin's futon.

MESSAGE.JP: 貞操の危機を感じたのか、来ヶ谷さんに向かって枕を投げつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Sensing the danger to her chastity, she tossed a pillow at Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sensing the danger to her chastity, she tossed a pillow at Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oops.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oops.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひょい、と避けると。
MESSAGE.EN: She evaded it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She evaded it.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「むぎゅうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Mugyuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Mugyuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …誰かに当たった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It hit someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It hit someone.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおっ、枕投げかっ!?　待ってましたぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ooh, a pillow fight!? I've been waiting for this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ooh, a pillow fight!? I've been waiting for this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひょいひょいひょい、といくつも枕を投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She started throwing pillows one after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started throwing pillows one after another.

MESSAGE.JP: どっからこんなに持ってきたんだ、葉留佳さん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where did she get so many...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did she get so many...?

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「むぎゅぎゅぎゅうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Mugyugyuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Mugyugyuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …また誰かに当たった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They hit someone again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They hit someone again.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「な、何事ですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wh, what's going on!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wh, what's going on!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ターゲット確認」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Target confirmed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Target confirmed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽーい、とクドに向かって投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed a pillow at Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed a pillow at Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わぁっ!?　キャッチですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Waah!? Catch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Waah!? Catch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あははは投げろ投げろーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, throw them, throw them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, throw them, throw them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽーいっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bump*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bump*.

MESSAGE.JP: どすんばたんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoomp*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoomp*.

MESSAGE.JP: びしゅうっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*.

MESSAGE.JP: ずばんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-chank*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-chank*!

MESSAGE.JP: どばんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Whomp*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whomp*!

MESSAGE.JP: ばきいっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Boing*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boing*!

MESSAGE.JP: どがぁっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*!

MESSAGE.JP: ずがあんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Schlop*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Schlop*!!

MESSAGE.JP: ぼがぁんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: …どんどん収拾がつかないことになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Things were getting out of hand really fast.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Things were getting out of hand really fast.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…いいかげんにしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Will you cut it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Will you cut it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの声に、みんな止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone froze at Nishizono-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone froze at Nishizono-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あまり騒ぐと周りの寮生方にも迷惑ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you make so much noise, you'll disturb the other people in the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you make so much noise, you'll disturb the other people in the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ごめんなさいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「む…小毬君は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mu... Komari-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mu... Komari-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、これだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, there she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, there she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが枕の山をどかすと、中から小毬さんが。
MESSAGE.EN: She moved the mountain of pillows aside and pulled Komari-san out from underneath it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She moved the mountain of pillows aside and pulled Komari-san out from underneath it.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「むぎゅう～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mugyuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mugyuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔面に三つほど直撃していたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems she received three direct attacks, right in the face.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems she received three direct attacks, right in the face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あははは安らかにお眠りのご様子ですネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, she seems to be sleeping peacefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, she seems to be sleeping peacefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「失神してるんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did she faint...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did she faint...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな感じで、お泊り会は騒がしいまま終わりを告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: That marked the end of the noisy sleepover party.
MESSAGE.Translation: That marked the end of the noisy sleepover party.

MESSAGE.JP: …とりあえず、日の出を待ってから、僕は自室にこっそり戻るのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I waited for the sunrise and quietly returned to my room...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I waited for the sunrise and quietly returned to my room...
